name.zh: 自然語言處理與情感計算
name.en: Natural language processing and affective computing

description.zh: 未來的自然語言處理技術應該是能讓機器以人為本的角度來了解人類語言。尤其人類是富有感情的，所以，機器必須能理解與應對人類的情感。本課程內容將從心理語言學出發，探討、比較人和機器如何處理語言。尤其是人如何透過文字和語音來表達不同情緒，然後運用機器學習、深度學習和人本資料資料探勘等技術，進行語音與文本分析，偵測辨識實際人類語言中的情緒，進而培養如何讓人工智慧能夠更貼近使用者需要的洞察力與處理能力。
description.en: In future natural language processing technologies, machines should understand language from a human-oriented perspective. Especially given that human beings have emotions, machines must be able to understand and respond to human emotions.The content of this course will be based on psycholinguistics. We will first explore and compare how people and machines deal with language, especially in terms of how people express different emotions through words and voices. We will then apply machine learning, deep learning and human-centered information data mining techniques to detect emotions in real human language.

name.zh: 深度學習與類神經網路

description.zh: 深度學習探討如何能利用深層類神經網路，由觀測到的資料中自我學習，自我進化，而能有效進行預測，分類，偵測，辨認與決策，以建立人工智慧。本課程為進階的機器學習課程，將會花相當多的時間深入探討各種不同的訓練方法不同結構的類神經網路。包括深層類神經網路，卷積類神經網路，遞迴類神經網路等等網路架構，與監督式學習，非監督式學習，強化式學習，對抗式學習等等訓練方法。本課程並會要求學生實現各種不同類型的類神經網路，將其著應用在解決多種人本人工智慧服務設計問題。包時間序列預測，物體偵測與辨認，語音訊號處理、影像訊號處理、自然語言處理，音訊訊號處理等多種人本資訊處理。
description.en: Deep learning is a branch of artificial intelligence that focuses on how to use deep neural networks to self-learn and self-evolve from observed data, as well as to effectively predict, classify, detect patterns and make decisions.This course is an advanced machine learning course that delves into different neural network structures and training methods. Students will be asked to implement different neural networks to solve various human-centered artificial intelligent service design problems (e.g., time series prediction, object detection, image recognition, speech signal processing, video signal processing, natural language processing, audio signal processing, etc.).

description.zh: 本課程主旨在建立學生對預力構材的基本觀念。由對預力的認識、材料的要求，以主預力損失的瞭解及估算方式。從而由應力的觀點，討論撓曲斷面的分析及設計。最後再以施工及力學的須求方面探討預力鋼索佈置狀況。期使學生在修習後，能具備初步預力分析及設計之能力。
description.en: This course is aimed at establishing the basic concept of prestressed members to the students。It starts from introducing the high strength materials required by prestressed design，then the calculation of prestress losses are showns。The analysis and design of a flexural member are shown in a complete manner。

notes: 土木四甲乙合開,上限40人【停開】

description.zh: 課程主軸以實務應用為出發點，擬建立水情與洪氾模擬的整合系統。其系統架構包含下列主要項目：1.連結雷達降雨QPESUMS與數值氣候模式的資料，用以作為整個系統的主要輸入資料來源；2.建立模擬計算能量，包含降雨逕流、渠道、下水道、水利設施、邊界條件如下游潮位、以及二維漫地流淹水模式；3.動態展示所有資料與計算成果，包含一維與二維的時序列資料；4.各種轉換處理，包含圖層套疊、空間內插、時間序列補遺等。學員需要設立水情模擬整體環境以及熟悉各項子架構之間的連結，再者，用此系統來對應評估颱洪事件的應變計畫與治理設計，也是相當課程相當著重的部分。
description.en: An integrated system is expected in this class to carry out flood simulation under the configuration close to real practice.  The configuration includes:1.forcing data from QPESUMS which is radar rainfall as well as NWP, numerical weather prediction, usually used in emergency response;2.models considering rainfall round-off, channels, sewers, hydraulic structures, boundary conditions like tidal setup, and 2D overland flow to simulate the flooding area;3.dynamic demonstration which presnets all the possible calculated results as 1D or 2D time series;4.transformation contains spatial overlay, interpolation, and gap filling.Students are asked to setup the environment and familiar with the links among all the configuration.  In addition, planning and response to a typhoon event with the system are encouraged as well as the system development.

notes: 土木四及防災所合開,上限30人(大學10人)

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹河川污染控制中有關河川污染源的種類及數量，就其分析模式中有關溶氧之來源、溶氧之消耗、非感潮河川與氧垂曲線模式之推演、河川調查及資料分析工作及河川涵容能力之計算方法亦有完整之敘說，藉由河川涵容能力之推估，達到控制或分配家庭污水及工業廢水之目的。
description.en: The objective of this course is to introduce the River Pollution Control.

notes: 土木四甲乙合開,上限40人

name.en: Monitoring and Analysis for Environmental Pollutants

description.zh: 本課程著重於環境污染物之微量監測與分析內容，此包括有機有毒物、重金屬之儀器分析原理、化學理論及分析方法。修習本課程宜有化學基礎。
description.en: The course introduces monitoring and analysis for environment pollutants. It focuses the micro quantity analysis based on chemical theory. Modern instruments with high sensitivity will be also discussed.

description.zh: 本課程內容有:1.儀器裝置,應變計原理與使用方法.2.驗証簡支樑之彎曲理論.3.驗證馬克斯維爾反相定理.4.桁架試驗.5.剛架試驗.6.壓構材欴挫屈試驗.7.構材扭轉試驗.
description.en: Introduction: 1.Instrumentation. 2.Simple bending. 3.Maxwell's Reciprocal theorem. 4.Truss. 5.Rigid frame. 6.Buckling test. 7.Torsion test.

description.zh: 本課程以講授廢棄物減量與資源回收再利用之相關方法與技術為主，使學生從學習過程中瞭解4R之原理，除了相關的法令之外，亦包括：1.減廢方法與技術 2.資源化方法與技術 3.廢棄物再利用方法與技術 4.廢棄物生命週期之分析 5.減廢策略與管理體系等
description.en: This course is to introduce the principles of 4R in the waste management. In addition to related regulations, contents of this course include pollution prevention approaches and technology for waste minimization, recovery, and reuse, life cycle analysis, and management policy.

description.zh: 藉由說明環境系統化管理之原理，使學生對國際環境管理系統之趨勢與可能的貿易衝擊有充分了解與因應。並共同探討國內企業如何推行環境管理系統，永續發展，以增強企業界之國際競爭力。課程內容包含：(1)環境管理系統，環境績效評估，與環境稽核之原理。(2)歐美日環境管理系統之介紹　 以歐美日資源再回收使用、廢棄物處理、毒性、化學物、重大意    外事件之處理為例，說明環境管理系統之應用實務。(3)國際環境管理標準   介紹ISO9000、ISO14000與TQM，以提昇企業界之品質，降低成本   並提昇國際競爭力。
description.en: Associated with fundamentals and theory, the course provides an overall systematic management framework to solve the problems encountered in Taiwan as well as international countries. The main contents of this course include:(1)Principle in Environmental Management System.(2)Case study on American,Japan and EC for advanced EMS.(3)ISO series (9000 ;14000)and TQM(Total Quality Management).

name.en: Treatment and Management for Hazardous Materials

description.zh: 以技術觀點，配合環境法令之管理架構，本課程主要講授有害物質的毒性、危害性及對環境污染的影響。此包括前處理、中間處理技術、最終處置及其相對應的管理方法。
description.en: On the point of view on technology and regulatory limits, the course presents the treatment and management for hazardous materials. It includes toxicity, pretreatment, middle treatment and final disposal. Management relative to hazardous wastes will also delineated.

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解環境工程與管理之最新理論,技術及最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the environmental engineering and management. Invited Speakers are well-known scholars in areas related to environmental engineering and management. Graduate students or thesis advisors are also invited to report research results of their graduate studies.

description.zh: 在現代的工程設計與分析中，普遍應用到相關的電腦模式。儘管大部份工程應用電腦模式均以定率式的物理關係作為基礎，但引用電腦模式進行設計，必須考慮隱含在模式輸入與控制參數的不確定性，及其所產生模式輸出的不確定性。因此，適當的評估模式輸出的不確定性應包含在基本的設計當中。
description.en: In modern engineering designs and analyses, computer models are frequently used. Despite the fact that deterministic relationships are used in most compiterized models for engineering,the model outputs are indeterministic due to the uncertain and stochastic nature of the model inputs and parameters. All the uncertainty may contribute to the stochsticity of the input parameters of a corresponding model which, in turn, result in output uncertainty. Therefore,proper assessment of model outout uncertainty is essential.

description.zh: 本課程旨在闡述專案工程規劃與控制之系統架構，主要介紹各種專案規劃與控制之方法及專案管理方法，內容包工程專案管理方法，專案工期規劃與控制，專案成本控制方法，專案資源管理，專案風險整合管理，專案品質管理，及專案人力及目標管理等介紹。
description.en: 英課名：Investigation engineering control        System framework of investigation engineering         control.        Investigation plan and period procedure arrange.        A method that rate of progress control.        Natural resources to allocate and the most suitable         schedule.        Cost accounting and cost control.        Complete cost/System control of time limit for a           project.

description.zh: 本課程主要教授同學一般工程專案管理之主要概念、內容包含專案管理組織架構，專案時程控管、專案範疇管理、專案整合管理、專案溝通管理、專案人力資源管理等理論知識，同時也包含了常用工程專案管理管控方法與技術機制介紹。本課程目標意在培養具備同學工程專案管理方法與技術，使應用於工程專案專案之設計、施工、及營運階段。
description.en: Project management in construction is increasingly important for management of construction projects recently. The course introduces the major concepts and methods for project management in construction. The course includes project schedule management, project scope management, project integration management, project communication, and project human resource management. The course allows students to enhance the abilities and techniques to handle the construction project management during the design, construction, and operation phase.

description.zh: 衛星影像為目前土木、水資源與防災科技所經常使用之資訊來源，其處理有別於一般之影像，主要內容將包含衛星影像幾何校正、影像分類、影像增揚、數值高程運用等。
description.en: Satellite images are one of the major information sources in civil engineering, water resources engineering and disaster prevention technologies.  Satellite image processing is different from picture image processing, mainly focusing on the satellite image geometric rectification, image classification, image enhancement, digital elevation model applications, and so forth.

description.zh: 水文系統監測主要目的為了解水文過程，其所收集到的水質與水量資料可作為水資源規劃及管理的主要依據。本課程的主要目的為介紹水文系統中所需觀次之項目、監測方法及觀測儀器的原理及使用方法，因此主要的主題包含大氣監測(溫度、濕度、壓力、日照、降水、風速、蒸散、蒸發散)、地表水監測(水位、流速、流量計算、泥沙、率訂曲線)及地下水(土壤濕度、入滲、地下水)。此外，亦將介紹相關的水質監測。
description.en: Hydrological measurements are made to obtain data on hydrological processes. They are essential for the interpretation of quality and quantity data for water resource planning and management. The main topics include: measurement of atmospheric water (temperature, pressure, moisture, precipitation, wind velocity, evaporation, evapotanspiration), measurement of surface water (water stage, flow velocity, discharge computation, sediment, rating curve), and measurement of subsurface water (soil moisture, infiltration, ground water). The water quality monitoring will also introduced in this course.

description.zh: 介紹各種車輛使用先進駕駛輔助系統(Advanced Driver Assistance Systems, ADAS)、自駕車及車聯網設備的感測器及其應用。自駕車及車聯網亦需要多種感測器之支援，皆需要對應的感測器系統。同時也介紹先進工業儀器設備的感測器及其連結網路，包含運動控制相關感測器、視覺相關感測器、力量相關感測器與製程監控相關感測器四大主軸。
description.en: This course introduces the sensors used in Advanced Driver Assistance System (ADAS), autonomous vehicle and car-interconnected devices. These systems need the corresponding sensors in the real implementation. The sensors used in the industrial instruments, for motion, vision, force detection and process monitor, are also included in this course.

notes: 車輛三四、機械三和感測學程合開

description.zh: 一維及多維穩定態熱傳導及非穩定態熱傳導、對流原理、強迫對流及自然對流經驗和實驗關係式、輻射熱傳遞、凝結與沸騰、熱交換器、熱傳遞中的特殊論題
description.en: Steady-State Conduction-One Dimension, Steady-State Conduction-Multiple Dimensions, Unsteady-State Conduction, Principles of Convection, Empirical and Practical Relations for Forced-Convection Heat Transfer, Natural- Convection Systems, Radiation Heat Transfer, Condensation and Boiling Heat Transfer, Heat Exchangers, Special Topics in Heat Transfer.

description.zh: 主要內容包含：企業研究的本質、研究流程、研究問題與假設、文獻評論、資料收集、操作性定義、測量、理論架構模型化、研究設計、量化與質化研究、個案研究法、資料分析與解釋、研究報告撰寫。
description.en: The course mainly discusses concepts of business research methods. The contents will include following topics：（1）the nature of business research, （2）elements of research and research process, （3）research problem and hypothesis,（4）literature review, （5）research design, （6）research proposal, （7）case study, （8）analysis and the interpretation of data, （9）quantitative and qualitative research,(10) research report.

description.zh: 本課程旨在以哈佛式企業個案研討及撰寫為主。課程中，包含傳統式與哈佛式兩種教學方法之比較，各產業個案之研討，及個案撰寫之方法。各產業個案之研討中包含議題有企業營運模式之變革，服務創新，科技化服務，與企業電子化等。個案撰寫包含教學手冊及個案之學理背景及應用。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to teach the Harvard’s case teaching and case writing. In the course, it includes the comparison of traditional case teaching with the Harvard’s case teaching, the industry case study, and the theory of case writing. In industry case study, several topics will be cover above like business model reengineering, service innovation, and IT innovation. In case writing, the theory of the teaching note and case analysis will cover.

notes: 管理博班和經管碩專班合開

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹在計算機科學中常見或基本的資料結構,探討的主題包括: ADT(抽像資料型態)及複雜度, 靜態結構與儲存表示, 陣列，堆疊，佇列，串列，樹狀結構，遞迴，排序, 搜尋。
description.en: This course is mainly aimed at introducing the data structures commonly used in programming languages which include ADT (abstract data type) and complexity, static structures and their storage representations, arrays, stacks, queues, linked lists, trees, recursion, sorting, and searching.

notes: 資工組必修。電機組、電子組、光電組為選修。

description.zh: 中文概述：專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 高分子流變學本課程以講述高分子流體之黏性及彈性為主。內容包括:(1) 黏彈性簡介(2)時間溫度轉換(3)非結晶區之玻璃轉移點(4)橡膠理論(5)黏彈模型(6)介電鬆弛等專題。
description.en: This course will extensively study the viscosity and elasticity of polymeric materials. The main contents include(1) Phenomenalogical Treatment of Viscoelasticity(2) Time-Temperature Correspondence(3) Transitions and Relaxation in Amorphous Polymers(4) Rubber Elasticity(5) Viscoelastic Models(6) Dielectric Relaxation

description.zh: 專題討論本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

description.zh: 專題討論本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹：1.電磁波光學2.高斯光束3.共振腔理論4. 原子輻射5.雷射與放大器原理7.雷射特性 8.雷射的應用
description.en: This course introduces: 1. Electromagnetic Optics 2.Gaussian Beams 3.Optical resonators 4.Atomic radiation 5.Principles of lasers and amplifiers 6. General characteristics of lasers 7. Laser applications

notes: 光電系所和電資外生系所合開

description.zh: 本課程目的在介紹東西方傳統工藝的本質及現代的演進歷程，並配合工藝設計名作介紹，認識當代工藝發展思潮。從講解文化設計美學與工藝鑑賞的理論基礎，幫助學生瞭解文化設計未來發展趨勢，培養對於傳統工藝的鑑賞品味。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to introduce the modern evolution of the traditional crafts in the East and the West, and to introduce the trend of contemporary craft design development. This course explains the theoretical basis of cultural design aesthetics and process appreciation to help students understand the future development trend of cultural design and cultivate the appreciation and taste of traditional crafts.

description.zh: 課程以循序漸進的方式，協助學生在陶藝創作上所需能力的支持及思維上的釐清。加強同學在陶藝材料運用上的廣度及深度，並學習自行發展主題性創意商品。課堂上以個別指導及分組討論的模式，協助學生發展自我的創作脈絡，以建立自我在概念及設計思考上的模式。
description.en: The course provides students with a step-by-step approach to support the creation of ceramics and to the creative thinking. Strengthen the ability of using ceramic materials by students, and learn to develop their own creative products. In the classroom, with individual guidance and group discussion, students are assisted in developing their own creative context to establish their own patterns in concept and design.

notes: 共科9樓工藝教室*修習課程需至校外服務

name.zh: 使用者經驗設計與評量

description.zh: 本課程將包含使用者經驗設計的基礎，以及使用者研究量測的內涵及方法。本課程中，將透過課堂上課、討論、以及實習的方式，介紹使用者研究的實際案例、評估模式、團隊合作方法、設計與評估工具、實踐思維、挑戰、以及實際執行的程序。預期學生將於本課程中，透過分組獲得使用者經驗在互動設計、空間設計以及產品設計上，有關使用者研究的設計、評估、施行、以及質化與量化分析量測評估的知識與方法。
description.en: This course will cover the fundamentals of user experience design and provide the students with insights into the measurement of user research. The real-life processes, challenges, considerations, tools, team works, models and case studies of user research are introduced in this course by lecturing, discussing and practicing methods. Students are expecting to learn user experience principles, to designing, evaluating, implementing and measuring user experience in both qualitative and quantitative methods in the aspect of interaction design, space design and product design individually.

notes: 設計博(核心選修)與互動所合開

description.zh: 本課程的目的是為了：1.驗證物理理論之真實性，2.培養同學認真的科學態度與方法，3.培養同學數據處理的能力，4.啟發同學自行設計解決量度問題的方法。課程之施行為一學分三小時，內容偏重電磁、光學、近物之實驗。
description.en: In this course there will be 1 credit for one semester; and 3 laboratorial hours per week. The experiments contains electromagnetics, optics, and modern physics, etc.. The purposes of this course are 1. to identify the physical laws, 2. to cultivate students' earnest manner and methods of science, 3. to cultivate their ability of data reduction, 4. to instruct them to solve the problems of measurements by self-designments.

description.zh: 瞭解線性與非線性電路的組成與分析法，內容包含：1. 交流激勵電路：交流穩態分析，功率計算及相電路，2. 三相電路：Ｙ與△型轉換及功率分析，3. 變壓器電路：互感應及電壓電流的變換，4. 頻率響應分析：極點與零點，轉移函數，5. Fourier 級數，轉換及應用，6. Laplace轉換及應用。
description.en: The course covers the synthesis and analysis of bath linear and nonlinear circuits.Contents include:1.AC circuit :AC steady-state analysis,phasor analysis2.Three phase circuits3.Transformer circuits4.Frequency response 5.Fourier series,Fourier transformation and application6.Laplace transformation and application

description.zh: 在電子化與網路化之經營環境下，生產製造與服務過程中，都會蒐集其中自動產生或人工輸入的資料。本課程學習在資訊平台上，以統計與分析方法以處理大量資料混雜時的管理決策問題，以萃取出有價值的資訊或內隱的知識，做為決策支援與管理之依據。除介紹問題基本特性，說明資料科學工具與方法外，並利用作業、個案研究、案例資料，以訓練同學資料分析的能力與解決問題的經驗。
description.en: Amount of data are collected automatically during manufacturing production and service process. This course aims to introduce how to apply big data analytic and statistical methods for decision making with amount of data and then extracting useful rules or patterns for decision support and management. In addition to lecturing, this course also training students how to analyze the data and learn problem solving techniques through homework, term project and case studies.

description.zh: 在電子化與網路化之經營環境下，生產製造與服務過程中，都會蒐集其中自動產生或人工輸入的資料。本課程學習在資訊平台上，以統計與分析方法以處理大量資料混雜時的管理決策問題，以萃取出有價值的資訊或內隱的知識，做為決策支援與管理之依據。除介紹問題基本特性，說明資料科學工具與方法外，並利用作業、個案研究、案例資料，以訓練同學資料分析的能力與解決問題的經驗。
description.en: Amount of data are collected automatically during manufacturing production and service process. This course aims to introduce how to apply big data analytic and statistical methods for decision making with amount of data and then extracting useful rules or patterns for decision support and management. In addition to lecturing, this course also training students how to analyze the data and learn problem solving techniques through homework, term project and case studies.

description.zh: 本課程針對固體廢棄物的來源及基本性質，分析並介紹各種固體廢棄物再生的技術與方法實例。
description.en: This class include the discussion of the origin of the solid waste and its basic physical and chemical properties that related to its recovery, recycling and reutilization.  The recovery methods and the follow-up process to recycle the solid waste will also be discussed.  Several practical case study will be included.

description.zh: 操作化學相關的實驗
description.en: It covers the fundamental experiments in chemistry.

description.zh: 介紹有機材料：如染料、界面活性劑、添加劑、單體、生物活性物質等之合成、性質、鑑定和應用等。
description.en: The material in this course covers fundamental and practical aspects of organic materials. The various types of organic materials such as dyestuffs, surfactants, additives, monomers and bioactive agents will be introduced. Syntheses, Properties, Characterization and applications are presented.

description.zh: 本課程涵蓋的範圍包括基礎的雷射物理與工程、雷射光束的傳播、高斯雷射光束、光學共振腔的原理、設計與分析等等。內容包含：1. 基本光學  2.雷射基本原理  3.各種雷射介紹  4.雷射動態特性  5. 雷射的應用
description.en: The lectures will cover the fundamental aspects of laser physics and engineering of lasers of all kinds, including ray tracing, Gaussian beams, principles of the optical cavities design and analysis...etc. The lecture outline is as follows:1.Basic optics  2. Laser principles  3. Specific types of lasers  4. Laser dynamics  5. Laser applications

name.zh: 光電半導體元件技術及應用
name.en: Optoelectronic semiconductor device technology and application

description.zh: 本課程介紹光電半導體的基本原理與應用，幫助同學們了解光電元件如發光二極體的製程、封裝、及測試技術的發展，由市場應用概況導入，含蓋設計研發、製造生產、與特性量測等範疇，說明光電元件的光熱電特性對元件效率的影響，並搭配實驗方式深入了解。
description.en: This course introduces the basic principles and applications of optoelectronic semiconductors such as light emitting diodes to help students understand the fabrication process, packaging, and test technologies This course includes application, design and manufacturing. In addition, the influences of optical, thermal, and electrical properties on the device efficiency will be explained through fundamental theory and experiments.

description.zh: 偏微分方程式、變分法、張量分析、工程統計及積分方程式等工程分析用工具知識。
description.en: Partial Differential equation, Variation Principle, Tensor Analysis, Engineering Statistics and Integral equation.

description.zh: 先修課程：3002014或負責教授同意。燃料及燃燒、基本熱傳理論、蒸汽動力廠、壓縮機、燃氣輪機、內燃機、汽油引擎、柴油引擎、冷凍空調循環。
description.en: Fuels and Combustion, Principles of Heat Transfer, Steam Power Plants Compressors, Gas Turbines, Internal Combustion Engines: Gasoline Engines, Diesel Engines, Refrigeration And Air Conditioning.

description.zh: 以結構工程、大地工程、防災科學、運輸交通、營建管理、營建材料及營建技術為專題討論主題之主要範疇。
description.en: SeminarSpecial subject discussion of structure engineering , geography engineering pretecting calamity science, transportation, construction management , construction material and construction technique.

name.zh: 循環經濟與高分子工業

description.zh: 循環經濟是一種與傳統線性經濟（開採-製造-丟棄）不同的產業經濟模式，循環經濟就像自然生態循環一樣，是封閉且循環的經濟系統，透過重新設計產品和商業模式，促進更好的能源與資源使用效率、消除廢棄物及避免污染自然環境。內容將包括發展及應用物質流分析及循環經濟的相關技術，先進材料的循環經濟議題及案例分析，不同高分子材料領域的循環經濟生態，及跨學科創造永續的解決辦法。
description.en: A circular economy is a regenerative system in which resource input and waste, emission, and energy leakage are minimised by slowing, closing, and narrowing material and energy loops. This can be achieved through long-lasting design, maintenance, repair, reuse, remanufacturing, refurbishing, and recycling. This is contrast to a linear economy which is a 'take, make, dispose' model of production. This course, further, contributes to the optimising systems rather than components, or the notion of ‘design for fit’. As a generic notion it draws from a number of more specific approaches including novel material, plastic, polymer, textile, and the cicular economy. Additional benefit to students is learning of Sustainable Development.

class.name: 能源光電外國學生專班

notes: 高分所和EOMP合開,二週【停開】

description.zh: 使學生明瞭地震學基本理念及地震反應譜之運用，介紹結構物之耐震設計分析及實例探討，課程內容包括地震強度、地盤對地震之影響，耐震設計，結構物如公路、鐵路、港灣設施、橋樑、混凝土壩、拱壩及地下結構之震設計。
description.en: The main course include of earthquake intensity,influence of ground conditions on earthquake ground motion,design earthquake motion, earth pressure during earthquakes, earthquake resistance of roed,railways,bridges,concrote gravitydams, archdams and underground structures,ets.

description.zh: 地表和地下水的非點源污染，已經成為全世界各地區相當嚴重的環境問題。非點源污染本身複雜的特性導致集水區內污染物承載推估與污染源之標定非常困難。本課程之目的以介紹非點源污染之污染源特性及傳輸途徑為起點，教導學生學習使用最新的科技與工具，去建立最有效可行的最佳管理作業(Best Management Practice, BMP)之配置計劃，以達到集水區內非點源污染之削減目標。學生們將學習應用與統合地理資訊系統、遙測資料、水文暨水質數理模式、以及專家系統去解決集水區內非點源污染的控制問題。
description.en: Nonpoint source (NPS) pollution of streams, lakes, and estuaries has been a critical concern throughout the world.  The difficulty in both identifying and assessing nonpoint source pollution resides precisely in the complex nature of NPS.  This course aims to expose students to state-of-the-art tools and techniques for developing effective Best Management Practice (BMP) allocation plans to control NPS pollution at the watershed scale.  The foundations of this course will be focused on definition of NPS pollution, NPS pollutant dynamics in bioenvironmental systems, watershed hydrology and NPS pollutant transport, as well as BMPs for NPS pollution control.  Students will next learn how to apply Geographic Information System (GIS), Remote Sensing (RS), hydrologic modeling and Artificial Intelligence (AI) technologies to the solutions of NPS pollution problems in watersheds.  The tools and techniques presented are flexible and students will be able to apply them to solve NPS type of proble

description.zh: 主要課程內容包括Visual Basic或C程式語言介紹及應用。
description.en: The major course includes the introduction of Visual Basic or C programming language and application.

description.zh: 本課程係探討纖維製品在非衣著終端領域之應用，例如電子電機，土木，材料，生醫，航空與車輛工程等之應用。其內容包括功能性與機能性纖維、複合紗、複合織物、編帶、非織物、纖維系複合材料與電線電纜、光纖電纜等之製造方法、原理與其終端應用領域。最後將討論微細加工技術與微細粉末在纖維與高科技工業上之應用。
description.en: The course is to interpret the application of the non-apparel textiles at the different end uses, such as application in electrical and electronic, civil, material, biomedical, aerospace, and vehicle engineering etc.  It includes fabrication methods, principles, and end application fields of the performance and functional fibers, composite yarns, composite fabrics, braid, nonwoven, textile composites, and cables and optical cables etc.　Finally, the micro processing technology and powder in textile and high-tech industries will be discussed.

description.zh: 就主要的染料和顏料之化學結構、製造方式和基本化性予以闡述，以便對色料的相關應用有較為明晰的瞭解。
description.en: Chemical structure, manufacturing and properties of main dyes and pigments are studied. Further applications of the colourstuff are explained.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討高分子用於光電工業的原理及方法。主要分為電子構裝高分子、電路成像高分子、光電子成像材料、最近的光電新材料。包括用於光碟、電變色、非線性光學、LB薄膜、發光二極體材料，導電性及有機電晶體材料。
description.en: This is a special course on the topics of optoelectronic polymer materials. It includes polymers for electron package, photoresist, and photoimaging. Also, the advanced material of optics disc, electronic chromic, nonlinear optics, LB film, organic photodiode, conducting polymer and organic transistor.

description.zh: 本課程被設計為介紹有關棉細紗、毛系紗、加工絲及複合紗製造系統，與其有關之細節亦被包括在內，其課程包含有製造流程、紡紗設備之機構與終端用途。此外，本課程被架構在朝向新式紡紗製造方法，製程管制與品質管制之新近發展，電腦控制系統與自動測試系統。纖維與成紗結構和性質間之相互關係及檢測亦被討論。
description.en: The course is designed to introduce in staple, filament and composite yarns manufacturing systems, which include manufacturing process, spinning mechanism and end applications. Furthermore, the course is structured towards an advanced study of the newer methods of yarn manufacture, and the latest developments in processing control and quality control, computerized control systems and automatic measuring systems. Relationships between fiber and yarn structural properties are also discussed.

name.zh: X光在材料分析上的應用

description.zh: X光已經成為材料結構鑑定上一項很有用的技術。這門課將介紹如何應用X光粉末繞射與吸收光譜於材料結構鑑定，以及數據分析。
description.en: X-ray has become a powerful technique on the characterization of material structures. The course will teach how to apply the x-ray diffraction and absorption on structural characterization and even analysis.

notes: 需持有「游離輻射訓練合格證書」者，方可選修此課程

description.zh: 本課程以講述物理化學上，尤其是量子化學上，必須用到的數學為主。內容主要涵蓋三大部分。第一部分為基本線性代數，包含向量，矩陣，以及行列式等，第二部分為特殊函數與傅立葉轉換，第三部分則應用數值分析。
description.en: This course is mainly focus on the mathematics for physical chemistry, especially for quantum chemistry. It is divided into three parts. The first part is related to the linear algebra, such as vector, matrix, determinants, eigenvalues, diagonalization, and so on. The 2nd one is special function and Fourier analysis, including series solutions for differential equations, Hermite polynomials, Laguerre polynomials, Legendre polynomials, and Fourier transformation. The last one is related to the numerical analysis which is including Boltzmann distribution, Gaussian distribution, least square analysis.

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹微生物及其應用，學生將可習得何謂微生物，微生物如何運作，以及微生物的應用。課程內容包括: (1)微生物的分類、型態、結構及一般特性; (2)微生物的生長與控制; (3)微生物的生理與代謝; (4)微生物的應用，例如生物轉換、一次及二次代謝產物的生產、基因重組蛋白的生產、核酸藥物的生產等。
description.en: The objective of the course is to introduce the major concepts, principles and applications of microbiology. Students will learn about what microorganisms are, how they function, and their industrial applications. The course include the following topics: (1) Classification and structures; (2) Microbial growth and control; (3) Microbial physiology and metabolism; (4) Applications, such as biotransformation, production of primary and secondary metabolites, production of recombinant proteins, etc.

name.en: Integration Technology for Networking Manufacturing Systems

description.zh: 製造聯網整合技術配合感測器、控制器、網路系統等，讓人、機器人、原物料、零組件、重要物品或設備，取得人、機、料、法、環的訊息，透過大數據分析與人工智慧，執行各種事前診斷預防、維護、事發處置及事後重建與改善的動作。本課程著重於製造聯網整合技術與實施方法，特別在智能工廠技術包含IoT、感測器設計與選擇、機電整合、數據分析、預防診斷與維修、智慧適應控制等。
description.en: Integration technology for networking manufacturing systems integrates sensor, controller, networking system, etc.. This technology uses big data analysis and artificial intelligence to communicate among human, robot, raw material, parts, important article or equipment, which can do prediction, protection, and improvement, etc.. This course focuses on integration technology for networking manufacturing systems and its practical implementation. The intelligent factory consists of IoT, design and selection of sensors, integration of electromechanics, data analysis, preventive diagnosis and repair, intelligent adaptive control, etc..

description.zh: 本課程介紹腦機介面工程之原理及應用，包括腦科學基本知識、腦機介面系統基本架構、腦波訊號處理、以及在健康照護自動化及控制領域相關應用。本課程將安排各項實習，讓學生實際操作腦波儀進行實驗與基本腦波分析。
description.en: This course is designed to provide students with basic knowledge of brain science, architecture of brain-computer interface, EEG signal processing, and applications in healthcare automation and control.

notes: 限10人/和感測學程合開，可抵孼生醫感測技術與系統

description.zh: 本課程介紹腦機介面工程之原理及應用，包括腦科學基本知識、腦機介面系統基本架構、腦波訊號處理、以及在健康照護自動化及控制領域相關應用。本課程將安排各項實習，讓學生實際操作腦波儀進行實驗與基本腦波分析。
description.en: This course is designed to provide students with basic knowledge of brain science, architecture of brain-computer interface, EEG signal processing, and applications in healthcare automation and control.

notes: 限35人/和感測學程合開，可抵孼生醫感測技術與系統

description.en: Introduction of AI in industrial applications, Neural Networks, Searching algorithm of expert systems, Statement logic, Testing, Machine learning.

description.en: Introduction of AI in industrial applications, Neural Networks, Searching algorithm of expert systems, Statement logic, Testing, Machine learning.

description.zh: 於2009年，ASTM定義了積層製造，並將此積層製造分成七大類型，本課程將對其中的光聚合固化及材料擠製技術進行軟硬體材料的剖析，並導入實作。本課程鼓勵學生在修課後，參加IPAS 3D列印實作考科之工程師級考試。
description.en: ASTM Committee F42 on Additive Manufacturing Technologies was formed in 2009. The myriad process names into seven standardized terms. In this course, the processes of Vat Photopolymerization and Material Extrusion, hardware, software, and material will be studied, The implementation of these two type systems will be given. The course will encourage students to take IPAS exam in 3D Printing practice.

notes: 機械大四合開/限21人/億光大樓IPAS考場*

name.zh: 電腦輔助工程分析及實習
name.en: Computer Aided Engineering Analysis and Lab.

description.en: Introduction to Engineering Analysis, Finite Element Model Constructing, Advanced Techniques of Module, Solid models  Constructing, One-dimensional Analysis, Two-dimensional Analysis, Three-dimensional Analysis, Advanced Examples.

description.en: Introduction to Engineering Analysis, Finite Element Model Constructing, Advanced Techniques of Module, Solid models  Constructing, One-dimensional Analysis, Two-dimensional Analysis, Three-dimensional Analysis, Advanced Examples.

description.en: Manufacturing Process Planning, Programmable Control System, Data-Communication and Local-Area-Network System, Numerical Control, Programming for NC Machining, Industrial Robot, Artificial Intelligence, and Computer Integrated Manufacturing System.

notes: 限45人/機械大三合開/綜科328_1*

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。介紹精密機電系統及精密加工程序。移動平台(XY-Stage)、滾珠螺桿、線性滑軌、位置控制與馬達之選用，透過馬達控制實驗及PC-I/O 介面實驗訓練學生具有精密工程實務經驗。
description.en: This course will mainly introduce the concepts of precision mechanical systems and precision fabrication process. The key points of selecting and assembling of XY-stages, driving units, ball screws, linear motion elements, stepping motors and servo motor control units through PC-based controller will be also introduced and practical experimented in correspondence training course.

description.zh: 以演講，討論，口頭及書面報告方式，探討土木與防災之相關課題，如結構檢測評估與補強，水土防災技術，防災體系與資訊，都市防災，消防防災，施工災變，環境防災規劃與管理等。
description.en: By means of addresses discussion, oral presentations and reports to learn and investigate the related civil and disaster prevention subjects, such as structure testing, evaluation and repairing, soil and water disaster prevention, urban precaution, fire fighting, construction safety, environmental planning, and management for disaster prevention.

description.zh: 本課程以“智能工業生產教學工廠”為學習場域，是一間無人的關燈工廠，這間智能工廠的建置完全與廠商實際生產需求結合，全球最大高階自行車變速器製造商美商速聯公司(SRAM)林孟輝總廠長擔任建廠諮詢顧問，整間工廠完全由北科大跨系所老師帶領學生自行建置，這是一間全國大學第一條由老師帶領學生團隊自行建置完成的智能化生產製造產線，產線包括加工區、精密量測區、線上品管區、組裝區、自動倉儲，從接受訂單到智能化排單、加工、量測、品管、組裝、倉儲，所有雲端伺服器與程式軟體完全由學生自行架設與撰寫，是一條完全無人化的關燈展示生產與教學工廠。上課方式是廠商針對智能工廠各個工作細節具體提出實務需求，再由上課老師帶學生助教以此些問題作為上課基礎，教導學生共同解決，學生以班級為單位進入工廠實作學習，課程由負責建置“智能工業生產教學工廠”的老師依其專長領域分工合作開課，依據老師負責建置的部分及其專長進行分工教學，學生分組由個別老師帶領指導，學生將可依序學到完整工廠技術，學期結束再由各專長老師依照學生分組指導學生進行專題報告，學生的專題報告將以個別老師專長協助解決的問題撰寫報告，這樣的設計可以讓學生深入了解與探討如何解決問題。
description.en: This course is based on the intelligent manufacturing system education factory which is an unmanned and turn off the light factory. The intelligent factory is completely built by ourselves and is the only one self-built factory in Taiwanese universities. Building the intelligent factory is cooperated with SRAM, a global bicycle parts manufacturer, and their director Jacky Lin is our technical consultant. The intelligent manufacturing system has seven areas, central server, reception, automatic warehouse, manufacturing, measuring, on-line quality control, and assembly. In process, we receive the raw materials and scanned by QR code scanner. After scanned, the raw materials are transported to the warehouse and wait for producing order. If the producing order received, the raw materials will be sent through all seven machines, where a finished component will be manufactured. One component from that batch will be sent to measuring area for complete quality control and the remaining compone

description.zh: 先修課程：3002014或負責教授同意。一維及多維穩定態熱傳導及非穩定態熱傳導、對流原理、強迫對流及自然對流經驗和實驗關係式、輻射熱傳遞、凝結與沸騰、熱交換器、熱傳遞中的特殊論題。
description.en: Steady-State Conduction-One Dimension, Steady-State Conduction-Multiple Dimensions, Unsteady-State Conduction, Principles of Convection, Empirical and Practical Relations for Forced-Convection Heat Transfer, Natural- Convection Systems, Radiation Heat Transfer, Condensation and Boiling Heat Transfer, Heat Exchangers, Special Topics in Heat Transfer.

description.zh: 先修課程：3002014或負責教授同意。燃料及燃燒、基本熱傳理論、蒸汽動力廠、壓縮機、燃氣輪機、內燃機、汽油引擎、柴油引擎、冷凍空調循環。
description.en: Fuels and Combustion, Principles of Heat Transfer, Steam Power Plants Compressors, Gas Turbines, Internal Combustion Engines: Gasoline Engines, Diesel Engines, Refrigeration And Air Conditioning.

description.zh: 先修課程：電子學相當課程或負責教授同意。 數位系統簡介，數字系統及編碼，基本邏輯操作，布林代數與卡諾圖，組合邏輯電路設計與應用，多工器與解多工器，正反器，暫存器，順序電路設計與應用，計數器與計時器，記憶體，微處理機架構簡介。
description.en: Introduction to digital circuits, digital systems and coding, basic logic operations, Boolean algebra and Karnaugh-map, combinational logic circuit design and applications, multiplexer and demultiplexer, flip-flop, register, sequential logic circuit design and applications, counter and timer, shift register and memory, introduction to micro-processor.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。半導體元件、整流電路、電晶體和電路、運算放大器、線性積體電路、邏輯元件、數位電路、數位積體電路、微處理器、放大器等。
description.en: Semiconduction Device, Rectifier circuit, Transistor Circuit, Operational Amplifier, Linear Integrated Circuit, logic Device, Digital Circuit, Digital Integrated Circuit, Micro Processor, Amplifier, etc.

notes: 限40人/機械大1甲、乙班合開/綜科328*

description.zh: 先修課程：3002015或負責教授同意。認識標準與規範、規範的應用、軸承設計實務、密封裝置設計、移位齒輪、潤滑設計實務、旋轉機件的慣性及啟動問題、驅動元件之選用。
description.en: Introduction to Standards and Codes, Practice of Bearing Selection, Seal Design, Shifted Gears, Practice of Lubrication Design, Mass Moment of Inertia and flywheel effects, and Driving Device Selection.

description.zh: 現代控制理論簡介、線性空間分析、狀態方程式及響應、可控制性及可觀測性、穩定性分析、狀態回授及估測、控制器設計及應用、觀測。
description.en: Introduction of Modern Control Theory﹒Linear space Analysis, State equation and Response, Controllability and Observability, Stability Analysis, State Feedback and Estimation, Controller Design and Applications, Observer Design and Applications, Nonlinear systems, Time varying Systems, Applications of Modern Control theory.

description.zh: 全球化製造體系的形成，使得合約製造商必須以更積極的態度，從策略面出發，藉由各種電腦與網路的技術，整合內部與外部的流程與資訊，打造數位工廠。數位製造的目的，是希望藉由資訊透明化，提升整個製造體系的競爭優勢。課程的設計，是以概念介紹的方式，說明數位製造的應用現況與相關技術。本課程的內容包括：數位製造概論、數位製造實例說明、商業模型分析、企業知識入口網站、產品資料管理、交易系統、資料倉儲、企業資訊入口網站。
description.en: Brief: Globalization has lead contract manufactures more active on seeking new strategies to survive. To increase competition, new technologies, such as computer and network technology, have applied. Computer and network technology can integrate internal and external information to establish a so-called "e-factory." This course covers different issues related to e-Manufacturing, such as Concept of e-Manufacturing, Case Study, Business Model Analysis, Knowledge Management, Enterprise Knowledge Portal (EKP), Product Data Management (PDM), Concept of Trading Systems, Concept of Data Warehousing, Enterprise Information Portal (EIP), Workflow Management, State of the Art Technologies, etc

name.zh: 塑膠射出模具CAE模流分析
name.en: Mold-flow analysis of plastic injection mold CAE

description.zh: (1) 瞭解CAE網格概念與建構，將以國內開發的模流分析軟體Moldex-3D作為教學實       習的內容：(2)流動分析，即熔膠充填狀態；(3)保壓分析，分析模內壓力分佈狀態；(4)       冷卻分析，關於模內溫度分佈；(5)翹曲分析，分析成形品的變形。
description.en: (1) To realize mesh concept and construct the mesh. (2) Flow analysis of melt plastic filling. (3) Packing analysis of pressure distribution in the mold. (4) Cooling analysis of temperature distribution in the mold. (5) Warp analysis of injection molding parts.

description.zh: 本課程介紹基本的金屬切削原理及其實務應用。本課程包含以下各項主題：(1)工具機與加工操作，(2)基本切削力學，(3)金屬切削溫度，(4)刀具壽命與刀具材料，(5)切削液與切削表面粗度，(6)金屬切削操作經濟學，(7)切屑控制，(8)研磨加工，(9)金屬切削實驗方法，(10)CAD/CAM與數控加工，(11)精密切削技術等。
description.en: This course is an introduction to basic metal-cutting principles and their practical applications. This course includes the following topics: (1) machine tools and machining operations, (2) fundamental metal-cutting mechanics, (3) temperature effect in metal machining, (4) tool lifetime and tool materials, (5) cutting coolants and surface roughness, (6) economics of meta-cutting operations, (7) chip control, (8) grinding, (9) experimental methods on metal machining, (10) CAD/CAM and numerical control (NC) machining, (11) techniques for precision machining.

description.zh: 本課程的內容包括：HTML語法、ASP程式語言、網頁與資料庫連結、XML語法簡介、JSP語法簡介、製造業應用展示說明。
description.en: Brief: This course covers different programming languages and technologies used to construct Web Based Systems, such as HTML, ASP, Connection to Database Systems, XML, JSP, etc. Some examples applied to industries are also introduced.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。1.基礎物理光學2.超音波簡介3.雷射超音波的生成4.雷射超音波的偵測5.刀鋒邊緣技術6.雙頻干涉儀7.費里裴洛干涉儀8.非線性晶體干涉儀9.雷射超音波技術於非破壞檢測之應用10.雷射超音波技術於材料性質量測之應用11.雷射超音波技術發展的未來趨勢
description.en: 1.Introduction to physical optics, 2.Introduction to ultrasonic waves, 3.Optical generation of ultrasound waves, 4.Detection of ultrasonic waves with optical methods, 5.Knife edge technique, 6.Hetrodyne interferometers in LUT, 7.Fabry-Perot interferometers, 8.Two-way mixing interferometers, 9.Application of LUT in nondestructive testing, 10.Application of LUT to material characterizations, 11.Future trend of LUT.

notes: 機電所、機械博及外生合開

name.en: Principles and Practices of Parallel Programming

description.zh: 1.  平行概論 2.  GPU平行計算技術3.  GPU-CUDA介面 4.  基礎CUDA程式撰寫 5.  GPU-CUDA硬體規劃 6.  進階CUDA程式撰寫7.   GPU-CUDA最佳化 8.   GPU-CUDA應用範例練習
description.en: 1.  Introduction to the principles of parallel programming2.  Introduction to GPU computing 3.  GPU-CUDA interfaces 4.  GPU programming using CUDA5.  Introduction to the hardware of GPU-CUDA 6.  Advanced CUDA Programming 7.  Optimization of GPU-CUDA programming 8.  GPU-CUDA application practices

description.zh: 本課程目標為提升學生英文之閱讀能力與聽力。包含增加英文單字數量，科技論文文法、句型、結構等特質，及訓練聽力習慣。
description.en: This course aims to leverage up the ability of English reading and listening for students. It includes vocabulary amount increasing, grammar recognition, sentence style and organization, and listening comprehension.

name.zh: 基礎英文閱讀與字彙(二)
name.en: Basic English Reading and Vocabulary II

description.zh: 本課程著重教導學生閱讀文章，並藉由文章訓練學生字彙建構、語言解析及聽力會話、思維啟發能力。課中延展活動將閱讀內容與聽力、會話、寫作做進一步的連結，並引導學生將所學做有效的應用。
description.en: The course provides students with explicit skills-based instruction in learning how to process, and decipher the readings that serve as springboards for reading skills development, vocabulary building, language analysis, and thought-provoking discussions. The readings include a variety of viewpoints on global topics centered around social issues, the environment, psychology, business, and technology. Extension activities are designed to encourage students to go beyond the reading text, and to put what they acquire from the readings into listening, speaking and writing practices.

description.zh: 透過不同主題的多媒體素材，素材包含電影片段/歌曲/影集片段/線上互動遊戲/演講/線上協作軟體等，藉由不同的活動設計（聽力練習、會話練習、議題討論、口頭報告等）增進學生聽說讀寫的能力。比起純粹只有紙本素材的練習，讓學生可以透過相當於實境互動的情境，而更有學習動機、了解語言運用的情況，以及有較具體的實例以英語討論問題。
description.en: In order to cultivate the students’ comprehensive capabilities to use English, especially the listening comprehension and oral expression ability, different multimedia materials, including movies, songs, TV series, online interactional games, online aiding software, etc., are used to help students understand when and how to use language appropriately in various situations. Different activities (listening practice, role-play, group discussion, and oral presentation) are designed to facilitate students’ English learning.

description.zh: 本課程旨在提高學生的英文閱讀能力及寫作技巧。透過細讀世界短篇英文小說，課程介紹如何分析故事敘述、角色刻畫、 情感刻畫及文學意象等技巧。學生將依課程所學進行口頭報告和短句寫作練習。
description.en: This course aims to improve students’ close reading and writing skills with a selection of world short stories in English. Students will be introduced to techniques of story-telling, characterization, mood-setting, and creation of literary imagery in short stories. Students will be asked to give presentations and short writing assignments in response to the short stories discussed.

name.zh: 中級英文閱讀與字彙(二)
name.en: Intermediate English Reading and Vocabulary II

The readings include a variety of viewpoints on global topics centered around social issues, the environment, psychology, business, and technology. Extension activities are designed to encourage students to go beyond the reading text, and to put what they acquire from the readings into listening, speaking and writing practices.

description.zh: 本課程旨在讓學生掌握觀看的方法和分析的能力，視覺媒介包括繪畫、雕塑、電影和攝影 。學生將學習基本的藝術分析技巧，例如敘述、形式特徵、歷史背景和不同的解讀方法。上課方式包括小組討論，口頭報告和書面作業，以訓練學生的視覺感受能力、分析能力、英語和創造力。如有機會將安排參觀博物館所舉辦之展覽。
description.en: This course aims to equip students with analytical capabilities regarding different genres in visual culture, including paintings, sculpture, film and photography. Students will be introduced to basic skills analytical techniques in a work of arts, including describing, formal features, historical background, and possible interpretations. Through group discussion exercises, presentations, and writing assignments, students’ visual sensibility, English speaking and writing abilities, and creativity will be trained. Visits to museums for appropriate exhibitions may be arranged.

description.zh: 本課主旨在設計課程，提供練習，俾使學生嫻熟各式的英語測驗，如全民英檢、托福測驗、TOEIC 測驗或類似性質的測驗，希冀能夠藉由本課程的修習，提升學生不斷的學習外國語的興致，並且，藉由通過考試取得證照，增加未來職場的競爭力。
description.en: This course is designed to familiarize the students with various kinds of language proficiency tests such as GEPT, TOEFL, TOEIC and many others to the same end. It is our hope that the students who finish taking the course will go on with their enthusiasm on studying foreign languages; besides, through the acquisition of the certificate when the students pass the tests, they are sure to enhance their capability in the increasingly competitive job markets.

description.zh: 本課程旨在透過各類網路媒體以提升學生進階之英語閱讀與聽力能力。教材將取自網路之podcasts、Youtube 影片、TED演講等等，透過這些媒體所提供之各種深入且與時並進之題材，使學生除了可從多元情境中培養批判性之英語閱讀能力與紮實聽力之外，更能進一步以英語為工具，透過不同網路媒體來吸收各領域之新知，拓展學習視野。
description.en: This course aims to enhance students’ advanced English reading and listening abilities through various internet media, such as podcasts and YouTube videos. Using the content- rich learning resources provided by internet media, this course will not only enable students to develop critical reading and listening skills but also help them absorb new knowledge from diverse fields and widen their personal and professional horizons.

description.zh: 本課程以國內外新聞時事為教材，訓練學生從新聞的字彙入門，並藉由增加詞彙量與練習重要句型，使學生進而能閱讀與理解英文新聞。教材將選自報紙/雜誌（如China Post與Taipei Times雙語新聞）或線上新聞（如VOA Special English）中適合初級學生之各類新聞（如政治、經濟、科技、娛樂與時尚新聞等），以有效提升其基本英文閱聽能力。
description.en: This course aims to use latest and current news as teaching materials to help students build their vocabulary, familiarize themselves with basic sentence patterns and eventually develop their comprehension abilities. News reports suitable for basic-level students will be selected from newspapers or news magazines (e.g. bilingual news from China Post and Taipei Times) and online news websites (e.g. VOA Special English) to effectively enhance students’ fundamental reading skills.

description.zh: 本課程係以國外最著名電影、影集片段或是最新預告片為教材，解析影片中之英文單字、俚語、片語以及對話等，使學生能進一步瞭解歐美文化背景。課堂中除了利用電影的多媒體特色來幫助學生練習英文聽力外，也將藉由影片內容的問題討論，訓練學生掌握影片重點和增進口語能力。
description.en: Through various English film resources (e.g. full-length films, film clips and trailers), this course aims at enabling students to (1) improve their vocabulary, (2) learn real and useful English expressions in dialogues and (3) understand Western cultural values and backgrounds. Using the multimedia features of films, this course will help students strengthen their listening skills. Moreover, discussion activities will be arranged to increase students’ comprehension and oral language abilities.

Extension activities are designed to encourage students to go beyond the reading text, and to put what they acquire from the readings into listening, speaking and writing practices.

description.zh: 本課程旨在透過時事新聞，提高學生之英文閱聽能力。教材將取自新聞報紙（如New York Times與 The Guardian）、雜誌（如Times）與網路新聞（如CNN Student News）等。透過對多元主題之新聞英文的解析，讓學生瞭解單字用法、句形結構、特殊術語、慣用俚語等，以提升其閱讀技巧與能力，同時拓展對世界的認識。另外亦藉由播放實際新聞英語內容，並配合聽力技巧的學習，以達成理解能力的提升。
description.en: This course intends to enhance students’ reading and listening abilities by using English news reports selected from newspapers (e.g. New York Times and The Guardian), news magazines (e.g. Times and Newsweek) and online news websites (e.g. CNN Student News). It will help students enrich their vocabulary and acquire key English expressions and sentence patterns used in different realms like politics, arts, entertainment, science & technology, sports, business and health. Additionally, diverse forms of activities will be arranged to enable students to develop effective reading skills. This course is also designed to strengthen students’ listening abilities through the use of video-audio materials from on-line news channels.

description.zh: 本課程旨在提高學生的英文閱讀能力及寫作技巧。透過細讀世界短篇英文小說，課程介紹如何分析故事敘述、角色刻畫、 情感刻畫及文學意象等技巧。學生將依課程所學進行口頭報告和短句寫作練習。
description.en: This course aims to improve students’ close reading and writing skills with a selection of world short stories in English. Students will be introduced to techniques of story-telling, characterization, mood-setting, and creation of literary imagery in short stories. Students will be asked to give presentations and short writing assignments in response to the short stories discussed.

description.zh: 本課程提供學生及職前專業人士必備之英語文語言技巧，強調機電專業領域之英文溝通能力之訓練。課程內容依學院專業內容區分並整合英語文之聽說讀寫之能力為未來全球化移動及以英語專業溝通人才培育為目標。
description.en: This course aims to provide pre-service Mechanical & Electrical Engineering students/professionals with the adequate skills of the English language and communicative competence to facilitate their current academic and future career pursuits. Students are encouraged to utilize their domain expertise to participate in professional communication in English. Centered on the training of professional use of the English language, the ESP curriculum as the crux of a highly-integrated work of domain knowledge and the English learning development embodies the indispensable credentials required for a global profession.

description.zh: 透過不同主題的多媒體素材，素材包含電影片段/歌曲/影集片段/線上互動遊戲/演講/線上協作軟體等，藉由不同的活動設計（聽力練習、會話練習、議題討論、口頭報告等）增進學生聽說讀寫的能力。比起純粹只有紙本素材的練習，讓學生可以透過相當於實境互動的情境，而更有學習動機、了解語言運用的情況，以及有較具體的實例以英語討論問題。
description.en: In order to cultivate the students’ comprehensive capabilities to use English, especially the listening comprehension and oral expression ability, different multimedia materials, including movies, songs, TV series, online interactional games, online aiding software, etc., are used to help students understand when and how to use language appropriately in various situations. Different activities (listening practice, role-play, group discussion, and oral presentation) are designed to facilitate students’ English learning.

name.en: Intermediate Grammar, Writing and Current World Events

description.zh: 本課程將帶領學生學習英文文法、型態、及段落的基本技巧。學生可以運用這些技巧來寫出關於新聞及網路時事的短評。學生在本課程中需要寫出多種英文句型正確的語句以及各種類型的短評，如其他國家、全球化、商業、政治等。學生可以運用這些技巧而獨立寫出任何主題的英文文章。
description.en: In this course students will be introduced to fundamental rules of English grammar, style, and paragraphing; students will apply those skills to short writings about current events in the news and from the internet. The course will require students to write a variety of syntactically sound English sentences and types of paragraphs about other countries, globalism, business, politics, and so on. These skills will then be useful for the student to be able independently to produce English prose on any subject.

description.zh: 本課主旨在設計課程，提供練習，俾使學生嫻熟各式的英語測驗，如全民英檢、托福測驗、TOEIC 測驗或類似性質的測驗，希冀能夠藉由本課程的修習，提升學生不斷的學習外國語的興致，並且，藉由通過考試取得證照，增加未來職場的競爭力。
description.en: This course is designed to familiarize the students with various kinds of language proficiency tests such as GEPT, TOEFL, TOEIC and many others to the same end. It is our hope that the students who finish taking the course will go on with their enthusiasm on studying foreign languages; besides, through the acquisition of the certificate when the students pass the tests, they are sure to enhance their capability in the increasingly competitive job markets.

description.en: This course examines a wide variety of classic and popular English language films in order to help advanced students develop their English and critical thinking skills. description.en: This course aims to engage students in understanding current issues and events taking place in the world that are redefining our global reality and restructuring the world order. A greater goal of such studies of global issues and activities is to urge students to participate in the dialogues and actions to change and to make better of the world. The course content centers on reading, discussing and debating on selected reports and news to uphold all that matters for the aforementioned pursuits.
