description.zh: 1. 程式語言類別介紹 2.物件導向與資料抽象化3.類別與方法 4.訊息﹐實例與初始化 5.繼承 6.靜態與動態繫結 7.多型性 8.發展環境及工具 9. C++ Java Smalltalk 簡介10.應用程式實例介紹
description.en: 1.Programming Language Paradigms  2.Object-Orientation and Data Abstraction  3.Classes and Methods 4.Messages, Instances, and Initialization 5.Inheritance  6.Static and Dynamic Binding7.Polymorphism  8.Environment and Tools  9.Introduction to C++, Java, and Smalltalk 10.Case Study

description.zh: 主要介紹結構陶瓷，生醫陶瓷，複合陶瓷等。
description.en: This course is a special topics of Structural Ceramics.

description.zh: 1.簡介  2.隨機向量之性質  3.假設測試  4.參數分類  5.參數估計 6.非參數密度估計  7.非參數分類和錯誤估計  8.連續參數估計9.特徵抽取線性對應信號表示  10. 特徵抽取線性對應分類11.分群法  12.應用
description.en: 1. Introduction  2.Random vectors and their properties  3.Hypothesis testing   4. Parametric Classifiers  5.Parameter estimation  6.Nonparametric density estimation  7.Nonparametric Classification and error estimation  8.Successive parameter estimation  9.Feature extraction and linear mapping for signal representation  10.Feature extraction and linear mapping for classification 11.Clustering  12.Applications

description.zh: 本課程介紹有關人工智慧理論與應用。課程內容包括人工智慧的歷史、代理人技術、搜尋法則、智識表達、機器學習及感知與辨識等用電腦解決問題的方法。
description.en: This course provides a broad technical introduction of theory and practice of Artificial Intelligence(AI). The topics include:history of AI, agents, search, knowledge representation, machine learning, and oerception and cognition.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。自動化機械設計簡介、自動化機械設計程序、驅動器、感測器、基礎電器控制及電工配線、基礎數位電路設計、氣液壓及電控迴路的邏輯設計法、可程式控制器、監控系統、自動化系統的規劃及評估。
description.en: Automation System Planning & Evaluation, The Process of Automatic Machinery Design, Basic Electric Control & Wiring Basic, Basic Electric Circuit Design, Application of Logic Design method on Pneumatic/ Hydraulic & Electric Circuit, Application of PLC and Industrial Robots, Case Study.

notes: 機械大三合開，需先修過自動化控制元件應用始可加選*

description.zh: 本課程旨在透過時事新聞，提高學生之英文閱聽能力。教材將取自新聞報紙（如New York Times與 The Guardian）、雜誌（如Times）與網路新聞（如CNN Student News）等。透過對多元主題之新聞英文的解析，讓學生瞭解單字用法、句形結構、特殊術語、慣用俚語等，以提升其閱讀技巧與能力，同時拓展對世界的認識。另外亦藉由播放實際新聞英語內容，並配合聽力技巧的學習，以達成理解能力的提升。
description.en: This course intends to enhance students’ reading and listening abilities by using English news reports selected from newspapers (e.g. New York Times and The Guardian), news magazines (e.g. Times and Newsweek) and online news websites (e.g. CNN Student News). It will help students enrich their vocabulary and acquire key English expressions and sentence patterns used in different realms like politics, arts, entertainment, science & technology, sports, business and health. Additionally, diverse forms of activities will be arranged to enable students to develop effective reading skills. This course is also designed to strengthen students’ listening abilities through the use of video-audio materials from on-line news channels.

description.zh: 相圖及相變化熱力學,多元溶液及部份莫耳熱力學。以熱力學分析.設計及電腦模擬冶金方法。
description.en: The thermodynamics of phase diagrams and phase transformations. Solution thermodynamics of multi-compoment and partial molar properties. Applications of thermodynamics to the analysis, design and computer simulation of metallurgical processes.

description.zh: 1. 架構影片後期製作流程2. 電腦動畫及視覺特效於影片後製作階段的應用3. 學習合成與剪接的概念與技巧4. 暸解最新動畫影視特效趨勢及發展5. 培養後期製作專案提案與執行能力
description.en: 1. To construct a post-production project2. To apply animation and visual effects to post-production works3. To develop concepts and skills in compositing and editing4. To understand the trends and development in animation effects5. To develop the ability to propose and execute a post-production project

notes: 限本系生,修課上限70人(不開放外系)

description.zh: 專題演講或書報討論
description.en: In this course, we will invite speakers from the academia, industry and government to lectures on topics in computer science and information engineering.

name.zh: 日本文化產業與地方創生
name.en: The Cultural Industry and Placemaking of Japan

description.zh: 「地方創生」概念源自日本，目前已提升至日本國家戰略的政策層級。在臺灣，?政院宣布2019年為「地方創生元?」，可?地方社區的經營再造亦已成為台灣未來重點發展趨勢。 本課程承接上學期【日本社會與文化】，著重介紹其中的文化產業發展如何進一步應用在地方創生。透過台日之間在地方創生的理論與實踐上的比較，讓學生能有效掌握社會脈動，貢獻所學。
description.en: The concept of “Place Making" originated from Japan and has been promoted to the policy level of Japan's national strategy. In Taiwan, the Executive Yuan announced that 2019 will be the "first year of placemaking," and the innovation of local communities has become a key development trend in the future. This course continues from the previous semester [Japanese society and culture], focusing on how the development of the cultural industry can be further applied to local innovation. By comparing the theory and practice of local creation between Taiwan and Japan, students can effectively grasp the social pulse and contribute what they have learned.

description.zh: 本課程是動態影像發展史與理論的基礎課程，著重觀者經驗。什麼是動態影像呢？這包含電影、影集、串流媒體和其他諸多不同的音像裝置。基於動態影像的多樣形式，本課程將從歷史性的電影文本開始，討論動態影像的轉移過程，最後思考數位媒體既然成為一種新的藝術形式，動態影像又是如何從傳統電影戲院轉向不同的展示空間，如博物館、藝廊和線上網站等。最後，各式影像文本與實驗性影像都將在課堂播放與討論。
description.en: This course will provide an introduction to the history and theory of moving images with a focus on the spectatorship. Moving images have a variety of art forms, such as film, video, streaming media and the other different kinds of audiovisual installations. This course attempts to begin with historical film contexts. Furthermore, the discussion moves to the changing paradigms of moving images, and ends with considering the digital media as a new art form which shifts the moving images from movie theater to the diverse exhibiting, such as museum, gallery and online sites. A variety of cinematic contexts from essays to the selected experimental moving images will be screened and discussed.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的在促進學生進一步瞭解檔案策展與加值應用之概念與方法，並著重於檔案典藏單位及其所典藏檔案之展示規劃及應用。透過本課程之授課內容，學生可培養以下幾個能力：（1）認識檔案策展之基本概念；（2）理解檔案加值應用之原則與倫理；（3）具備檔案評估、規劃及檔案資料應用之專業素養。
description.en: This course will introduce the basic concepts and practical issues in archives curating and value added. And then, focus on the exhibition planning and application of archives and archival material. By attending the class students will: (1) Understand basic concepts and methods of archives curation. (2) Gain in-deep understanding the principles and ethics of archives value added. (3) Possess the archival intelligence to use, evaluate and curate the archival material.

description.zh: 本課程為傳統攝影的影像處理訓練。透過傳統暗房的操作，培養學生對影像品質的概念，可以訓練學生對事物的敏感度，耐心細心。
description.en: This course is a traditional photographic image processing training. Through traditional darkroom operations, training students the concept of image quality, sensitivity to things students can be trained, patient care.

notes: 須修習上學期「攝影美學實踐講座」通過，需至校外服務

description.zh: 了解各種珠寶種類材質、製作技術、製造流程及設備並應用設計的基礎能力,發揮珠寶首飾的設計創意、造形表達；學習珠寶首飾描繪表現技法及基礎製圖法。
description.en: The course is concerned with the design and production of jewellery , siversmithing and related products and is delivered through a programme of lectures and practical design projects in terms of types of materials,techniques ofproduction , and its processes and equipments. Based on the foundation of design skills, the students can practice the techniques of presentation and drawing, and learn how to create new designs of jewellery and its related products.

notes: *城市創藝工場(珠寶教室)；選課人數上限30人

description.zh: 金屬工藝應用是一門以實作應用為主，概念講述為輔的金工課程，透過實際工藝技術進行教學，提供學生具基礎金工器物的製作能力，進而設計應用於生活物件，引導學生具系統性設計及製作能力，轉化概念成實技製作的專業，希望學生藉完成金屬工藝作品，將生活經驗中的價值與意涵融入，創造出屬於個人風格之設計。
description.en: The course ?Metalwork and Design? focuses mainly on practical application, while employing concepts thereof supplementary. The class is taught through demonstration and actual execution of arts and crafts techniques, thus providing students with the basic skills for utensil manufacturing. Followed by designing applicable day-to-day objects, the ultimate goal is to equip students with systematic designing and manufacturing aptitude, hence transmuting concepts into solid expertise. What we desire to achieve is that the students' completed work of art will be a blend of personal significance and practical value derived from everyday experiences.

name.en: The Theory and Practice of the Mind

description.zh: 「心靈的理論與實踐」(The Theory and Practice of the Mind)旨在對人的心理各個層面，從不同的角度進行探討。課程將以理論講授與實際操作交替進行:我們將借重當代學術研究成果，如腦神經科學、心理學、哲學、神經生物學、社會學等等，以增進我們對人自身重要議題的認識。這些議題至少包括:心靈(Mind)、心流(Mental Flow)、情緒(Emotion)、選擇(Choice)、決定(Decision)、感官(Sensations)、直覺(Intuition)、自我分析( Self-Analysis)、單純性(Simplicity)、潛意識(Subconscious)、創新(Novelty)、洞察力(Insight)與意志力 (Willpower)等等。若時間允許，我們將在課上播放相關的科學影片與電影。
description.en: The course investigates several key aspects of human mind from different angles.  To achieve the goal, we shall discuss current topics and issues on the following subjects: Neuroscience, Psychology, Philosophy, Neurobiology, Sociology, etc.  The lecturing shall proceed from reading texts to practicing subjects and methods.  And the topics and issues will include at least: Mind, Mental flow, Emotion, Choice, Decision, Sensations, Intuition, Self-Analysis, Simplicity, Subconscious, Novelty, Insight, and Willpower, etc.  We may watch some relevant scientific films and movies in the class if time allows.

name.en: The introduction and practical works of cultural and creative industry.

description.zh: 本課程希望透過媒體與文創相關產業主管之帶領，訓練修課學生投入文創工作時所具備之眼界與執行力，並利用上學期所學，鼓勵學生試圖設計屬於自己的文創產品概念。除了產業之介紹與培訓課程，我們也注重同學對於新媒體與移動裝置之掌握與運用，建立在數位時代踏入文創產業之不可或缺之素養。
description.en: The students in the class will be conducted and taught by the managers of media, cultural and creative industry to learn the insight and execution in the relative works. We will ask the students to design their own prototypes of cultural and creative product based on the concept and vision they’ve learned last semester. Except the introduction and lecture of the industry, we will also focus on students’ ability of coordination with new media or mobile devices, which are the important accomplishments for cultural and creative industries in digital era.

notes: 大碩合開；產業接軌課程，限15人

description.zh: 歷史想像讓人可以掙脫現實世界，縱橫遨遊於歷史之海。本課程學習相關歷史，培養學生利用本地文化為素材，學習文化相關創作、鑑賞的基礎知識。現代人對影像敏銳度很高，藉由「影視史學」的圖像與影像的引領，使修課同學瞭解各地不同的歷史發展、生活樣貌與思考模式。以活潑的史實，引領同學多面向的思考，理解多元價值的真諦。
description.en: Historical imagination can release us from the bonds and limits of reality by giving us various perspectives of ideas, values and patterns of life over times. Now through the media of film, a powerful recorder of life and events, this course intends to equip students with an ability to appreciate a film as a cultural and historical text so as to seek the presence of historical phenomena and sociological significance. Vivid cases of film evidence will be presented to inspire students to interpret and reevaluate the great historical issues of the times so that they can understand the true essence of many values and foster the capacity of multi-dimensional thinking.

name.en: The Theory and Practice of the Mind

description.zh: 「心靈的理論與實踐」(The Theory and Practice of the Mind)旨在對人的心理各個層面，從不同的角度進行探討。課程將以理論講授與實際操作交替進行:我們將借重當代學術研究成果，如腦神經科學、心理學、哲學、神經生物學、社會學等等，以增進我們對人自身重要議題的認識。這些議題至少包括:心靈(Mind)、心流(Mental Flow)、情緒(Emotion)、選擇(Choice)、決定(Decision)、感官(Sensations)、直覺(Intuition)、自我分析( Self-Analysis)、單純性(Simplicity)、潛意識(Subconscious)、創新(Novelty)、洞察力(Insight)與意志力 (Willpower)等等。若時間允許，我們將在課上播放相關的科學影片與電影。
description.en: The course investigates several key aspects of human mind from different angles.  To achieve the goal, we shall discuss current topics and issues on the following subjects: Neuroscience, Psychology, Philosophy, Neurobiology, Sociology, etc.  The lecturing shall proceed from reading texts to practicing subjects and methods.  And the topics and issues will include at least: Mind, Mental flow, Emotion, Choice, Decision, Sensations, Intuition, Self-Analysis, Simplicity, Subconscious, Novelty, Insight, and Willpower, etc.  We may watch some relevant scientific films and movies in the class if time allows.

description.zh: 本課程探究文化保存的各項議題，包含有形無形文化保存的真實性、文化價值的差異與認定、詮釋與再現；同時透過國內外文化保存的實踐案例的分析與討論，思考未來文化保存的多元發展可能性。
description.en: This course aims to understand the concept of cultural preservation, and the methods of doing cultural preservation by examining different case studies in the world. Different issues related to cultural preservation are also discussed in this course, include the value and authenticity of cultural heritage, the representation and interpretation of culture, and reuse and management of cultural spaces. A creative practice of cultural preservation will be conducted in this course.

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

class.name: 能源光電外國學生專班

name.zh: 數位轉型與創新商業模式
name.en: Digital Transformation and Innovative Business Models

description.zh: 本課程在於協助同學了解數位轉型的浪潮趨勢，以及適應新科技所改變的商業模式。課程將介紹創新的商業模式例如共享經濟、金融科技、線上至離線、使用者生成內容等平台模式應用。每個模式將會連結到實務中企業個案，以協助同學進一步深入了解與分析創新的模式概念。本課程將涵蓋數位轉型與創新模式的基本概念，以數位轉型與科技適應角度，透過實務案例來了解創新商業模式。
description.en: This course aims to help students understand the trend of digital transformation and technology adaption in business models. The innovative business models will be introduced such as sharing economy, FinTech, online-to-offline, user-generated content, and so on. The matched cases will be selected to elaborate and analyze the innovative business models. This course will provide comprehensive knowledge of innovative business models by digital transformation and technology adaption (information and communication technology).

name.zh: 企業數位轉型專題研究
name.en: Research on Digital Transformation of Enterprises

description.zh: 數位時代的快速變遷使得許多高階管理者們對於企業應該如何轉型感到不確定。了解科技、商業模式、消費者行為等趨勢，才能使企業從數位環境中發現機會，定位未來企業的發展方向並尋求合適的方法進行變革，成功進行數位化轉型，將挑戰轉化為商機。本課程將針對企業數位轉型中相關議題如環境發展，數位策略，數位經營模式，製造業與服務業等各產業數位案例，及企業數位化成熟度等作研析。
description.en: The rapid changes in the digital age have made many high-level managers uncertain about how companies should transform. Understanding trends in technology, business models, consumer behavior, etc., enables companies to identify opportunities in the digital environment, position the future direction of the enterprise and seek appropriate ways to transform, successfully transform digitally, and turn challenges into business opportunities.This course will focus on the related issues such as environmental development, digital strategy, digital business model, manufacturing and service industries, and the digital maturity of enterprises.

description.zh: 本課程在培養同學創業的知識與思維，以及了解營運模式如何應用在商業活動裡。本課程包含: 創業精神的想法和行動、從失敗中學習、設計思考、市場測試、機會衡量、營運模式建立、價值主張、永續經營、企業倫理等議題。
description.en: The course is to encourage students to have the ideas of entrepreneurship and to establish the abilities of running a business. This course is focused on: entrepreneurial thought and action, learning from failure、design thinking、opportunity evaluation、market tests、the development of business model、value propositions、network、sustainable and business ethics.

notes: 經管三、四、經管所和創創專區合開

description.zh: 本課程包含：國際經濟環境，文化與政治差異，國際行銷組織，行銷組合決策，及國際行銷資訊系統。
description.en: This course includes international economic environment, culture and political differentiation, international marketing organization, marketing combinational decision, and international marketing information system.

description.zh: 本課程是介紹蛋白質生化學的基本知識、功能、結構及其在生物科技上的應用。
description.en: The aim of this course is to introduce, at a fundamental level, the structures and the functions of proteins and their applications in biotechnology.

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹企業進行國際化策略以及多國籍企業營運與其功能性（價值鏈活動）之議題。期使學生瞭解當代企業國際化營運的重要性與其內涵，並建立整體的概念。同時，藉由精選案例之探討，提供學習者了解企業進行國際化與國際營運管理相關的實務作法。如此，將使學習者得將國企理論與概念運用於實際案例，培養分析能力。
description.en: The course is mainly for the students to understand the importance of international business strategies of MNC (Multi-Nation Company) which includes the business models, value chain and the functionality. In the mean time, the students will have a clear picture of MNC's daily operation by well-selected case study. The ultimate goal is to apply the theory into the real business world and to have an advanced analysis capability at the end of the course.

description.zh: 本課程在培養同學創業的知識與思維，以及了解營運模式如何應用在商業活動裡。本課程包含: 創業精神的想法和行動、從失敗中學習、設計思考、市場測試、機會衡量、營運模式建立、價值主張、永續經營、企業倫理等議題。
description.en: The course is to encourage students to have the ideas of entrepreneurship and to establish the abilities of running a business. This course is focused on: entrepreneurial thought and action, learning from failure、design thinking、opportunity evaluation、market tests、the development of business model、value propositions、network、sustainable and business ethics.

notes: 經管三、四、經管所和創創專區合開

name.en: Special Topic on plastic metal working

description.zh: 塑性加工概論、金屬變形機構、冷作加工、鈑金成形理論、塑性加工產品檢驗、塑性加工機械與模具、個案討論。
description.en: Introduction to plastic metal working, Metal forming mechanism and mechanics, Cold working, Sheet metal forming, Product inspection and quality control, Metal forming machines and tools, and Case study.

notes: 製科所、機電博班和外生班合開,限30人

description.zh: 全球化製造體系的形成，使得合約製造商必須以更積極的態度，從策略面出發，藉由各種電腦與網路的技術，整合內部與外部的流程與資訊，打造數位化工廠。數位化製造的目的，是希望藉由資訊透明化，提升整個製造體系的競爭優勢。課程的設計，是以概念介紹的方式，說明數位製造的應用現況與相關技術。本課程的內容包括：數位化製造概論、數位化製造實例說明、商業模型分析、知識管理、企業知識入口網站、產品資料管理、交易系統、資料倉儲、企業資訊入口網站、工作流程管理、最新數位化相關技術介紹。
description.en: Globalization has lead contract manufactures more active on seeking new strategies to survive. To increase competition, new technologies, such as computer and network technology, have applied. Computer and network technology can integrate internal and external information to establish a so-called "e-factory." This course covers different issues related to e-Manufacturing, such as Concept of e-Manufacturing, Case Study, Business Model Analysis, Knowledge Management, Enterprise Knowledge Portal (EKP), Product Data Management (PDM), Concept of Trading Systems, Concept of Data Warehousing, Enterprise Information Portal (EIP), Workflow Management, State of the Art Technologies, etc.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。技術的關鍵特性和技術之生命週期，企業核心技術、來源和取得，技術的管理與風險，國家科技政策之影響，企業與技術生存之道，全球創新產品之開發，全球創新產品的技術策略與戰略，未來趨勢和走向。
description.en: Technological Innovation: Process, Content, and Types, Organization & Organizing for Innovation, Planning and Discontinuous Innovation, Concurrent Engineering and Interface Management, Human Resource Management, Technology Strategy, Dominant Design, Standard, and Compatibility External R&D and Alliances, Competencies and Knowledge Management in R&D Setting, Design and Product Innovation, Global R&D and Product Development, Industrial Research & Development, Assessment and Performance Appraisal, Perspective.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。    現代製造科技原理，現代製造科技研究方法，個案研究。
description.en: Principles of modern Manufacturing Technology, Research methods on modern    Manufacturing Technology， Case study.

description.zh: 瞭解程式語言所常用之各種資結構，１.抽象資料類別及運算複雜度之概念，２.靜態結構及其儲存法，３.遞迴、堆疊、前序、中序、後序運算式，４.佇列，５.串列、鏈結串列，６.樹、二元樹、平衡樹、堆積，７.圖形，８.排序，９.搜尋、雜湊。
description.en: This course is mainly aimed at introducing the data  structures commonly used in programming languages, including: (1) the concept of ADT (abstract data type) and computational complexity, (2) static structures and their storage representations , (3) recursion, stacks, and prefix, infix, and posfix expressions, (4) queues, (5) lists and linked lists, (6) trees, binary trees, height balanced trees, and heaps,  (7) graphs, (8) soring, and (9) searching and hashing.

description.zh: 1.信號與系統緒論，2.連續時間性系統的分析，3.連續時間性系統狀態變數分析，4.連續時間性系統信號的傅立葉分析，5. Z轉換分析，6.離散時間性系統分析，7.離散時間性系統的狀態變數分析，8.離散時間性信號的傅立葉分析，9.拉普拉斯轉換分析，10.線性系統綜合分析。
description.en: 1.Introductory signals and systems2.Analysis of continuous-time system3.state variable analysis of continuous-time system4.Fourier analysis of continuous-time system5.Z-transform7.Analysis of discrete of discrete-time system8.Fourier analysis of discrete-time system9.Laplace transform

description.zh: 本課程之目標在於介紹人機介面設計過程中所需了解之相關專業知識，俾使學生能在進行互動介面設計中，具備充分之理論基礎，同時了解人機介面設計之相關研究與應用，始其具有能進行人機使用者介面實務製作與企劃之能力。課程內容包含介面設計概念模式、介面使用性、人機介面設計程序、使用者需求、介面原型設計、介面設計原則以及使用者測試與評估等。教學將以課堂講授、個案研討以及實作等方式進行，並以報告繳交與課堂發表及作品為評量依據。
description.en: This course is focused on introducing the knowledge for human-computer interaction (HCI) design. Students can understand the basic knowledge, application and research relevant to HCI design, which make them to be capable of practical interface design and planning. This course is set up under the structure of Human-Machine-Scenario theory and case study. The contents include concept model of interface design, interface usability, HCI process, user requirements, interface prototyping, principles of interface design and user testing. The course is preceded by means of lecturing, case study and practical work, and evaluated by students' reports, oral presentation and desi

notes: 使用進修部排課教室,限30人,日職合開

description.zh: 此課程將介紹各種近代材料分析技術，特別著重於表面分析上。修課後，學生將了解各種技術的基本原理並可選擇適當的方法去作樣品影像表面以及材料分析，同時可比較各方法優缺以及其限制。課程討論之技術主要基於樣品與光子或電子之間的交互作用。
description.en: The aim of the course is to introduce modern techniques for materials characterization, especially on surface characterization. After completing the course, the students would be able to understand and choose appropriate instrumentation for imaging and materials analysis by comparing the performance and limitation of different methods for a given situation. Techniques involved in photon and electron interactions with matter would be discussed in this course.

description.zh: 翻譯各式文體風格之文章，賞析名家之譯作，涵括文學、科學、教育、商業等領域作品，並佐以特殊表現法及修辭法之認識及練習。
description.en: This course aims at an appreciation of various styles of translated works in such fields as literature, education, science & technology, commerce. so as to equip students with a deep insight into the usage of rhetoric and expression for particular purpose.

description.zh: 翻譯各式文體風格之文章，賞析名家之譯作，涵括文學、科學、教育、商業等領域作品，並佐以特殊表現法及修辭法之認識及練習。
description.en: This course aims at an appreciation of various styles of translated works in such fields as literature, education, science & technology, commerce. so as to equip students with a deep insight into the usage of rhetoric and expression for particular purpose.

description.zh: 本課程以逐步口譯為主﹐深入模擬商務訪談﹐會議溝通﹐外賓接待至國際會議主持﹐隨行口譯﹐各式談判之概論與實例解說。課程注重模擬﹐演練及禮儀文化的涵養，以期訓練學生語言應對的能力及良好風度的表現。
description.en: This course focuses on Consecutive Interpretation. It simulates a commercial meeting and communication, visitors reception, international conference hosting and escort interpretation. In addition, it includes a general theory of different negotiations and examples. The course concentrates on simulation, practicum and courtesy cultivation. We expect to build up students' dialogue ability and manners.

name.en: Skills and Practicum of Escorting English

description.zh: 本課程提供在各種場合中口譯的應用。如伴隨工廠參觀，出席展覽會場，開幕演說，及外賓接待，採取密集的口語演練，並訓練隨行解說的技巧。
description.en: This course provides an application of Interpretation for different occasions. These situations include a factory visit, an exhibition presentation, an opening address, a foreign-visitors reception and a banquet attendance. This course aims to build up the techniques and cultivation of Escort Interpretation through intensive oral training.

description.zh: 本課程之目標為增進研究生之英文表達能力。
description.en: Objective of this course is to improve oral presentation ability.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

description.zh: 汽車底盤概論與實習，包含車體、傳動、剎車、轉向及懸吊系統以及定期保養。
description.en: Introduction and Practice of Automotive Chassis including Body, Transmission System, Braking System, Steering System, Suspension System, Tire Balance and Wheel Alignment, and Routine Chassis Tune-Up.

name.en: Automobile Electrical and Electronic Equipment Engineering and Practice

description.zh: 汽車電系概論與實習，包含起動、充電、點火、燈光、儀表、雨刷、電腦控制及空調系統。
description.en: Introduction and Practice of Automotive Electrical and Electronic Equipment including Starting System, Charging system, Ignition System, Lighting System, Dashboard, Windshield Wiper, Computer Control System, and Air Condition System.

description.zh: 室內氣候、室外氣候、熱環境、空氣環境－汙染物、換新與通風、音環境、人體舒適度、室內空氣品質控制、潔淨室之規劃設計。
description.en: Indoor and outside air conditions, thermal environment, air pollutants, fresh air and ventilation, noise level, human confort, indoor air quality control, design of clean room.

description.zh: 本課程使學生對燃料電池的基本原理、關鍵技術、以及商品化發展與應用過程，有所瞭解並加以分析及探討。燃料電池是一種電化學的發電裝置，其運作原理係利用電化學反應將燃料內之化學能直接轉換為電能，因其在能量轉換過程中並不經過熱機過程，因此能量轉換效率較高。本課程之授課綱要可分為以下幾項：燃料電池簡介、燃料電池之效率、質子交換膜燃料電池、磷酸燃料電池、鹼性燃料電池、直接甲醇燃料電池、固態氧化物燃料電池、燃料電池的燃料供應、燃料電池之計算實例。
description.en: This course enables students to fully understand the basic principles of the fuel cell, key technologies, and the commercialization of the development and the application process, and to analyze and discuss the design of fuel cell system.Fuel cell is an electrochemical power generating device. It can directly convert the chemical energy of fuel into the electrical energy via the electrochemical reaction. Because it does not go through the process of thermal engine in the energy conversion process, and therefore a higher energy conversion efficiency. Teaching outlines of the course can be divided into the followings:Introduction to fuel cell, Fuel cell efficiency, Proton exchange membrane fuel cell, Phosphoric acid fuel cell, Alkaline fuel cell, Direct methanol fuel cell, Solid oxide fuel cell, Fueling fuel cell, Calculation example of fuel cell.

description.zh: 熱傳學主要內容是研究由於溫度梯度所造成能量傳遞之一門學問﹐為一般冷凍、空調、食品冷藏及各類型熱交換器設計之基本知識程,其他大如各類發電廠，小如電腦微晶片散熱亦有密切關係。本課程之安排以奠定學生在熱傳方面之智能，作為未來進入冷凍、空調與能源相關學門之踏腳石。
description.en: 1.	熱傳導定律之推導2.	一維及多維的穩態與暫態熱傳分析，3.	散熱片之設計，利用數值方法解熱傳導問題，4.	對流原理之推導5.	強迫對流方面的分析及應用-層流邊界層，管道內層流熱傳6.	自然對流方面的分析及應用-管道外與封閉空間內自然對流        熱傳7.	紊流的基本性，紊流邊界層，管道內紊流8.	具相變化的熱對流:凝結與沸騰9.	熱交換器設計介紹Advanced Heat Transfer  Credit: 3 Course Outline1.	Derivation of heat conduction principles 2.	One and multi-dimentional steady and transient heat         conduction analysis3.	Heat transfer from extended surfaces, numerical heat         conduction analysis4.	Derivation of convection principles 5.	Forced convection - laminar boundary layers and     laminar heat transfer in ducts6.	Nature convection over external surfaces and in internal enclosures 7.	Fundamentals of turbulence, turbulent boundary layers, turbulent flow in ducts8.	Heat transfer with phase change: boiling and condensation9.	Introduction to heat-exchanger design

description.zh: 自動化應用基礎，自動化規劃設計︰1. 個體冷凍設備2. 冷凍系統運轉操作3. 冷凍倉儲管理自動化4. 低溫冷凍應用自動化
description.en: Fundamentals and design of automation applications include:1. Unitary refrigeration equipment.2. Refrigerating system operation.3. Refrigerated warehousing management.4. Low temperature refrigeration application.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。量測原理及訊號處理的一般方法（含放大電路、動態響應及頻譜分析），說明各種感測器之原理、規格、結構圖、應用的場合及其訊號處理（含速度、位移、加速度、力量、扭矩、功率、壓力、流量、溫度、化學組成、濕度、濃度、照度、電流、電壓、磁通量、磁場強度、各型感測開關等），感測器與電腦之連線。
description.en: Measurement Principles, General Methods for Signal Processing (Amplified Circuits, Dynamic Response, and Frequency spectrum Analysis), Discussion of Principle, Specification, Structure, Occasion and Location of Application of a Variety of Sensors for Measuring Physical Quantities,such as Displacement, Velocity, Acceleration, Force, Torque, Power,Pressure, Flow Rate, Temperature, Chemical Composition, Humidity,Density, Luminosity, Current, Voltage, Magnetic Flux, Magnetic Intensity , a Variety of Sensing Switch, etc.

description.zh: 本課程著重介紹電腦輔助製造技術的概念與實作。內容包括NC基本概念，一般機械零件之NC與APT程式製作，複雜曲面零件之NC程式製作，CAM系統實習，群組技術電腦輔助製程規劃，電腦輔助製程規劃系統實習，電腦輔助生產規劃。
description.en: This course has been prepared for the comprehensive of Computer-aided manufacturing, with emphasis on the essentials of CNC technology and programming. Through the projects practice, the students are able to adept to the techniques of CAM.

notes: 張延光老師；選課人數上限40人；設計301/城市創藝工場

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意本課程介紹有限元素分析法基本原理及其在各種工程問題上之應用。1. 有限元素分析法之基本觀念2. 利用變分原理建立有限元素模式3. 形狀函數及等參數元素4. 一維問題:桿、桁架、樑及骨架等5. 二維問題:平面應力應變及板殼問題。6. 三維問題:一般實體7. 有限元素分析之計算機程式處理8. 有限元素分析於動態問題之應用9. 相關有限元素分析套裝軟體簡介
description.en: To introduce the basic principle of the finite element analysis and its application in solving various types of engineering problems.1. Introduction to the basic concepts of the finite element analysis2. Formulation of the finite models through the use of variational principles3. Shape functions and isoparametric elements4. One dimensional problems: rod, truss, beam, frame, etc.5. Two dimensional problems: plane stress, plane strain and plate, etc.6. Three dimensional problems: typical solids7. Implementation of the FEM computation by computer8. Finite element applications in dynamic problems9. Survey of some finite-element software systems

notes: 限25人/製科所必選課程之一*

description.zh: 先修課程：精實製造工程。介紹最新精實製造系統和實務工具，主題包括： 1.精實製造系統概論 2.價值溪流分析 3.快速更換 4.使用點 5.源流品質 6.團隊 7.全員生產維護 8.後拉式/及時/看板生產系統 9.單元小組製造
description.en: Introduction to modern issues in lean manufacturing systems and practice of lean tools. Topics include overview of lean manufacturing systems, value stream analysis, quick changeover (QCO), point of use storage (POU), quality at the source, teams, total productive maintenance, pull/just-in-time/Kanban, and cellular manufacturing.

notes: 限25人/製科所必選之一/機電、製科、機械博及外生

description.zh: 基礎知識與定義、大氣汙染、空氣汙染物、水文循環、水質處理、水汙染、固體廢棄物、大地汙染、噪音汙染、工業廢氣處理。
description.en: Basics and definitions, atmospheric and land pollutions, air pollurants, hydrology, water pollution and treatment, solid waste, noise pollution, industrial exhaust air treatment.

description.zh: 本課程的重點在於闡述統計學之基本概念，主要的內容涵蓋三個領域：敘述統計、機率理論與推論統計，其中包含概念介紹、敘述統計、機率理論、推論統計。另有統計學的應用領域於推論未知的情況以作為相關決策之依據，並包含統計軟體使用介紹。
description.en: The purpose of Statistics is to give students an introductory of statistical thinking, methods development and the assessment of credibility and value of inferences made from data.  A conceptual introduction to the field of statistics and its many applications with extensive coverage of data collection and analysis as needed to evaluate the reported results of statistical students and make a good decision will be included as well. The statistical software introduction will also be introduced in the class.

notes: 限重補修學生修讀，修課時須經授課老師同意

description.zh: 浪漫主義通常被視為是革命時期中的一個段落。浪漫主義之興起與美國獨立戰爭、法國大革命，以及工業革命發生於同一時期。浪漫主義者同時透過改變對於性別、種族、及階級之觀點來認識並重新定義文學中的自我。課程將引導學生閱讀各類在此種改變的氛圍下所出版的文學作品，並選讀早期的著作，後提供學生對照文本輔助研讀
description.en: Romanticism is often hailed as a period of revolution.  Coinciding with the American Revolution, the French Revolution, and the Industrial Revolution, the Romantics were also recognizing and redefining the literary self through changing perspectives on gender, race, and class.  We will read a survey of literature produced in this atmosphere of change as well as writings from earlier periods selected to provide contrast for our inquiry.

description.zh: 於2009年，ASTM定義了積層製造，並將此積層製造分成七大類型，本課程將對它進行光機電原理說明，並以積層製造系統的應用及系統的研發為主要授課方向。
description.en: ASTM Committee F42 on Additive Manufacturing Technologies was formed in 2009. The myriad process names into seven standardized terms. In this course, the principle of the additive manufacturing technology in terms of its opto-electro-mechanical-system will be discussed. The application and the system development of additive manufacturing are the major topics of this course.

notes: 限20人/機電、製科、機電博及機械外生合開/3D列印

description.zh: 本課程教導及訓練研究生有關英文在管理領域內特定專題的溝通運用，學生將在本課程中以英文學習: (1)管理常見之專有名詞，(2)英語備忘錄的草擬與撰寫，(3)會議資料如：議程、動議、記錄等的準備與撰寫，(4)企業計劃書的編寫，及(5)現代化全球管理相關專題英文資料的閱讀與溝通討論。學生必須在課堂上就選定的管理題材以英文做報告與其它同學討論。
description.en: This course teaches students the communication in English on the special topics within the context of management. Students are expected to learn the followings in English: (1) Terminologies commonly used in management; (2) Draft and write-up of English memorandum; (3) Development of meeting materials such as agenda, motions, minutes, etc.; (4) Business proposals and plans; and (6) Contemporary topics and trend in global management issues. Students will be required to make group presentations and discussions on the selected management topics in English.

description.zh: 本課程包含下列課題1.空氣清淨機構理論。2.無塵室構造、建造及確效。3.空氣過濾理論。4.無塵室設計專案。5.	論文研讀。
description.en: This course covers the following Topics.1.Theory of air cleaning Mechanism.2.Clean room configuration, construction and         verification.3.Air filtration theory.4.Paper discussion.

notes: 能源所、自動外生和能源車輛外生班合開

description.zh: 本科目將由認識地球上太陽能之基本熱輻射理論，結合各種不同形式之太陽能源有效利用裝置，討論太陽能之有效利用方式及相關系統技術。以期在既有太陽能利用技術上，發揮更有效率的太陽能源工程系統設計，奠定未來21世紀太陽能源利用之高效率化基礎。
description.en: The aim of this course is to discuss three individual topics of more specialized nature: large PV systems, photo-voltaic under concentrated sunlight and the hydrogen economy. After completing this course the students should be able to:1. Understand the specific features of large PV systems, an    examine their economic and technical characteristics.2. Explain the advantages and disadvantages of concentrator    PV systems, and discuss their operation.3. Analyze the structure of the hydrogen economic and show    its feasibility and future   potential.

description.zh: 自動化機械設計、驅動器及感測器、自動化機構合成及應用、數位電路設計及應用、氣液壓及電控回路之邏輯設計、監控系統、自動化系統之規化及評估。
description.en: Automated Machinery Design, Actuators and sensors, Automatic mechanism synthesis and applications, Logic design of pneumatic, Hydraulic and electronic control loop, Monitor and control system, automation system, Planning evaluation.

description.en: The course will introduce the principle of display panel and let students to know the industry dynamics. The students can get preliminary knowledge of the display panel industry with less time by the teaching from industrial mentor and the practice at factory.  In addition, the students will also learn how to produce various LC devices and measure the electro-optical properties or practically apply of these produce devices.  Thus, the students will become a junior talent of display panel market after training of this course.

description.en: This course includes the propagation of light, the vectorial nature of light, coherence and interference, multiple-beam interference, diffraction, optics of solids, thermal radiation and light quanta, optical spectra, and ray optics.

name.zh: 高科技產業專利佈局與專利策略
name.en: Patent Strategy and Patent Portfolio of High Technology Industry

description.zh: 高科技產業的專利攻防已變成產業策略之一，越來越多的訴訟案件逼使廠商進行專利迴避設計。事實上台灣的產業界對於迴避設計、專利策略與專利佈局理論上並不陌生，但在實務上卻很少實際執行，所以每年仍然付出數十億美金的權利金。本課程將從專利申請策略開始，告訴同學專利申請上常見的錯誤，如何以較低的成本取得、維護我國專利，並利用我國專利進行全球專利佈局。
description.en: Patent litigation, either initiation or defense, has become one of the high-tech industrial strategies, and more and more patent suit cases have forced the manufacturers to undertake patent design around. In fact, the industrial fields in Taiwan, theoretically, do not feel strange on design around and patent strategies. However, in practice, they perform much less. That is the reason why Taiwan still has to pay more than five billion US dollars each year for royalty. This course will start from patent filing strategy, getting patent claims well known, then following with introduction on orientation of patent strategies, and providing theory and practice on patent strategies. The outline of this course is given as follows: Patent claim interpretation; Process of patent infringement analysis; Requirements of patent design around; Patent strategy analysis; Practice on patent strategies; and Study on patent cases.

name.zh: 臺灣傳統建築彩繪修復與預防性維
name.en: Taiwan Traditional Architecture Painting Restoration and Preventive Maintenance

description.zh: 與西方學院派的美術相比，傳統建築工藝之美學在台灣較被忽略，西方雕塑與繪畫有它構成的原則，台灣傳統建築工藝亦是構築一套屬於自身的審美觀點。以台灣繪畫教育為例，大部分的課程偏向西式教學如素描、水彩、油畫，它們追求是立體感，達到寫實效果。而東方水墨繪畫或書法教育則偏少，它們講求線條系統，而屬於工藝美術的「傳統建築工藝」區塊更是沒有太多著墨，以致傳統工藝「美學」有流失的現象。　　本課程將設計三種彩繪形式有「木構插角圖稿彩繪」、「木構螭龍窗圖稿彩繪」、「古蹟樑枋彩繪仿作」，前兩者為彩繪於雕刻材上的呈現，後者為包含圖案設計與水墨繪畫的樑枋彩繪，三種不同樣式彩繪使學員能體驗彩繪施作上的各式要點。本課程將以「木構插角圖稿彩繪」、「木構螭龍窗圖稿彩繪」兩種彩繪形式為，進行彩繪課程教授。本堂課將以「台灣傳統建築彩繪」為主題，介紹台灣傳統彩繪源流、匠派、技法，以達到欣賞台灣傳統彩繪之目的，並以實際操作模式，模擬彩繪工作現場之現況，了解彩繪施工技巧與步驟。
description.en: Compared with western academic art, the aesthetics of traditional architectural craftsmanship is neglected in Taiwan. Western sculpture and painting have their constituent principles. Traditional Taiwanese architectural craftsmanship also builds a set of own aesthetic viewpoints. Taking Taiwan's painting education as an example, most of the courses are oriented towards Western-style teaching such as drawing, watercolor, and oil painting. Their pursuit is three-dimensional and realistic. Oriental ink painting or calligraphy education is less. They focus on the line system, and the "traditional building crafts" section of the arts and crafts does not have too much ink, so that the "aesthetics" of traditional crafts are lost.This course will design three kinds of painting styles: "artwork drawing of wooden frame corners", "artwork drawing of wooden structure windows", "painting imitation of ancient beams", the former two are renderings on carved materials. name.zh: 臺灣傳統吉祥圖騰意涵
name.en: Meaning of traditional auspicious totems in Taiwan

description.zh: 吉祥圖在台灣民居空間之呈現，分佈於各構件上，亦為中國人吉祥圖案的濃縮。古代建築裝飾圖案屬民俗吉祥文化範疇花樣繁多，內容豐富，分布在古建築的多個重要部位。古建築裝飾的原則是：建築必有圖，有圖必有意，有意必吉祥。可滿足人們心理祈求安全與審美的層次需求與讓實質的物質生活與心靈的精神結合為一。透過教學，使學生了解傳統建築吉祥圖騰意涵，並實地進行田野調查工作。本課程預計使修課人員具備以下能力：1.	具有對歷史人文思考、觀察、體知之能力2.	具有對「文獻經典」理性體悟之能力3.	具有對歷史圖像、藝術圖像反思與品評之能力4.	具有史料蒐集、解讀、組織與寫作之能力
description.en: The auspicious picture is displayed in Taiwan's residential space, distributed on various components, and is also a condensed of the auspicious pattern of the Chinese. The decorative patterns of ancient buildings belong to the folk and auspicious cultural category, with a variety of patterns and rich contents, which are distributed in many important parts of ancient buildings. The principle of ancient building decoration is: the building must have a picture, the picture must be intentional, and the intention must be auspicious. It can meet people's psychological needs for safety and aesthetics, and integrate the material life and the spirit of the soul into one. Through teaching, students are made aware of the meaning of traditional architectural auspicious totems and conduct field investigations on the spot.This course is expected to equip students with the following abilities:1. We will ask the students to design their own prototypes of cultural and creative product based on the concept and vision they’ve learned last semester. Except the introduction and lecture of the industry, we will also focus on students’ ability of coordination with new media or mobile devices, which are the important accomplishments for cultural and creative industries in digital era.

It may include introduction to basic statistical concepts, one-factor, two-factor, multi-factor experiments, completely randomized design, randomized block design, Latin square, and orthogonal array, Taguchi technique for quality engineering.

description.en: This course will introduce the fundamental of computer programming design. Student will learn the capability of programming design using script language and basic programming language. This course will also provide the knowledge and methods for students to realize and analyze specific problem independently. So that they can using computer program to solve the problems.

Topics covered including: three dimensional parts modeling, calculation and analysis during design process, manufacturing experiment and analysis, software programming, communication network, simulation of manufacturing process, motion control, intelligent manufacturing process control and optimization, computer integrated manufacturing system.

description.zh: 課程大綱規劃主要依據上述的四部份分別進行授課，包含固態氧化物燃料電池之原理應用及檢測、潔淨能源技術、變頻式高效率交流液體技術與生質能及敏化染料太陽能技術，分別敘述如下：  1.潔淨能源技術能源概論，非再生能源與再生能源的利用能源的有效變換，未來能源的  發展形態有效能源之解析與評估，能源效率之管理。本課程主要是探討燃料電池的製程技術與發展。   a. 燃料電池製程技術介紹(Introduction)    b. 電池效率與開路電壓(Efficiency and Open Circuit Voltage)    c. 操作燃料與電壓(Operational Fuel and Voltage)    d. 中子交換薄膜燃料電池(Proton Exchange Membrane Fuel Cells)    e. 鹼性電解質燃料電池(Alkaline Electrolyte Fuel Cells)    f. 甲烷燃料電池(Direct Methanol Fuel Cells)    g. 中溫與高溫燃料電池(Medium and High Temperature Fuel Cells)   h. 燃料電池之燃料添加(Fuelling Fuel Cells)    i. 壓縮機、透平機、葉扇與?浦(Compressors, Turbines, Ejectors, Fans,   Blowers, and Pumps)    j. 燃料電池之動力輸送(Delivering Fuel Cell Power)    k. 燃料電池之系統分析(Fuel Cell Systems Analyzed)
description.en: This course clean energy covers the fundamentals and applications of fuel cell, solar cell and biomass energy. The fundamentals are introductory of the energy source principle and transfer mechanism of fuel cell, solar cell and biomass energy. The design and production technologies of the clean energy are introduced and discussed. The examples or other topics of clean energy applications and procedures as well as specifications of the testing are usually regardant in this introductory course.

notes: 電子三、四甲乙和電子所合開

description.en: Nonlinear phenomena, Effects of parameters, Simulations and analyses, Case study.

description.zh: 修習內容包含：核能科技演進對人類的啟發、核能與輻射、輻射線與物質之互應作用、核能基本理論、核能應用與核能發電原理、以及核反應器原理。
description.en: The contents of this course consists of: the evolution of the nuclear technology, nuclear energy and radiations, interactions of radiation with matters, basic nuclear theory, nuclear applications and the basic working mechanisms of the nuclear power generation, and nuclear reactor theory.

notes: 機械系大四和機電所合開

name.zh: 雷射醫學的基礎與臨床應用

description.zh: 雷射乃20世紀三大發明之一，醫用雷射更已廣泛地應用在各個醫學領域。本課程將涵蓋的範圍包括：1. 雷射基本原理；2. 雷射安全標準；3. 雷射與組織的作用關係；4. 雷射在醫學的各種應用；5. 雷射於牙周病的應用；6. 雷射於口腔外科的應用；7. 雷射應用於牙齒美白；8. 低能量雷射的各種應用；9. 雷射實機操作與臨床示範。
description.en: The laser is one of the three major items invented in 20th century.  Medical laser applications have been widely used in many fields.  This lecture will cover: 1. Laser Physics; 2. Safety Standards; 3. Laser-Tissue-Interaction; 4. Laser in Medical Applications; 5. Laser in Periodontology; 6. Laser in Oral Surgery; 7. Laser Assisted Bleaching; 8. Low Level Laser Therapy; 9. Practical Hands-on and Live Patient Demonstration.

name.zh: 繞射光學原理與應用含實習
name.en: Theory and Application of Diffractive Optics with Lab practice

description.zh: 本課程的目的是研究如何利用繞射現象設計光學元件來實現各種光學功能。繞射光學元件可以應用在改良光學系統的像差，為特定的波長實現聚光、分光等功能以取代傳統的光學透鏡、分光鏡等，此外利用傅光原理製作出傳統的光學元件無法實現的功能，在近代的光學系統、尤其是微光學系統佔有極重要的地位。主要課程內容為：光學繞射原理、傅氏光學概論和繞射光學應用、繞射光學元件之設計方法、繞射光學元件之製作、繞射光學應用。
description.en: This course is designed to introduce the principle of diffraction of optical wave and study the means of using the diffraction to perform specified functionalities in modern optical systems. Diffractive optical element (DOE) can be applied to correct aberrations, light focusing, light splitting, and other novel functions that traditional optical components difficultly or impossibly perform. DOE plays an important role in modern optical technology. The content of this course includes: Principle of optical diffraction, Fourier optics, design methods of DOE, applications of DOEs, and implementation of DOEs.

notes: Pre-course: "Fourier Optics"光電所和電資外生班合開

description.zh: 面臨我國高齡化社會的趨勢下，老人與環境的議題急待重視。在觀察老人與環境互動的過程中，需將老人的生活空間經驗置入於生活變遷、社會關係及文化脈絡的向度中來討論。本課程是綜合心理學、心理學、社會學、建築與都市規劃等多面向學科來探討老人的身心特性及老年生活環境之需求。
description.en: Facing a trend toward the aging society, the issue about the elderly and environment is supposed to be valued. In view of the process of the elderly and environment interaction , this research puts the living space experience of Taiwan elderly into the living transition, social relation and culture context for sector consideration. It is a complexity course integrated with Psychology, Physiology, Sociology, Architecture and Urban planning in order to study the characters of physiological and psychological of the elderly and the need of living environment.

notes: 日職建都所與設計博合開

name.en: Disaster prevention plans of cultural heritage

description.zh: 我國古蹟與歷史建築之文化遺產防災計畫實施現況，至今因欠缺有系統之調查研究，因此難以了解問題點所在。此外台灣現有之古蹟與歷史建築多為日治時期所遺留下來，而日本至今已有相當多具有良好防災計畫之古蹟與歷史建築案例，應可作為我國相關研究參考，但國內對此課題亦缺少有系統之調查。本課程的授課內容如下：1.概論 2.文化遺產防災之重要性3.文化遺產防災之基本策略4. 文化遺產防災之進行方式5.文化遺產之災害種類與對策。
description.en: Due to the lack of systematic research work carried out in Taiwan, it is difficult to find out the problems of the current disaster prevention plans for the cultural heritage. Taiwan has many existing vestiges and relics from Japanese colonial period at the moment. Despite the fact that there are numerous excellent examples of disaster prevention plans in Japan for us to consult and to research, little systematic work regarded the subject can be found in the literature in our own country. The course content about followings: 1. Introduction2. Importance of disaster prevention of cultural heritage3. Disaster prevention plans of cultural heritage 4. Approach of disaster prevention plans of cultural heritage5. Type of cultural heritage disaster and guideline

description.zh: 討論有機化學與環境、浮選及再生技術等方面有關的部份。主要在使用到的有機化學藥劑，如介面活性劑。
description.en: The organic chemicals, such as surfactants, which are used for environmental, floatation, and recycle techniques will be discussed in this course.

class.name: 能源光電外國學生專班

description.zh: 行銷活動是管理業務的核心，它提供了與客戶進行交互的重點，並且是有關客戶、競爭對手和整個業務環境的情報來源。行銷管理關注公司與客戶的長期關係，以及短期銷售活動。成功的行銷人員可以為客戶創造並提供卓越的價值。本課程目的是：（1）使學生了解行銷作為一個管理挑戰在公司中的作用和重要性；（2）從概念、理論、實踐和分析的角度使學生熟悉與行銷相關的知識；（3）幫助學生發展組織有效的行銷策略和活動所需的技能；（4）使學生提高團隊合作解決問題、案例和項目的能力。
description.en: Marketing activity is at the core of managing a business; it provides the focus for interfacing with customers and is the source of intelligence about customers, competitors, and the business environment in general. Marketing management is concerned with the long-term relationships of the firm with its customers as well as short-term sales activity. The purpose of this course is to (1) familiarize students with marketing related knowledge from conceptual, theoretical, practical and analytical perspectives; (2) provide students an understanding of the role and importance of marketing in a firm as a managerial challenge; (3) help students developing skills required in organizing effective marketing strategies and activities; and (4) enable students to improve the ability of working out problems, cases and projects as a team.

description.zh: 本課程涵蓋了基於各種檢測模式(如化學修飾、電化學、光學與半導體科技)的化學與生醫感測器的基礎知識以及利用電子元件感測生理訊號。 主題包括感測原理、常見的化學感測器、生物感測器、選擇策略、元件設計以及醫療保健、環境監測和工業等領域的應用。課程安排除了感測器文獻之相關課堂討論之外，也會安排學者講座。學生參加所有講座和參加課堂討論是課程的必修部分。
description.en: This course covers the fundamentals of chemical sensors and biosensors based on chemical modifications, electrochemistry, spectroscopy, semiconductor technologies, and physiological electrical signal measurements. Topics include sensing principles, commonly used sensors, strategies for achieving selectivity and adequate limits of detection, design of devices, and applications in health care, environmental monitoring, industry, and military areas. Articles from the current literature are discussed. We will also invite researchers to introduce current research. Active student participation is expected as an integral part of the course.

notes: 限25人(大學部);化工三四和化工所合開

name.en: Design and Analysis of Computer Algorithms

Computational Complexity   4.1 Information-theoretic arguments   4.2 Adversary arguments   4.3 Linear reduction of problems   4.4 NP-completeness

name.zh: 動畫電影中的中世紀文化
name.en: Knights, Monsters, Castles and Other Things Medieval in Hollywood Movies and Japanese Anime

description.zh: 廣義上，中世紀時期可被定義為由羅馬帝國的衰落開始並持續至十五世紀文藝復興。中古世紀被文藝復興時期的人們視為一段缺乏啟蒙、知識及現代化的黑暗時期。然而許多黑暗時期的故事--如亞瑟王與圓桌武士、聖杯、龍和公主—卻一直以現代書籍及電影的方式流傳至今。本課程將探討弔詭的現代中世紀現象，亦即現代西方如何以多樣的手段去詮釋、改寫或紀念中古世紀，使得這種千年前的文化在現代重生。本課程同時也將討論日本動畫家及漫畫家是如何以動漫的方式將西方中世紀故事及元素巧妙的融合進現代日本流行文化。
description.en: The Medieval Period can be defined broadly as that period from the fall of the Roman Empire to the 15th century Italian Renaissance – a dark time, if one is to believe the men of the Renaissance, in need of light, knowledge, modernization. Yet the stories of these dark ages – of Arthur and his knights, the Holy Grail, dragons and princesses – continue to be retold and enjoyed in modern books and films. This course will examine the paradoxical phenomenon of modern medievalism, looking at the varied ways the modern West has borrowed, celebrated, and rewritten its medieval past, a culture strangely as alive now as it was a thousand years ago. We will consider, too, how western medieval stories and images are also being cleverly adapted and transformed in modern Japanese pop culture by anime and manga artists.

name.zh: 智慧製造執行系統演練
name.en: Practice of Intelligent Manufacturing Execution System

description.zh: 製造執行系統(MES)在產品從工單發出到成品產出的過程中，扮演生產活動最佳化的資訊傳遞者。MES運用即時、準確的資訊，指導、執行、回應並記錄工廠活動，從而能夠對條件的變化做出迅速的回應、減少無附加價值的活動、提高工廠運作過程的效率。MES不但可以改善設備投資報酬率，而且有助於及時交貨、加快庫存周轉、提高收益和現金流的績效，MES在企業和供應鏈間，以雙向交互的形式提供生產活動的基礎資訊。本課程將介紹MES概念及基本功能，並透過模擬與實作來讓學生了解MES之特性。
description.en: Manufacturing Execution System (MES) is the major information exchange portal of product records from order releasing to shipping. With real time data, MES allocates, implements, and responses to fulfill the production plans rapidly and at the same time improves the resource utilization by limiting non-value added activities. The benefit of using MES includes better performance in equipment ROI, on-time delivery, inventory turn-over rate, and hence higher revenue and cash-flow. Data collected by MES is served as the communication venue within the supply chain. This course focuses on the concept and basic functions of MES through simulation sections and practical cases.

notes: 工管大三合開,限20人輔導考證照

name.en: Practice in electrical engineering technology patent application

description.zh: 本課程將以案例研討為討論基礎，準備實際電機技術(元件、電路、方法)之專利申請案，讓同學模擬實際申請專利的過程，首先是進行專利檢索與分析，討論專利佈局的策略；接著讓同學進行專利說明書(含申請專利範圍)撰寫實習，模擬實際上申請各國專利之程序，然後討論專利申請後的答辯、領證繳費及後續維護事宜。
description.en: In this course, we will focus on the practice of the patent application in   electrical engineering technology. Students will learn how to do patent search and analysis, write specification/drawings/claims, and reply office action responses. In addition, the practical aspects of international patent application are presented. The patent filing and maintenance strategies will be also discussed in this class.

notes: 電四甲乙丙合開,和智財所合開

name.en: The Principles and Applications of Machine Vision

description.zh: 機器視覺檢測乃結合光學設備 ` 影像處理 ` 與電腦輔助計算處理 , 藉由擷取受測物影像之特徵進行後續各種應用(如檢測 ` 辯識等)。 為確保機器視覺應用之精確度及速度,受測物影像必須依用途進行不同前處理以突顯特徵 , 後以不同之演算法則判斷之擷取特徵是否符合應用要求。 機器視覺近年來大量使用於各產業,除提昇製造業之產品品質外,對人身安全認證之生物科技亦功不可沒 。
description.en: Machine vision has been extensively used in inspection and biometrics in recent years. This course provides the fundamentals and practical applications of machine vision for graduate students. Increasing the knowledge and capability in machine vision for a well-trained industrial engineer is the final goal of this course.

notes: 工管大四和工管碩合開,限30人,時間調整為(四)567上課

name.en: Introduction to optical electromechanical system and manufacturing technology

description.zh: 高階光學鏡頭是目前探索太空、發展醫療及曝光設備極為重要的關鍵技術，此技術可應用到生活各項領域，包括：拍照攝影、星空宇宙探索、智慧監控及商用鏡頭(望遠鏡、相機和顯微鏡)等。本課程主要授課內容針對工程背景學生跨領域選修，以瞭解奈米級精度系統設計、製造、檢測、組裝及驗證。為使學習效果顯著成效，除了以講授方式闡述重要基礎觀念外，選修學生將實際製作產品及最終上台報告，使課程學以致用為本課程最大宗旨。
description.en: High-end optical lenses are leading edge technology for the medicine, semiconductor, mobile phone, surveillance, machine vision, and space industry. This course will teach students how to design optical systems, transform those designs into real optical components, and test them. All the selected students in this course are required to report their results on the stage in the final examination.

notes: 部份週次整天在工廠加工,光電所和IEECS合開

Evaluation Index of intelligent building8.Planning, design, and case studies of intelligent building

name.zh: 創意城市與城市規劃專論
name.en: Special Topics on Creative City and City Planning

description.zh: 目前全世界超過一半以上的人口生活在城市，人數仍快速增加中，相伴而來的環境、經濟、社會與治理問題將如何處理？因此城市轉型是城市要繼續成長的必要過程，許多案例顯示創意城市是城市轉型的典範，可以作為城市轉型與再生的契機。創意城市是近年來先進國家鼓勵領導者、產業、市民從己身城市內思考、規劃、發揮創意與實現城市創新的觀念，以啟發城市找到自身的發展潛能，結合當地文化資產及地方特色，經由城市發展規劃提升創意經濟及城市的競爭力。本課程以文化創意、產業創新及城市規劃為主軸，包括研究創意城市定義、特徵、條件、構成、指標、類型、評估的基礎，進而探討與文化創意、產業創新、城市發展規劃的關連，並參考國內外城市的創新與再生案例，他們是如何在城市議題上思考、規劃與執行富有創意的行動，又如何將行動運用於城市規劃。課程經由互動分析創意城市與城市規劃的關連及作法，討論可供借鏡的發展策略與方案。
description.en: The creative city is crucial to urban transformation in the future of our city. It means to encourage leaders,industries, and citizens to think, plan, create and realize urban innovation, inspired by the city to find their own development potential, combined with local cultural assets and characteristics, to enhance the creative economy through urban development planning and the city's competitiveness. The course aims at framing cultural creativity, industrial innovation and urban planning as main thoughts on the basis of research. Literature review including definition, characteristics, conditions, indicators, types of assessment, and then to explore with the cases of innovation and regeneration around the world. How they think urban issues, planning and implementation on creative actions, and how the actions used in urban planning.Courses via interactive analysis among the creative city,urban planning and practices,to figure out development strategies and programs available to learn.

notes: 日職建都所與設計博合開

description.zh: 本課程主要教授在建築上之節約能源設計之理念、技術、法規及案例分析等，授課內容包含：1. 建築節約能源導論2. 建築能源對策3. 建築外殼節能設計4. 建築空調節能設計5. 建築採光與照明節能設計6. ENVLOAD之應用7. 綠建築之發展8. 節能案例解說與分析9. 相關法令解說
description.en: This course is focus on the concept technique law and case study about Energy Conservation Design of Architecture .It major content includes :1. Introduction about Architecture's Energy Conservation.2. Impact of Architecture's Energy Conservation.3. Envelope Design of Architecture's Energy Conservation.4. Air Conditional Design of Architecture's Energy Conservation.5. Lighting and Illumination of Architecture's Energy Conservation.6. Application of Envelope Design.7. Development of Green Architecture.8. Illustration and Analysis of Case study.9. Relative Law and Regulations.

name.zh: 當代城市中都市社會基礎設施再思
name.en: Rethinking urban social infrastructure in contemporary cities

description.zh: 由於九零年代後，城市急速擴張與超越領域性(de-terrorization)的連結等新興狀態萌生，基礎設施(infrastructure)的定義逐漸開始難以精確認定，而身為城市興衰論述的經常主體，基礎設施自身的論述與再定義卻在空間學門中成為那缺落的一塊。基於此，本課程期望透過幾項特定學門角度，提供一個對於基礎設施為研究主題的論述框架，進而連結建築學門與相關空間學門間對於當代全球城市論述中之縫隙，能在跨學門田野研究中提出他種可能性(alternatives)。 本課程將以兩種方項進行基礎設施當代性的"實踐"; 部分課程內容將邀請德國杜賓根大學台灣研究中心，以空間社會學角度提供授課交流。另一部分將透過雙邊學生，以共同主題進行台北與德國城市的實際田野調查並以比較分析的方式進行合作討論。課程架構則以建築學與空間社會學為主軸剖析，分為五個部分:全球城市與多尺度論述，當代基礎設施與建築/地景對話，社會基礎設施的物質性與再生產，看不見的基礎設施與田野調查為總結。預計學生能透過不同學門角度的切入、於不同文化背景學生間合作討論、多種教學方式的引導，培養基礎辯證思考之能力並進一步對當代都市基礎設施的空間性研究之興趣。
description.en: In the contemporary word, especially in globalized cities, infrastructure is hard to define for many reasons and at some points infrastructure is also often invisible to its users.This class will therefore seek to rethink the subject of infrastructure from particular perspectives which frame the structure of this module. We then proposed a join-class with Taiwan study centre at University of T?bingen, Germany for wider debates and teaching possibilities as well. There will be two academic discourses-Architecture and sociology involved and formed into five sessions which can be seen in course syllabus. In so doing, it will focus on firstly by reading theory; secondly, by examining specific case studies that illustrates how these theories manifests themselves; and thirdly, by considering how these infrastructures may be changing the understanding of contemporary globalized cities and reproducing urban networks in different fields and countries.

description.zh: 1.	營建組織介紹2.	營建工程概述   3.	預算與成本控制與管理   4.	進度控制與管理5.	施工計劃6.	工程發包與估算作業7.	物料與機具管理8.	合約與規範管理9.	安全衛生管理10.	品質管理
description.en: 1.	Introduction of the construction organization   2.	Introduction of the operation in the construction site  3.	Budget and cost control management   4.	Budget and cost control management5.	Planning of construction engineer project6.	Purchase and Estimate 7.	Material and Equipment control management8.	Contract and specification management9.	Safety and sanitation management10.	Quality control management

description.zh: 本課程係以時間為軸，將台灣建築區分為七個文化期，依次概略介紹各文化期建築的一般特徵：(1) 臺灣建築史學史、分期及資料體系、(2) 史前建築：舊石器時代與新石器時代的建築、(3) 南島族群的建築：高山族的建築、(4) 南島族群的建築：平埔族的建築、(5) 荷西建築、(6) 漢式建築、(7) 清末洋式建築、(8) 日式建築、(9) 現代建築。
description.en: This course is based on historical development of architectures, actually Taiwan have seven cultural times, this course will introduce every topical of architectures, as followers：historical studies of Taiwan Architectures, early historical architecture, architectures of high mountain peoples, architectures of lower mountain peoples, architectures from Nederland and Spain, architectures from China, architectures from Europe, Japanese architectures, and modern architectures.

notes: 日職建都所與設計博合開

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Paper Presentation of special topics on education, giving lectures, and group meeting.

description.zh: 認識英文學術論文的語法、文體、結構組織等特質，並探討英文報告及論文撰寫方式。
description.en: This course helps the learners recognize the syntax, style, and organization as far as the papers on English writings are concerned.

description.zh: 完整且有系統的介紹產品設計實務的工作內容，從規劃設立、執行、管理、協調及最終之提案，針對實務及就業準備，邀請產業主管或負責人講授，並配合工廠及設計工作室參觀，以培養其專業知識及技能，進而了解就業市場概況及應具備之專業知識及技能。
description.en: The overall and systematic introduction of activities in a product design case, from planning, execution, management, coordination and final presentation. For career -prep, this class invites directors from renowned product manufacturers and product design studios to lecture design practice and vocational preparation. The course might also organize field trips to allow participants to experience future design environment.

notes: 需修過產品開發課程；選課人數上限20人；產業接軌課程

description.zh: 本課程將帶領學生學習英文文法、型態、及段落的基本技巧。學生可以運用這些技巧在電影短評寫作上。學生在本課程中需要寫出多種英文句型正確的語句以及關於電影場景、腳色、主題等的短評。學生可以運用這些技巧而獨立寫出任何主題的英文文章。
description.en: In this course students will be introduced to fundamental rules of English grammar, style, and paragraphing; students will apply those skills to short writings about movies. The course will require students to write a variety of syntactically sound English sentences and types of paragraphs about movie plots, characters, themes, and so on. These skills will then be useful for the student to be able independently to produce English prose on any subject.

name.zh: 全球議題與趨勢討論(二)
name.en: Discussions on Global Issues and Trends II

description.zh: 本課程欲讓應用英文系學生了解改變社會結構之全球議題與趨勢。特此希望學生在參與討論的過程中，能夠產出對世界有正面效益之改善之道。課堂限制之關係，課程內容將著重於閱讀、答辯，和研討篩選後之報告及新聞，藉以達到上述之目的。
description.en: This course aims to engage English major students in understanding current issues and events taking place in the world that are redefining our global reality and restructuring the world order. A greater goal of such studies of global issues and activities is to urge students to participate in the dialogues and actions to change and to make better of the world.  The course content centers on reading, discussing and debating on selected reports and news to uphold all that matters for the aforementioned pursuits.

description.zh: 你熱愛文學嗎?你對社會及社會影響世界的方式好不好奇?你想不想探索社會政治事件表面背後的意涵?你喜不喜愛語言? 你是否會對許多故事的力量和神奇之處著迷?如果你的答案是否定的，透過這門課程，你會發現文學提供了既有價值又發人深省的社會觀點。反之，如果你熱愛文學，並且早已深受文學語言的吸引，你在這門課程裡將可從文學間接獲取豐富的生活經驗，進而學會如何理解世界。具體而言，藉由探索文學和社會的互動關係，透過研究社會如何促成文學的產生、賦之予脈絡，並加以型塑，以及文學如何反映、影響、塑造、及改變社會，你將會瞭解文學及語言的力量，更重要的是能在所處之世界裡變得安然自在。我們可能研讀的作品包括，但不限於，Things Fall Apart, Anthills of the Savannah, Uncle Tom’s Cabin, 1984, Extremely Loud and Incredibly Close等書。
description.en: Do you have a passion for literature? Are you curious about society and the way it influences the world around us? Would you like to explore the facade of sociopolitical events? Do you love language and are you fascinated by the power and magic of stories? If not, you will nevertheless learn in this course that literature provides a valuable and inspiring perspective on society. On the other hand, if you have already had a strong passion for literature and if you are already fascinated by literary language, you will learn in this course how to make sense of your world by enriching your vicarious experiences of it through literature. Specifically, by exploring the interaction between literature and society, by studying not only how society gives rise to, contextualizes, and molds literature, but also how literature mirrors, influences, shapes, and changes society, you will realize the power of literature and language and, more importantly, become at home in the world. The texts we will

name.en: Introduction to Theory and Applications in Wind Engineering

description.zh: 風工程是一個跨領域的學科，屬於研究所課程，適合已有良好工程力學以及流體力學基礎的學生選修。然而為了推廣我國工程師及土木系大學生了解此門學問，本課程設計為大四及研究所學生選修的先導型課程。本課程內容涵蓋大氣邊界層、鈍體空氣動力學以及空氣彈力學的基礎知識，進而闡述建築物耐風設計以及橋梁耐風設計的概念，配合我國以及國際上常用之耐風設計規範作為解說及練習，輔助學生對於風工程有一定的認識。其他如空氣污染擴散、通風節能減熱、計算流體力學應用等與風相關的主題，亦在本課程提出概略性的介紹以及發展現況。
description.en: Wind Engineering is a cross-disciplinary subject that belongs to the institute course and is suitable for students who have a good background in engineering mechanics and fluid mechanics. However, in order to promote the knowledge of Wind Engineering to engineers and civil engineering students, this course is designed as the precursor courses selected by seniors and graduate students. This course covers the basic knowledge of atmospheric boundary layer, bluff body aerodynamics and air-elasticity, and then expounds the wind-resistant design of buildings and the concept of wind-resistant design of bridges. It is used as an explanation and practice with the wind-resistant design codes commonly used internationally. Students have a certain understanding of wind engineering. Other wind-related topics such as air pollution diffusion, ventilation energy conservation and heat reduction, computational fluid dynamics applications, etc., also provide a brief introduction and development status in

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。授課內容包括著作、商標、專利、營業秘密法，兢業禁止，跳槽與保密及智慧財產權管理之法律與實務，並以概論、個案研究及專題創作方式深入討論。
description.en: Including law and practical management of writings, trademark, patent, business secret and intellectual property rights, and it also offers deeper discussion by way of summary, designated subject or case study.

description.zh: 針對學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: This course provides the students opportunity to discuss after reading the management related journals. The goal is to improve students' research capabilities.

name.en: Examination Guidelines for Patent and Utility Model (II)

description.zh: 本課程下學期亦以智慧財產局頒布之「專利審查基準」為藍本，先介紹專利申請之特殊分割程序與改請程序，再就專利申請之「實體審查」部分依序說明先申請原則、發明單一性、優先權、說明書及圖式之補充與修正、更正、以及分割改請。
description.en: This course will be based on the "Patent Examination Guidelines" issued by the Taiwan Intellectual Property Office, and introduces the special procedure for patent division application and patent conversion application according to the principle of "formality before substantive examination". Then, in the "substantive examination" section, topics such as the first-to-file rule, unity of invention, the priority of a patent application, amendments of description, claims and drawings,  division of a patent and conversion of a patent will be sequentially discussed.

name.en: Practice in electrical engineering technology patent application

description.zh: 本課程將以案例研討為討論基礎，準備實際電機技術(元件、電路、方法)之專利申請案，讓同學模擬實際申請專利的過程，首先是進行專利檢索與分析，討論專利佈局的策略；接著讓同學進行專利說明書(含申請專利範圍)撰寫實習，模擬實際上申請各國專利之程序，然後討論之後專利答辯、領證繳費及後續維護事宜。
description.en: In this course, we will focus on the practices of the patent application in   electrical engineering technology. Students will learn how to do patent search and analysis, write specification/drawings/claims, and reply office action responses. In addition, the practical aspects of international patent application are presented. The patent filing and maintenance strategies will be also discussed in class.

notes: 電機大四和智財所合開

description.zh: 法學概論，顧名思義是在介紹法律原理，以啟發學生法學研究的興趣。然而，法學涵蓋的層面甚廣，法學緒論的課程，只能大略介紹各種法律的共通原理，就繁駁的法律現象，作綜合的引說，俾使初學法律的人，不僅能粗知「實定法」的共通原則，還可藉此原則來培養法律見解和修養，執簡馭繁，因而體會法律的性質、內涵和理念。有關本課程的教授方式，擬先介紹法律的基概念及原理，並以答問之方式訓練學生邏輯反思的能力，同時輔以日常屢見之法律實例問題。如此，學生不僅可以可以學習正確的法律觀念和知識，並可培養縝密思辨的能力，將課堂上所習得的知識應用落實在日常生活中，以達保障並維護自己及他人權益之目的。
description.en: Introduction of Law is to introduce the theory of law and to promote students' interest to study law. Since the field of law is very broad but the time is limited, this course can briefly explain common principles of law, complex phenomena of law, etc. The main purpose of this course is to let students catch the concept of common principles of "lex scripta."  Also, this course aims to promote students' knowledge about law, thus cultivating their spirit of abiding by law.  This course will introduce the basic concept and theory of law first. Then students will be given logical training through discussion.  Besides, the general cases and problems of law will be covered as well. Through this course, students can not only get correct concepts of law, but learn to protect their/others' right.

description.zh: 生命科學概論，重心放在人體生命科學，並強化醫學的角色。此外，中西醫結合的觀點，詮釋抗老、防癌。以身心靈養生的方式，強化預防醫學。並從人類疾病的本源性病因，根本探討。當然，如何增強免疫力，袪除自由基是主軸。在探究人體潛能、身心靈養生或疾病的本源性原因時，都必須重視「經絡」系統。總之生命是非常奧妙的，不僅只物質面，更要重視心靈層面，中西醫整合方向，必是廿一世紀的主流。
description.en: This course focuses on human life science and emphasizes the roles of medicine on improving the life quality of human beings. It also uses the point of view of integration traditional Chinese and western medicine to interpret how to prevent the aging of body and occurrence of cancers. This course also focuses on how to keep the body, mind and spirit in the best conditon in order to prevent the occurrence of human diseases. In addition, it deeply discusses the eseential etiology of human disease and teaches audiences how to enhance the body immunity and how to get rid of free radicals. The importance of meridian system of the human body and its relationships to human potentiality, body, mind spirit and diseses are also discussed. Life is marvelous. The completeness of life depends on the saisfaction of not only the material but also menetal and spiritual needs. Integration of the traditional Chinese and western medicine to improve the life quality of human beings is the main issue.

description.zh: 本課程目的在建立大學生以自身專業，在社區社會責任實踐中的身體力行；藉由對原住民部落社區議題盤點，研擬對策，並在與部落族人溝通後，擬定包括：社會計畫、設施設計、營造計畫、執行措施等階段工作內容，之後親自著手進行計畫實踐。以利於培養學生博雅的品格、並體會專業社會服務的情操與體驗，開拓生命視野。
description.en: The purpose of this course is, to provide students to practice the social responsibility based on their expertise and to develop sentiments through these social services for aboriginal tribes. By means of inventory on issues in tribes, the social plan, facility plan, construction plan and executive plan would be drafted, and communicated with people, then be fulfilled by students themselves.

notes: 建築三、四與職建都所合開，修習課程需至校外服務

description.zh: 本課程主要目的在於介紹個體經濟學理論及其相關應用，課程內容涵蓋主題包括：消費者行為與決策、不確定性與資訊不對稱、外部性與公共財、廠商行為與決策、產業型態與市場結構、生產要素市場、賽局理論、一般均衡與經濟效率、以及其他個體經濟的相關議題。
description.en: The objective of this course is to introduce the main methods of systematic economic reasoning. It provides a rigorous treatment of microeconomic theory and its applications. Topics covered in the course will include the theories of consumer behavior; the economics of uncertainty and information; the economics of the public sector; firm behavior and the organization of industry; the economics of labor markets; game theory; and selected topics in general equilibrium and welfare economics.

description.zh: 本課程目的在充實學生深度的景觀認知和景觀規劃設計實務的能力，主要講授當代景觀設計觀和相關課題，以及設計實務；並配合講授課程進行設計練習操作景觀設計的相關方法和技術，如環境調查、分析、細部設計等。主要分兩部份：一、景觀設計觀和相關課題1.當代景觀設計理論2.環境藝術與景觀3.都市、鄉村環境與景觀4.生態設計和工法5.棲地生態、保育和經營管理二、設計實習1.環境調查和分析2.景觀材料和構造3.景觀細部設計和設計系統4.景觀設計圖繪製
description.en: The final semester of the landscape course is combined of lecture and practice parts. The aim is to enhance the deeper understanding in landscape and to apply design theories by doing practice as a primary training for landscape design. The lecture part contains landscape design thinking and relevant issues, such as contemporary design theories, environmental art and landscape, urban and rural landscape, ecological design and practice, and habitat ecology, conservation and management.The practice part is carried out by doing fieldwork, survey and analysis, using proper materials and construction, practicing detail design, design system and working drawings.

description.zh: 本課程介紹成本會計基本概念與運作系統，以及材料、人工與製造費用如何設帳與控制，並應用於管理層面，以提高生產效率，分析成本並降低成本。
description.en: Cost Accounting provide information needed by management to planning and controlling the production cost, increase efficiency and reduce cost, then make more profit.Cost Accounting covers three major topic areas:1.	cost concept2.	cost accounting system3.	cost analysis and cost control

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹在計算機科學中常見或基本的資料結構,探討的主題包括: ADT(抽像資料型態)及複雜度, 靜態結構與儲存表示, 陣列，堆疊，佇列，串列，樹狀結構，遞迴，排序, 搜尋。
description.en: This course is mainly aimed at introducing the data structures commonly used in programming languages which include ADT (abstract data type) and complexity, static structures and their storage representations, arrays, stacks, queues, linked lists, trees, recursion, sorting, and searching.

description.zh: 資訊安全導論為資訊安全之基礎課程，其主要目的是讓初接觸資訊安全領域的學生能夠瞭解什麼是資訊安全，並且能夠對於資訊安全有更正確認知。課程規劃如下：資訊安全介紹,基礎密碼學介紹,電腦病毒與惡意程式,網路安全與攻擊,網路安全防護,應用層安全, 網頁安全,雲端安全,物聯網安全,個人資料保護
description.en: Introduction to Information Security is a fundamental course. The main objective of this course is to enable students in the field of information security to understand what information security is and to have a better understanding of information security. The course describes as follows: Information security introduction, Basic cryptography, Network security and attacks, Network security protection, Application security, Web security, Cloud security, Internet of Things security, Personal data protection

description.zh: 法學概論，顧名思義是在介紹法律原理，以啟發學生法學研究的興趣。然而，法學涵蓋的層面甚廣，法學緒論的課程，只能大略介紹各種法律的共通原理，就繁駁的法律現象，作綜合的引說，俾使初學法律的人，不僅能粗知「實定法」的共通原則，還可藉此原則來培養法律見解和修養，執簡馭繁，因而體會法律的性質、內涵和理念。有關本課程的教授方式，擬先介紹法律的基概念及原理，並以答問之方式訓練學生邏輯反思的能力，同時輔以日常屢見之法律實例問題。如此，學生不僅可以可以學習正確的法律觀念和知識，並可培養縝密思辨的能力，將課堂上所習得的知識應用落實在日常生活中，以達保障並維護自己及他人權益之目的。
description.en: Introduction of Law is to introduce the theory of law and to promote students' interest to study law. Since the field of law is very broad but the time is limited, this course can briefly explain common principles of law, complex phenomena of law, etc. The main purpose of this course is to let students catch the concept of common principles of "lex scripta."  Also, this course aims to promote students' knowledge about law, thus cultivating their spirit of abiding by law.  This course will introduce the basic concept and theory of law first. Then students will be given logical training through discussion.  Besides, the general cases and problems of law will be covered as well. Through this course, students can not only get correct concepts of law, but learn to protect their/others' right.

description.zh: 新經濟與舊經濟的分野不是在有『e』還是沒有『e』，而是在有『i』還是沒有『i』，而『i』就是『Innovation，創新』。二十一世紀的『腦力經濟』最重要的戲規則就是『智慧財產權』，同時也是WTO會員國必須遵守的重要規範之一。課程內容主要包括三個最基本的智慧財產權課題：專利權，商標權，以及著作權；而為配合本校學生學科背景，本課程將較著重於『專利』方面的實務知識，並且講授『如何激發創意，以培養學生日後能好好應用『智慧財產權』的保護。
description.en: The difference between New-economy and Old-economy is not caused by having "e" or not having "e", but caused by owining "i" or not owning "i". where "I" means "Innovation:.  Intellectual Property is not only the most importance business rule of the :Brain economy era:, but also one of the most important agreements among WTO members.  This course includes the basic three subjects of Intellectual Property:Patent, Trademark, and Copyright.  In order to accommodate the learning background for most of NTUT students, the contents of this course will focus more on the practical practice of the Patennt.  In addition, it also includes the subject of "how to activate your creativeness:so as to make students can use what they learn, "Intellectual Property:, to protect their intellectual work.

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹中華民國憲法、探討憲政體制的運作、人民權利義務的規範及相關法律的適用等問題。期能使學生認知國家民主法治的實施狀況，維護社會秩序與個人基本權利，進而體現人性尊嚴的價值。
description.en: This course focuses the discussions on the Constitution of the Republic of China,constitutional mechanism, the rights and obligations for the people and legitimate operations of the society. It is our hope that the students may have a better understanding on how the democracy is performed in our country as well as on how to preserve social security and basic human rights of the individuals-with the realization of human dignity as our extreme goal.
