Vocal music 3. Instrumental music 4. Ritual music 5. Dance music 6. Theatre music

description.zh: 面對科技發展日新月異，社會急驟變遷的新世紀，只習得專業上的一技之長，已不足以和協圓滿地實踐有意義的人生。有鑑於此，乃以生涯發展與生涯諮商的理論與研究為基礎，配合學生的發展，希翼能透過教育的歷程，使學生的專業知識能和未來的工作與生活規劃，產生有意義的聯結，進而為學生提供一個短程與長程的生涯發展與選擇的準備與指引。授課內容包括生涯理念介紹、興趣、性格、價值觀探索，生涯決定因素，生涯技巧，生涯角色調適，生涯選擇與規劃技巧，生涯訪談，生涯高原調適，轉型期調適，性別、職業歧視，雙生涯家庭，就業準備等主要生涯課題的研討與習作。
description.en: In face of a new century with continuous scientific development and rapid social changes, to learn one single professional skill is not enough to fulfill a meaningful life in a harmonic and satisfactory manner. In view of this, based on the theory and research of career development and consultation in association with the development of students,  it is hoped to produce a meaningful linking between their professional knowledge and job and life planning through the course of eucation, and further to provide them a preparation and guide for short and long-range career development and choice. The contents of the course include the discussion and exercise related to major career topics such as introduction to the concept of career, the discussion of interest, character and value, decisive factors of career, skills of career, role adjustment in career, career choice and planning skill, career interview, uphill adjustment in career, adjustment in transit period, sex and occupation.

description.zh: 人類社會中的經濟活動愈來愈錯綜，人與人之間的經濟關係也愈來愈複雜，但無非都是為求經濟問題的解決。如何將有限的資源在諸多可行的途徑中，選擇最有利、最能發揮滿足人們慾望的效果，乃是身為「經濟人」的萬物之靈所努力的目標。本課程提供學習者分析經濟現象的工具，掌握經濟發展的脈動，以便在現代經濟社會中立於不敗之地。
description.en: In human society economic activity is getting more and more complicated and economic relationship between people is also getting more and more complicated but all are to seek for the solution of economic problems. Among a number feasible ways how to choose the best way that can make best use of limited resources to satisfy people's desire shall be the goal for human being as "economic persons" making effort to fulfill. The course enables students to learn the tools for the analysis of economic situation, the way of grasping the wave of economic development in Taiwan so as to win in the modern economic society.

description.zh: 資訊法律課程將讓同學了解網路資訊社會中各層面的相關法律議題。本課程內容著重於各種網路法律問題，例如資訊安全、網路契約的訂定、網域名稱、數位化著作權、商標權，隱私權以及電腦犯罪種類及防治的介紹。另外，本課程也以個案方式，敘述電腦資訊的相關法律問題，並從中了解虛擬世界與現實世界的法律規範，同時測試自己是否具備足夠的資訊法律知識，能夠在快速變遷的資訊社會中立足與發展。
description.en: The course of Information Laws is designed for the students to familiarize such legal issues in most of the aspects available in the current world as information security, internet contracts, domain names, digital copy rights, trademark ownership, individual privacy and the genre & prevention in relation to computers. In addition, we discuss individual cases to further understand the nature of legal issues concerning computerized information. Hopefully, we learn the legal disciplines existent in the virtual and real worlds; besides, the students are supposed to equip themselves with sufficient legal knowledge so that they can survive and thus keep growing in the ever-changing information society.

description.zh: 二十一世紀是中國人的世紀，全球最多的人口，第三大的土地，與台灣如此的近，政治、經濟、軍事、文化發展對台灣均有一定的影響。統一？台獨？無論如何，身為今日在台灣的知識份子，應對它有所瞭解。課程內容包括：中國共產黨的建立與發展、政制體制、教育科學文化發展、經濟展望、國防軍事建設、兩岸關係等。
description.en: This course is designed lets our students have a comprehensive understanding of the Mainland China. Introduced the developing history of Chinese Communism Party ; the organization of political ; the status of economics ; the development of science &　eductaion;the military construction; the policy of one country two systems;and the relationship of two - sides of straits ---。

description.zh: 藥膳在中醫理論指導下，將中草藥與實務相配合，運用傳統烹調技術和現代加工方法製成味、色、形俱佳的、更有保健和治療作用作之食品，其內容廣泛，迄今已有三千年之歷史。所謂藥食同源更是集中而深刻的體現了藥膳之重要性。本課程共分：湯膳概論、穀物湯膳、蔬菜湯膳、果品湯膳、畜肉湯膳、海鮮湯膳、藥草湯膳和美容養生湯膳等。
description.en: The Applied Nutrition of Life is two credit hours course and design especially for technology students. This curriculum emphasizes on the clinical applications and action mechanisms of various food cooking of Chinese drugs. The curriculum trends will start from more details and bring a completely concepts. The subjects include some Chinese food cooking contain Chinese herbal and some skill to how to select a good quality Chinese herbal.

description.zh: 〝人從哪裏來？人是什麼？人會往何處去〞修習生物哲學的目的﹐便是要回答上述三個問題。凡是對上述問題有興趣的人?便應該了解生物哲學的理論及其架構。大多數的生物學家同意?是天擇說引導出進化論﹔但是﹐也有人相信創造論或是心智設計?。二者的爭論是什麼？究竟哪一個陣營講的才是對的﹖何以是對的﹖接下來﹐將探討當代進化論的一些議題。例如﹕何以生物學很少有它自己的定律﹖我們還將探討天擇的項目﹑適應論﹐及系統論等等的問題。最後﹐我們將弄清楚進化論對人的概念。有沒有一種普遍的人性﹖假如進化論是對的﹐利他主義是否就不可能存在﹖
description.en: "Where have we come from?  Who are we?  Where are we going?"  The goal of studying philosophy of biology is to answer these questions.  So anyone interested in such questions needs to understand both the theories and the structure of this subject.  Most biologists agree that evolution is driven by natural selection, but there also exists a vocal and growing group of creationists and intelligent-design theorists.  What exactly is the debate between the two sides about?  Who's right and why?  Then we will move on to more specific issues about modern evolutionary theory.  For example:  Biology seems to have few if any laws of its own.  Why is that?  Also, questions concerning the units of selection, adaptationism, and systematics, etc.  Finally, we will get clear on what evolutionary theory means for our conception of ourselves.  Is there an essential human nature that we all share?  If evolution is right, does that mean we are incapable of genuine altruism?

description.zh: 現代人對圖像與影像十分熟悉，對世界各地的歷史卻可能很陌生。本課程將藉由圖像與影像的引領，使修課者瞭解世界各地不同的歷史發展、生活樣貌與思考模式。活潑而多面向的思考與多元價值，是創意之能源源不絕的根本，藉由影像呈現出不同文化、思考與生活方式，協助學生跳脫單一思考與僵化的價值觀。另一方面，學習相關歷史，將可培養學生日後利用本地素材進行相關圖像創作的基礎知識，激發各式文化創作的創意。
description.en: This course will help students learn about the historical development, lifestyles, and patterns of thought in different cultures of the world with the aid of visual images in photos or films, static or animated. Powerful, vigorous and multidimensional thinking is definitely the key to the endless source of creativity. The use of images can facilitate the cultivation of such thinking ability by bringing up the multiple phases of world cultures, lifestyles and ways of thinking, thereby freeing students from one-dimensional and narrow-minded viewpoint. Once they gain a comprehensive understanding and insights of world history, hopefully they will be actively inspired to create brilliant works of visual art based on local materials in Taiwan.

name.en: Appreciation of Dream Literary in Pre - Qin Dynasty

description.zh: 夢作為人的潛意識活動，由於它的奇幻性與不可把握性，使夢本身充滿了神秘感。而夢境在許多方面與文學審美有相似之處，夢境與文學都是人類精神活動的產物，夢境的虛幻性、模糊性與詩歌的朦朧性、含蓄性異曲同工，夢也是真實地反映人的感情與意識活動。《晉書‧藝術列傳》序云：「丘明首唱敘妖夢以垂文。」，可見《左傳》作為後世夢文學創作的代表性。由在這些或詳或略的敘述中反映出春秋時期政治軍事鬥爭的各方面和諸侯士大夫豐富的內心世界，其夢境描寫想像奇特豐富，變幻迷離，具有高度的文學價值，對後世的文學創作影響很大。本課程的設計在於，希望透過帶領學生閱讀、欣賞《左傳》中幾則與「夢」有關的選文，除了讓學生對「夢」的形成有所認識以外，也能對「夢」在自古以來的文化中所形成的特有現象，及「夢」在文學上所呈現的樣貌與運作形式，以及「夢」在現實人生中所產生的影響有所瞭解，同時也能欣賞《左傳》對夢境描寫的美學特徵及對後世文學創作所產生的影響。期盼能藉此給予學生在美學與科學領域的知識洗禮。
description.en: Dream as human subconscious activity, due to its nature and can not grasp fantasy, making the dream itself is steeped in mystery. And dreams in many ways there are similarities with literary aesthetic, dreams and literary activities are a product of the human spirit, dreams unreal, fuzziness and hazy nature poetry, subtle nature similar to the dream is true reflection of people's feelings and awareness activities. "Book of Jin‧Arts Biography" preface says: "Qiu Ming Chuan Syria demon dream to vertical text." Seen, "Zuo Zhuan" as a later dream literary representation. In these or by a detailed description or slightly reflected in the Spring and Autumn Period in all aspects of political and military struggle and princes literati rich inner world, and its peculiar Dreamland rich imagination, changing blurred, with high literary value, influence on later literature greatly. This course is designed that hopes to lead the students to read and enjoy, "Zuo Zhuan" Ikunori and "Dream" on the s

description.zh: 本課程以培養學生尊重與欣賞不同族群、不同時空、不同價值觀所產生的音樂而設。藉由對音樂元素、本質的認知及介紹，欣賞各時期作曲家之代表作品，培養西方音樂的基本常識，建立音樂欣賞的專業態度。教學目標：1.提高學生音樂欣賞的素養，充實其音樂生活的內涵，2.激發學生對音樂的興趣，培育愛樂人口，增進社會祥和的原動力，3.介紹古今中外音樂名家名作，啟發學生對音樂創作的認知與敬重，4.建立學生對古典音樂、民族音樂、應用音樂及通俗音樂等不同類型音樂的正確認知與包容力，培養世界性的音樂觀。授課內容：1.概論, 2.歌樂, 3.器樂, 4.儀式音樂, 5.舞蹈音樂, 6.戲劇音樂。
description.en: This course aims to cultivate students' ability to appreciate music of different ethnic groups, different time and place, different value systems. Through the introduction of basic music elements as well as the appreciation of the masterpieces of various composers, it is hoped that students will build up basic music knowledge about music and enhance professional music appreciation potentiality in music. The goals include: 1. Elevating students' capability in music appreciation 2. Inspiring students' interest in music with a view to improving our society into a harmonious world. 3. Introducing domestic and international famous composers' pieces 4. Touring of various forms of music: classical, ethnic, applied and popular music. Contents of this course include: 1.Introduction 2. Vocal music 3. Instrumental music 4. Ritual music 5. Dance music 6. Theatre music

description.zh: 「時間學」是一門相當實際的課程，其目的在教導學瞭解時間的意義，提升時間使用的價值以善用時間，充實自己的生命與生活。本課程內容提供時間理論相關的觀念與方法，希望同學於課程中，一方面從學中做，一方面從做中學，而達到「時間學」增進個人健康，促進人際關係，有效處理公私事宜的三大功能。
description.en: "Time Science" is a very practical course and its purpose is to teach students the meaning of time with a view to increasing the value of time utility so as to make good use of time and enrich one's own life and living.The contents of the course provide the concept and method relating to time ethic and hope students to learn and work so  that "Time Sciecne" may attain three major functions--increase personal physical and mental health, promote interpersonal relationship and effectively handle public/private affairs.

description.zh: 本課程首先說明人在宇宙中的定位、生命的可貴、一生的方向；接著說明如何鍛鍊自己成為生命的勇士；最後強調如何與天地萬物和諧相處和真愛的永不止息。課程進行方式是透過體驗活動、交流分享和有次第的講授人類共同的智慧，並安排數次的校外教學，以深入瞭解社會脈動，並運用多媒體影片教學以提升學習效果，學生每天做身心觀察學習紀錄，更可以看到生命進步的軌跡。
description.en: This course covers topics such as: the role of human beings in the universe, the dearness of life and the pursuit of life-long goals. We then discuss ways to train the students to become brave and to harmonize human beings with the nature, leading to an access to the discovery of true love.The course is realized through activity involvement, experience sharing and lectures on human wisdom. We have some extramural visits in order to understand social pulses. Multimedia teaching materials are fully utilized to enhance the teaching and learning effects. We request that all the students take note of their mental and physical improvements on a daily basis so that they could examine the progressive path of life.

description.zh: 以攝影來進行社會介入的創作作品，在當代藝術的領域中已經不再陌生，而這樣的發展也促成在社會學領域中越來越多關於攝影與社會的討論。本課程主要分為兩大部分，第一部分將從攝影史發展脈絡，來談攝影的社會使用，第二部分則是探討在當代藝術中，如何將攝影作為一種社會實踐的方式。除課堂講解和集體討論外，本課程也將透過實作討論同學的攝影計畫和作品，期使讓同學對於攝影，可以產生新的社會性思考，並開始進行影像與社會介入的嘗試。
description.en: In the field of contemporary art, photography has been developing into a way of social intervention. This trend also contributes to triggering more dialogues concerning “photography and society” in the discipline of sociology. The course mainly includes two parts: photography history and the photography as a social practice. In the first section, along with the history of photography, the social usages of photography will be introduced. In the second section, how photography art can be a social practice and what kinds of practice have been explored will be . In addition to class lectures and group discussions, the course requires all students to complete their individual photo project in the end of semester and their works will be presented in class.

description.zh: 人類社會中的經濟活動愈來愈錯綜，人與人之間的經濟關係也愈來愈複雜，但無非都是為求經濟問題的解決。如何將有限的資源在諸多可行的途徑中，選擇最有利、最能發揮滿足人們慾望的效果，乃是身為「經濟人」的萬物之靈所努力的目標。本課程提供學習者分析經濟現象的工具，掌握經濟發展的脈動，以便在現代經濟社會中立於不敗之地。
description.en: In human society economic activity is getting more and more complicated and economic relationship between people is also getting more and more complicated but all are to seek for the solution of economic problems. Among a number feasible ways how to choose the best way that can make best use of limited resources to satisfy people's desire shall be the goal for human being as "economic persons" making effort to fulfill. The course enables students to learn the tools for the analysis of economic situation, the way of grasping the wave of economic development in Taiwan so as to win in the modern economic society.

description.zh: 個人或國家都無法自外於當今的國際社會；政治、經濟、社會、文化各層面皆受到國際間互動的影響下，為增進知識青年具備國際化的視野與認知，以因應時代發展趨勢，在強化技術研究的基礎上，拓展國家、社會與個人的發展空間。本課程內容包括基本理論與國際關係的動態，涵蓋國際社會的結構與演變、國際行為的類型及支配此行為的各種力量、國際事務的現象、本質及因果關係。
description.en: An individual or a country may not keep alien to today's internatonal community. Owing to internationally interactive influence with respect to politic, economy, society and culture, the purpose of the course is to equip intellectual youths with internaitonalized sight and awareness to keep pace with the develolpment trend of times, and to expand the space for national, social and individual development on basic of reinforced technical research. The contents of the course include basic theory and the situation  of international relations, covering the structure and changes in the international community, the type of international behavior, and various forces dominating such behavior, the phenomenon, essence, cause and consequence of international affairs.

description.zh: 運動、營養與健康是目前先進國家相當關注之理念與課題，也是提升生活品質與開發個人潛能的有效方法。本課程將有系統的介紹健康的生活方式與規律適度的運動，並將著重於如何將運動學與營養學之學理與技術，適當應用於個體健康生活整體之營造，使修課學生能了解運動前後的均衡飲食與擁有健康。
description.en: Exercise, nutrition and health is very concerned about the idea of advanced countries and issues, but also an effective way to develop individual potential and quality of life improved. This course will introduce a healthy lifestyle with moderate exercise system of law, and will focus on how the theoretical and technical kinematics and nutrition, the proper individuals applied to create a healthy life as a whole, so that students can enjoy the sport taught , and have a healthy balanced diet.

description.zh: 創業與財務概論課程的主要目的是要使學生了解如何在企業創立的時候，透過財務技術，來評估企業的經營績效與價值。本課程將介紹以下內容：(1) 公司創業的財務報表與科目報導與分析 (2) 基本創業財務分析理論 (3) 公司的償債能力、獲利能力、經營能力、資本結構、現金流量的分析 (4) 特殊行業的財務報表分析 (5) 探討我國最近發佈的會計準則公報對企業與投資人的影響。
description.en: The goal of the introduction to entrepreneurship and finance course is to help students, when the company is in the stage of entrepreneurship, evaluate the performance and measure the values of firms by financial statements. The topics of this course includes (1) entrepreneurship financial reports and analysis; (2) basic entrepreneurship financial statement analysis; 3) solvency, profitability, business performance, financial structure and cash flow analysis; 4) financial statement analysis of special industries 5) recent developments of GAAP.

description.zh: 本課程是教授學生人工智慧的基本概念與應用，激發學生在人工智慧領域的創新應用。課程內容包括: 人工智慧基礎、機器學習、大數據技術、深度學習、生成對抗網路、創業家思維、設計思考、商業模式、人工智慧與現代科技、人工智慧的製造業應用、人工智慧的服務業應用。
description.en: This course is to teach students the basic concepts and applications of artificial intelligence and to inspire students for innovative artificial intelligence applications. The course includes: artificial intelligence basics, machine learning, big data, deep learning, generative adversarial network, entrepreneurial thoughts, design thinking, business models, artificial intelligence and modern technologies, industrial applications of artificial intelligence, and services applications of artificial intelligence.

description.zh: 一、教學目標：幫助同學把毛筆字練好，進而培養欣賞能力。二、其教學內容包含1.鑑賞相關知識。2.名碑帖之認識3.篆刻、裱褙    之簡介4.行書、楷書之臨模與創作5.書論之研讀。三、評量則以整學期先後習作之比較出情訂定其成績。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to improve students' ability of appreciating Chinese calligraphy as well as the practice of handwriting skill. The contents include: 1. The knowledge of appreciation 2. Introduction of masterpieces. 3. Introductory studies of seal carving and traditional Chinese picture mounting. 4. Chinese calligraphy practice 5.reference materials study. Grading will be based on the improvement of students` works through all semester.

name.en: The Social and Cutural Characters in Taiwan

description.zh: 本課程的主要內容是涵括台灣社會與台灣文化兩大部份，台灣社會部份可分為早期台灣原住民社會，十七世紀以後漢人社會的建立，十九世紀從移民社會到定居社會，近代工商業社會的建立等幾部份；文化方面則以原住民文化，漢人文化及近代文化為教授重點，希望在一學期的課程中使學生對台灣的社會與文化有一概括性的了解。
description.en: This course primarily includes two major sections: Taiwan's society and Taiwan's culture.  Taiwan's society is made up of early aboriginal society, Han immigrant society after 17th century, the society of settlement in 19th century and the establishment of industrial/commercial society after 1930.  Taiwan's culture focuses on aboriginal culture, Han culture, and contemporary culture.  This one-semester course provides students with the basic knowledge about the Taiwan's society and culture in the hope that the students would have a comprehensive understanding of the culture and society in Taiwan.

description.zh: 本課程以培養學生尊重與欣賞不同族群、不同時空、不同價值觀所產生的音樂而設。藉由對音樂元素、本質的認知及介紹，欣賞各時期作曲家之代表作品，培養西方音樂的基本常識，建立音樂欣賞的專業態度。教學目標：1.提高學生音樂欣賞的素養，充實其音樂生活的內涵，2.激發學生對音樂的興趣，培育愛樂人口，增進社會祥和的原動力，3.介紹古今中外音樂名家名作，啟發學生對音樂創作的認知與敬重，4.建立學生對古典音樂、民族音樂、應用音樂及通俗音樂等不同類型音樂的正確認知與包容力，培養世界性的音樂觀。授課內容：1.概論, 2.歌樂, 3.器樂, 4.儀式音樂, 5.舞蹈音樂, 6.戲劇音樂。
description.en: This course aims to cultivate students' ability to appreciate music of different ethnic groups, different time and place, different value systems. Through the introduction of basic music elements as well as the appreciation of the masterpieces of various composers, it is hoped that students will build up basic music knowledge about music and enhance professional music appreciation potentiality in music. The goals include: 1. Elevating students' capability in music appreciation 2. Inspiring students' interest in music with a view to improving our society into a harmonious world. 3. Introducing domestic and international famous composers' pieces 4. Touring of various forms of music: classical, ethnic, applied and popular music. Contents of this course include: 1.Introduction 2. Vocal music 3. Instrumental music 4. Ritual music 5. Dance music 6. Theatre music

description.zh: 因是在大專教藝術欣賞的課程，我在設計課程上，即考慮雖同學們不是藝術本科學生，但秉持"雖創作，但會欣賞的原則"，我的課程安排將從上古時代人類的美術創作活動進而引導解釋什麼是人類的美感經驗。讓他們明瞭東方藝術之同與不同，再介紹東西方的繪畫潮流，如西方：從文藝復興至寫實主義，印象主義，至超印象主義，東方：從漢的畫象磚開始至中國畫，書法之演進，中西繪畫之比較，內容是繁而多的。但我將用簡潔扼要的"重點教學法",寓教於樂的方式，讓同學不再懼怕"Art'，甚至可以簡單的分辨出藝術品的年代，作者，及欣賞藝術作品的要領，這是我給此門課所訂的目標。另一個教學重點是："理論和實際併重"。在每一單元中，我將設計一項簡的[自己動手做]大概祇花 20-30 分鐘讓學生體會和真正看見，明白，藝術家製造藝術品的過程。很希望能帶學生至博物院或美術館一趟，或至鶯砍參觀陶工廠。總之，一切課程計劃，乃配合學生之程度與興趣。
description.en: Because most students taking this course are not art major; therefore, I adhere to the principle of "Although not creation, appreciation will be instructed."  On course design, my class starts from the artistic creation of human beings in prehistoric time and further introduces the experience of beauty sensed by man and understand the similiar and difference of eastern and western art.  Moreover, I will introduce the fashion of priniting of eastern and western culture.  For example, the western culture: from the Renaissance to realism, impressionism and super impressionism.  Western culture: from a portrait stone of Han Dynasty to Chinese painting, the develpment of calligraphy and comparison of Chinese and western paintings. The teaching content is complicated, but I will simply it and highlight teaching way to let my students enjoy it.

description.zh: 倫理學(Ethics)是討論「應不應該」的一門哲學分支。倫理學可分為「微觀倫理學」：探討個人性之行為的應不應該的問題，以及「宏觀的倫理學」：探討整個社會的政治、經濟、法律、社會等方面的問題。倫理學亦可區分為「規範倫理學」及「應用倫理學」兩大類，前者探討善的定義與判斷準則、動機論與結果論、人的意志是否自由、決定論與責任、自律與他律、幸福與快樂、哪些德行(virtue)值得追求等等課題，後者則是運用倫理學觀點探討諸如安樂死、墮胎、環保、複製人等種種課題。本課程主要目的是在對倫理學課題與種類作一個基本的介紹，訓練及培養學生在倫理問題上思考的能力，期能讓學生在作道德問題的判斷與抉擇上能夠有所進步。
description.en: This course will introduce basic ideas of Ethics to students. The topics will include: the definition and criterion of good, motivation and consequence, the problem of free will, determinism and responsibility, autonomy and discipline by others, happiness and pleasure, and virtues. This course will also touch upon those issues in applied Ethics, such as abortion, environment, business ethics, death sentence, etc.

description.zh: 婚姻是一般人所必經的過程，家庭是生活的場所，關係著人生的幸福與美滿。本課程強調美滿婚姻與幸福家庭是一門學問，因此，課程內容包括：對婚姻與家庭有正確的認知、積極的態度、完整的規劃，並培養有認真努力去實踐的方法與能力。如何追求真正的快樂與幸福？除了在婚姻與家庭中追求平等化、合理化、自由化、公平化外，自我成長、相互尊重都是本課程的學習目標，以協助學生思考婚姻與家庭的終生大事。
description.en: Marriage is a process that most people will go through.  Family is where you belong to, and where the satisfaction and happiness come from. We believe that it is a kind of scholarship to have a high-quality marriage and a wonderful family.  The contents of this course include having the correct understanding of marriage and family, cultivating positive attitude, developing complete plans, and realizing them with all efforts. This course will help students think totally about marriage and family, learn to pursue equality, reasonableness and liberty, keep growing and respect each other, so that we can obtain the real delight and happiness.

description.zh: 人的身體一接觸自然界，便開始各個器官的功能，人不如機器，無法汰換零件，加上身體機能遇到問題之後，許多人往往不知如何處理應對，甚至身體出現徵兆也渾然不知。所以此科目最主要的目的是希望藉由對醫學的認識，讓大學生們更瞭解自己的身體，進而保護並時時自我偵測身體是否正常運作，要培養健全的大學生，而不是只會讀書的大病貓。
description.en: Once the human body contacts the natural environment, the organs of the body begin to function.  But the human body can not change it's organizational like machine.  So when our body's function is in trouble, we always have no idea how to solve it, either to find out.  One of these course's objection is to let college students understanding their own body by learning some important medical concepts.  We hope that our country both has excellent and healthy college students,  and not all sick.

description.zh: 在本課程中，同學將學習到計算機程式語言Python基礎與應用，建立Python程式設計的基本概念。透過做中學、學中做，建構程式設計的基礎，以及基本程式運算邏輯，以培養運算思維、動手做的能力。期末以分組方式完成一個與學生專業領域相關應用的專題，學習如何運用程式解決與自身相關領域運用上的問題。
description.en: In this course, students will learn the basics and applications of the Python programming language and establish the basic concepts of Python programming design. Through the continuous practice, student will construct the basic logic of the program design, and the ability of computation think and practice application. At the final, a topic related to the application of students' professional subjects will be completed in groups, and student will learn how to use the program to solve problems in the relevant fields.

description.zh: 人類從尚未有文字的歷史以來，就有各種不同規模的戰爭，戰爭很吊詭的以你死或我亡，相互毀滅之態勢，爭奪「活著」的條件。古今中外，爆發戰爭的因素或為爭奪領土、權位、或為族群之戰、為意識形態之戰、或為物質資源之爭奪。在視覺影像發達的今日社會，有關戰爭的歷史影像的紀錄片與劇情片數量龐大、並有許多可觀之處。本課程將利用這些描寫戰爭影像資料，帶領同學瞭解相關戰爭與戰役爆發的歷史及其經過。
description.en: Throughout human history, even prior to written record, various types of warfare and scales of battles have existed for various purposes of domination or survival by all means of cruelty and destruction. The arousal of violent conflicts might be an attempt at fighting for territorial dominion or material resources economically or altering another species ideologically. In today's modern societies, bountiful documentaries and films concerning historical warfare have been accumulated. This course will aim at giving students a broad understanding and profound knowledge of the causes, process, and effects of significant warfare in human history with the aid of visual images in different media.

description.zh: 通識教育之核心精神為「博雅」，其中「博」指的是知識廣度。是以建構多元認知及探討，正是拓展知識廣度的重要方法。本講座課程係以「單一主題」統領「多面知識」的方式進行授課。課程領域為社會科學，由六至八個相關單元組成，不同專家學者授課。除課堂授課外，得實行「實地體驗教學」，安排參觀與實習。
description.en: "Erudition & Refinement" is among the most essential in the field of General Education. "Erudition" refers to the width of knowledge-also a very important approach in enriching human experience by building multi-dimensional recognition of culture. The Lecture focuses on a "single theme" through the teaching/learning of "a diversity of knowledge. The course areas cover social science. The lecture will consist of six to eight units, which will be taught by different experts and scholars. In addition to the classroom teaching, there may also be "Experiencing Teaching On the Spot"-or rather, a visit to the location in question or practicum.

notes: 社會向度,科研國際會議廳*

description.zh: 「社會心理學」主要探討的重點在於日常生活，社會刺激以及情境如何影響個人行為，它需要經過科學的方法進行研究，藉以預測一個人在某種情境下，可能會出現哪些行為。其涉及的學科相當廣泛，除了一般心理學的理論之外，尚包含社會科學哲學、文化人類學、倫理學、環境心理學、團體動力學等相關論述。課程強調理論與實務結合，提升學生參與社會的知能。
description.en: Social Psychology is focus on social stimuli and how situations affect individual behavior everyday life. In order to predict a person’s behavior in a situation, we need to research by scientific methods.  It covers a wide range of professional areas, not only the theories of social psychology but also philosophy of social science, cultural anthropology, ethics, environmental psychology, group dynamics. This course emphasizes the combination of theory and practice to enhance students’ abilities to participate in society.

description.zh: 婚姻是一般人所必經的過程，家庭是生活的場所，關係著人生的幸福與美滿。本課程強調美滿婚姻與幸福家庭是一門學問，因此，課程內容包括：對婚姻與家庭有正確的認知、積極的態度、完整的規劃，並培養有認真努力去實踐的方法與能力。如何追求真正的快樂與幸福？除了在婚姻與家庭中追求平等化、合理化、自由化、公平化外，自我成長、相互尊重都是本課程的學習目標，以協助學生思考婚姻與家庭的終生大事。
description.en: Marriage is a process that most people will go through.  Family is where you belong to, and where the satisfaction and happiness come from. We believe that it is a kind of scholarship to have a high-quality marriage and a wonderful family.  The contents of this course include having the correct understanding of marriage and family, cultivating positive attitude, developing complete plans, and realizing them with all efforts. This course will help students think totally about marriage and family, learn to pursue equality, reasonableness and liberty, keep growing and respect each other, so that we can obtain the real delight and happiness.

description.zh: 個人或國家都無法自外於當今的國際社會；政治、經濟、社會、文化各層面皆受到國際間互動的影響下，為增進知識青年具備國際化的視野與認知，以因應時代發展趨勢，在強化技術研究的基礎上，拓展國家、社會與個人的發展空間。本課程內容包括基本理論與國際關係的動態，涵蓋國際社會的結構與演變、國際行為的類型及支配此行為的各種力量、國際事務的現象、本質及因果關係。
description.en: An individual or a country may not keep alien to today's internatonal community. Owing to internationally interactive influence with respect to politic, economy, society and culture, the purpose of the course is to equip intellectual youths with internaitonalized sight and awareness to keep pace with the develolpment trend of times, and to expand the space for national, social and individual development on basic of reinforced technical research. The contents of the course include basic theory and the situation  of international relations, covering the structure and changes in the international community, the type of international behavior, and various forces dominating such behavior, the phenomenon, essence, cause and consequence of international affairs.

description.zh: 勞動法包括與勞動市場、個別勞動關係及集體勞動關係等方面有關勞工工作權益的法律規範，透過本課程可以學習正確的勞動法律觀念和知識，同時培養縝密思辨的能力，將課堂上所習得的知識應用落實在日常生活中，來保障並維護自己或他人的職場權益。
description.en: The legal specialty called Labor Law can be define as “the legal regulation of the labor market , individual labor relations and collective employer-employee relations. “labor market” pertains to market in which employers and workers exchange labor . Through this course , students can not only get correct concepts of " Labor Law " , but learn to protect their / others' rights in work place.

description.zh: 現代科技文明進展得非常迅速，這使得一般人日常生活中，可能經常享受到這些科技所帶來的便利，但卻習以為常，以為天生下來就是這樣的，這些現代的科技，可能是關於電機的、物理的、化工的、光電的、材料的......，更有可能同時涉及了其他許多個領域，更可能有許多人希望能夠了解這些科技的來龍去脈，一窺其究竟，人類在沒有土木工程學之前，早已能建築萬里長城和金字塔，許許多多的科技是由嘗試錯誤，經驗的累積逐漸得來的，當然，隨著知識的不斷窮究其理，"知而後行"的高科技也就會越來越多，我們在這裡也試圖去追蹤各項科技的演進史與現況方面讓大家知道羅馬不是一天所造成的，另一方面也讓大家有從另一個角度重新思考的機會，也許這些科技進化到現在，還稱不上成熟的階段，您也許可以找出另一種更好的方法來改進它們！
description.en: Modern technology is growing fast. People thus enjoy the convenience in company with the technology—which they do and they just take it for granted to do. It may have something to do with electrical engineering, physics, chemical engineering, electro-optical engineering, materials…Some problems involves more than one field. People are curious about the technology and willing to know how to solve the problems. Human beings are able to build the pyramids and the Long Walls before they know anything about civil engineering—knowledge actually piled up by trial and error or accumulated experience. As knowledge expands, hi-end technology which requires “know-how” becomes more popular. In this course, we try to trace the history and the current situations: “Rome was not built in a day.” On the other hand, we might take another chance to RE-think a deeper problem: technology evolves without getting to maturity. Human beings will be enforced to find some other ways to improve it.

description.zh: 在本課程中，同學將學習到計算機程式語言Python基礎與應用，建立Python程式設計的基本概念。透過做中學、學中做，建構程式設計的基礎，以及基本程式運算邏輯，以培養運算思維、動手做的能力。期末以分組方式完成一個與學生專業領域相關應用的專題，學習如何運用程式解決與自身相關領域運用上的問題。
description.en: In this course, students will learn the basics and applications of the Python programming language and establish the basic concepts of Python programming design. Through the continuous practice, student will construct the basic logic of the program design, and the ability of computation think and practice application. At the final, a topic related to the application of students' professional subjects will be completed in groups, and student will learn how to use the program to solve problems in the relevant fields.

name.en: Cross Strait Relations and International Politics

description.zh: 本課程由全球化框架來檢視兩岸關係的演進、現況、及發展趨勢。由政治、經濟、乃至社會心理層面分析海峽兩岸錯綜複雜的互動關係。並檢視國際政治經濟體系中，美國與日本兩大國對兩岸關係的影響。
description.en: This introductory course on the complex cross-strait interactions will examineTaiwan’s role in the intricate web of international power politics; as well as the structure of hegemonic power rivalry, particularly Sino-US-Japan triangle, and its impact on cross strait relations. The material will cover the evolution, status quo, and developmental path of the cross strait relations in a global framework.

description.zh: 創業與財務概論課程的主要目的是要使學生了解如何在企業創立的時候，透過財務技術，來評估企業的經營績效與價值。本課程將介紹以下內容：(1) 公司創業的財務報表與科目報導與分析 (2) 基本創業財務分析理論 (3) 公司的償債能力、獲利能力、經營能力、資本結構、現金流量的分析 (4) 特殊行業的財務報表分析 (5) 探討我國最近發佈的會計準則公報對企業與投資人的影響。
description.en: The goal of the introduction to entrepreneurship and finance course is to help students, when the company is in the stage of entrepreneurship, evaluate the performance and measure the values of firms by financial statements. The topics of this course includes (1) entrepreneurship financial reports and analysis; (2) basic entrepreneurship financial statement analysis; 3) solvency, profitability, business performance, financial structure and cash flow analysis; 4) financial statement analysis of special industries 5) recent developments of GAAP.

description.zh: 本課程的主要目的是教授學生區塊鏈技術的基本概念與應用，激發學生在區塊鏈領域的創新應用。課程內容包括: 區塊鏈概論、區塊鏈的基本工作原理、區塊鏈安裝、智能合約製作、設計思考、區塊鏈與物聯網、區塊鏈的金融應用、區塊鏈的產業應用、區塊鏈與人工智慧
description.en: This course is to teach students the basic concepts and applications of blockchain technology and to inspire students for innovative blockchain applications. The course includes: blockchain introduction, blockchain working principles, blockchain installation, smart contract development, design thinking, blockchain and internet of things, financial applications of blockchain, industrial applications of blockchain, and blockchain and artificial intelligence.

description.zh: 本課程是教授學生人工智慧的基本概念與應用，激發學生在人工智慧領域的創新應用。課程內容包括: 人工智慧基礎、機器學習、大數據技術、深度學習、生成對抗網路、創業家思維、設計思考、商業模式、人工智慧與現代科技、人工智慧的製造業應用、人工智慧的服務業應用。
description.en: This course is to teach students the basic concepts and applications of artificial intelligence and to inspire students for innovative artificial intelligence applications. The course includes: artificial intelligence basics, machine learning, big data, deep learning, generative adversarial network, entrepreneurial thoughts, design thinking, business models, artificial intelligence and modern technologies, industrial applications of artificial intelligence, and services applications of artificial intelligence.

description.zh: 機率空間；組合分析；隨機變數；期望值與慣矩；聯合分佈隨機變數；慣矩母函數及特徵函數；大數法則及中央極限定理；隨機漫步及帕森程序。
description.en: Course Title:Probability and Statistics Description:This course is designed for students to get concepts and methods of Probability and Statistics. The main purpose of this course is establishment of the foundations of industrial management, quality control, and industrial economics.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹使用於智慧家庭、智慧製造與智慧醫療應用的感測器結構與基本工作原理，包含光學感測原理、半導體感測原理、機械感測原理、化學感測原理、生物感測原理、各種感測器之測量系統及轉換界面電路設計與近期的感測技術基礎科學發展與議題。
description.en: This course introduces the sensor structure and basic working principles used in smart home, smart manufacturing and smart medical applications, including optical sensors, semiconductor sensors, mechanical sensors, electrochemical sensors, biosensors. Moreover, we will discuss various sensor measurement systems, conversion interface circuit design, and recent scientific development."

notes: *電機、電子、資工、光電二、三和智慧感測學程合開

description.zh: 本課程主要講授重點包括刑事訴訟之程序與執行等，並將兼顧實例與理論進行探討，來深化同學對於刑事訴訟法的瞭解。本學期內容包括刑事訴訟基本理念與原則、迴避、管轄與強制處分。
description.en: This course focuses on the proceeding and enforcement of the law of criminal procedure. The discussion in the course covers theory and examples, to enhance a deeper understanding of Law of Criminal Procedure for the students. In this semester, major topics will include the basic concept, disqualification, jurisdiction and prosecutors' order of the law of criminal procedure.

description.zh: 本課程在介紹雲端計算的基本概念與使用技術，使學生熟悉雲端平台所提供之服務，以開發雲端系統與應用服務。課程內容包含：1. 雲端技術概論，2. 雲端環境與平台，3. 雲端架構與應用，4.雲端分散式計算與應用，5.人工智慧基礎，6.人工智慧雲端應用實務，7.期末專題實務。
description.en: The goal of this course is to introduce the basic concepts, techniques, and applications of cloud computing. The outline of this course includes: 1.Introduction to Cloud Techniques and application, 2. Cloud environment and platform, 3. Cloud architectures and applications, 4. Cloud distributed computing and applications, 5. Artificial intelligence introduction, 6. Artificial intelligence cloud applications, 7. the final project design.

description.zh: 此課程主要是含蓋無線通訊基頻訊號處理的理論基礎與系統架構，探討無線通道所能提供的通道容量以及可靠通訊。而大部分的課程內容會以目前熱門的多輸入多輸出(MIMO)傳輸為背景而進行探討。課程綱要如下:1.無線通道模型2.多樣性3.通道容量4.MIMO I: 空間多工5.MIMO II: 通道容量與多工架構6.MIMO III:多樣性與多工間取捨7.MIMO IV: 多使用者通訊
description.en: This course provides thefundamental theories and architectures for baseband wireless communications. It is concerned that how reliable communication can be achieved and what is the capacity a channel can provide. Much attention will be focused on the newly developed technology, referred to as multiple-inputmultiple-output (MIMO) transmission.Course outline:1.The Wireless Channel 2.Diversity3.Capacity of Wireless Channels4.MIMO I: Spatial Multiplexing 5.MIMO II: Capacity and Multiplexing Architectures6.MIMO III: Diversity-Multiplexing Tradeoff7.MIMO IV: Multiuser Communication

description.zh: 為了鼓勵以及幫助學生用技術或者商業模式，聯合學校老師或是跨校同學，用商業的手段共同解決社會或者商業問題，本課程將以衝刺班的形式，邀請有創業經驗的老師、業師，透過工作坊的形式，幫助學生逐週的推進創業進度以及創業競賽演練，目標是幫助學生落實創業想法，應用在社會中並且帶來改變。
description.en: To encourage and help students using new technologies or new business models to solve problems in the society and the business world, this intense, pre-accelerator, 18-week course invites different professors and mentors with entrepreneurship experiences to help students develop their start-up ideas through workshops and startup competitions. The goal of this course is to help students realize their ideas and create actionable business solutions that can change the society.

notes: 限40人/大研合開/創創總整課程

description.zh: 為了鼓勵以及幫助學生用技術或者商業模式，聯合學校老師或是跨校同學，用商業的手段共同解決社會或者商業問題，本課程將以衝刺班的形式，邀請有創業經驗的老師、業師，透過工作坊的形式，幫助學生逐週的推進創業進度以及創業競賽演練，目標是幫助學生落實創業想法，應用在社會中並且帶來改變。
description.en: To encourage and help students using new technologies or new business models to solve problems in the society and the business world, this intense, pre-accelerator, 18-week course invites different professors and mentors with entrepreneurship experiences to help students develop their start-up ideas through workshops and startup competitions. The goal of this course is to help students realize their ideas and create actionable business solutions that can change the society.

description.zh: 本課程目的為培養大學生未來創新創業時所需具備的基礎能力與知識。本課程將針對以下幾個面向來授課。1. 觀察聯想力；2. 創新思考；3. 發現問題與解決問題；4. 人際關係；5. 價值主張；6. 商業模式。
description.en: The aim of this course is to build up students’ abilities and fundamental knowledge of innovation and entrepreneurships. The following topics are introduced: 1. Observation and associating. 2. Creative thinking. 3. Questioning and problem solving. 4. Human relation. 5. Value proposition. 6. Business model.

notes: 限15人/經管三、經管所和創創專區合開

description.zh: 本課程目的為培養大學生未來創新創業時所需具備的基礎能力與知識。本課程將針對以下幾個面向來授課。1. 觀察聯想力；2. 創新思考；3. 發現問題與解決問題；4. 人際關係；5. 價值主張；6. 商業模式。
description.en: The aim of this course is to build up students’ abilities and fundamental knowledge of innovation and entrepreneurships. The following topics are introduced: 1. Observation and associating. 2. Creative thinking. 3. Questioning and problem solving. 4. Human relation. 5. Value proposition. 6. Business model.

notes: 限45人/經管三、經管所和創創專區合開

name.zh: 科技發展與法律策略:案例研析二
name.en: Technology Development and Legal Strategy: Case Study(II)

description.zh: 在科技發展快速的年代，有些人認為產業和市場需要更多新的法律規範，也有些人認為舊有法律需要鬆綁。但無庸置疑地，法律在科技、產業與市場的發展中，扮演著一個攸關重要的角色。基於此，本課程嘗試以設計案例討論，鼓勵不同背景的學生，經由案例分析得到綜合性的知識、從中了解科技發展如何影響法律變遷，並進而學習專業的法律策略。
description.en: In an age of rapid technology advancement, some people might insist more laws are necessary to regulate the industry and the market, on the contrary, others might think de-regulation is the best approach to encourage the free flow of the market. Nonetheless, it is beyond question that law and regulations play an vital role in the technology-driven economy today. Therefore this course is designed to help students from various backgrounds to engage in the group discussions on assigned cases. Students are expected to learn how the technology development shapes the legal environment and learn how to analyze the legal strategies.

name.zh: 數位匯流與智財法律專題(二)
name.en: Intellectual Property Laws in the Age of Digital Convergence(II)

description.zh: 在數位匯流的趨勢下，網際網路不但即將成為各種傳統媒體的聚集之處，同時也不斷衍生新型態的媒體傳播方式。有鑑於此，本課程目的即在探討數位匯流時代的智財法律議題。將由實際案例為主，輔以相關分析文章及法律規定的解析，帶領同學了解數位環境的特性、數位媒體形式與媒體內容的發展，同時針對著作權、隱私權等實用智慧財產權議題，讓同學了解、並具備分析數位時代的媒體趨勢、以及智財法律策略的能力。
description.en: In the face of digital convergence, the internet seems will not only become the ultimate channel for all kinds of traditional media, but the birthplace of new types. In light of the challenges posed by the digital age, this course is aimed at helping students explore the IP legal issues with reference to the media evolution on the internet. It will begin with the introduction of the characteristics of the internet, the developments of the digital media formation and content, and followed by the discussions and analysis on the cases in the real life.

description.zh: 本課程將以近期著作權法著名案例的評析，培養學生關鍵的基礎能力，再導入若該著作為人工智慧自行創作或人類以人工智慧為輔具所創作之法律爭議，鼓勵學生從比較法考察及跨域科法整合之觀點，剖析立法、司法或行政所面臨的問題，並探求可能解決問題的具體措施或建議方案。
description.en: This course will analyze recent well-known copyright cases, expecting that relevant fundamental capability of students can be built.  Further, legal issues will be introduced in dealing with the copyright work created by AI itself, or created by human beings who are aided by AI.  Besides, efforts will be made to encourage students to analyze the problems encountered in legislative, judiciary, and administrative sectors, with considerations on comparative law and with viewpoints from integration of law and technology, and to propose concrete measures and suggestions that may help to solve the problems.

description.zh: 工業4.0在智慧製造應用技術上強調上、中、下游的連線，包括建置智能工廠從接受訂單、進出貨、智慧生產排單、生產系統、品管系統等的工廠產銷連線，到聯網接受下游顧客訂單，再到拆解訂單分析原物料並與上游原物料商連線，達到智慧製造之目的，工業4.0所講的智慧是機器設備的智慧，是數位管理的工廠，本課程就是要透過理論與實務技術的印證，介紹工業4.0的製造營運管理技術。
description.en: Industry 4.0 emphasizes the connection of upper, middle and lower reaches in smart manufacturing application technology, including the establishment of smart factories to connect and export factories, orders, shipments, smart production orders, production systems, quality control systems, etc. Accept the downstream customer orders, and then disassemble the order to analyze the original materials and connect with the upstream raw material suppliers to achieve the purpose of smart manufacturing. The wisdom of Industry 4.0 is the wisdom of machinery and equipment. It is a digital management factory. This course is to introduce the manufacturing operation management technology of Industry 4.0 through the proof of theory and practice technology.

notes: 機電大四和機電所合開*

description.zh: 工業4.0在智慧製造應用技術上強調上、中、下游的連線，包括建置智能工廠從接受訂單、進出貨、智慧生產排單、生產系統、品管系統等的工廠產銷連線，到聯網接受下游顧客訂單，再到拆解訂單分析原物料並與上游原物料商連線，達到智慧製造之目的，工業4.0所講的智慧是機器設備的智慧，是數位管理的工廠，本課程就是要透過理論與實務技術的印證，介紹工業4.0的製造營運管理技術。
description.en: Industry 4.0 emphasizes the connection of upper, middle and lower reaches in smart manufacturing application technology, including the establishment of smart factories to connect and export factories, orders, shipments, smart production orders, production systems, quality control systems, etc. Accept the downstream customer orders, and then disassemble the order to analyze the original materials and connect with the upstream raw material suppliers to achieve the purpose of smart manufacturing. The wisdom of Industry 4.0 is the wisdom of machinery and equipment. It is a digital management factory. This course is to introduce the manufacturing operation management technology of Industry 4.0 through the proof of theory and practice technology.

notes: 機電大四和機電所合開*

name.zh: 跨域全齡商品設計開發
name.en: Interdisciplinary Product Design for All Ages

description.zh: 藉由跨領域合作與產業接軌模式，配合體驗活動與設計思考課程，引導學生發掘與分析不同年齡族群的生活困難，進行全齡產品開發設計與評估驗證。
description.en: This course is through interdisciplinary cooperation and industry model with experiential activities and design thinking courses. Lead students to discover and analyze different needs of all ages, and product design and assessment tests.

notes: 工設三四和創新所合開

description.zh: 本課程主要是要讓學生對醫學設計之基本理論及實務內容有所認識。了解一個健康醫療產品/系統/服務從醫學及使用者需求的思維、如何發展到設計理念之形成、設計內容之導入實現、工程技術之開發、原型機製作、臨床前測試、臨床試驗、醫療認證、及工業管理等層次。讓學生能掌握跨領域之醫學設計原理，並教導如何藉由創新產品設計與開發方法引導醫學背景與設計背景之專業人士合作以瞭解開發市場上成功之健康醫療產品之關鍵課題、針對臨床服務需求，提出健康醫療創新解決方案。進而產生創新健康醫療產品。
description.en: This course aims to teach postgraduate students to understand the basic theory and practice of medical design. Learn about the health and medical products/ systems/ services from the discovery of medical and user needs to the design of innovative healthcare products, which include the topics of how to generate the design concepts, understand the user and market needs, develop the engineering technologies and prototype, design pre-clinical testing and clinical trials, obtain medical certification and plan industrial management. To enable students to master the principles of interdisciplinary medical design, and teach them how to use innovative product design and development approach to guide professionals in medical backgrounds and design backgrounds to understand the key issues in developing successful health medical products in the market and address the needs of clinical services, propose innovative solutions for health care, and develop innovative health and medical products.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討人機互動設計範疇內具有實體可觸碰之介面類型，實體互動設計所連結之範疇從產品設計、工業設計以至新媒體藝術表現、建築、空間等皆能有關連，因此在本課程中將以實例研究與專題製作探討實體互動設計的多種可能性。
description.en: Tangible Interaction Design has connections with product design, industrial design, new media art, architecture and physical space. This course gives an overview of how Tangible Interaction Design can lead to more design possibilities by case studies and projects.

name.zh: 跨域全齡商品設計開發
name.en: Interdisciplinary Product Design for All Ages

description.zh: 藉由跨領域合作與產業接軌模式，配合體驗活動與設計思考課程，引導學生發掘與分析不同年齡族群的生活困難，進行全齡產品開發設計與評估驗證。
description.en: This course is through interdisciplinary cooperation and industry model with experiential activities and design thinking courses. Lead students to discover and analyze different needs of all ages, and product design and assessment tests.

notes: 工設三四和創新所合開

description.zh: 本課程重點在於台灣專利法的主要法律議題，包括產業利用性、新穎性、進步性、可實施性、說明書支持性、請求項不明確性、請求項解釋、侵權行為、救濟手段、專利授權、強制授權、專利訴訟之展開和舉發。本課程教材包括專利法教科書、智慧局頒發的專利審查基準和智慧財產法院裁判。
description.en: This course focuses on the main legal issues of the Taiwan Patent Law including industrial utility, novelty, inventive step, enablement, written description, claim indefiniteness, claim interpretation, infringement, remedies, patent licensing, compulsory licensing, initiation of patent litigation, and opposition. The class materials include a patent law textbook, patent examination guidelines issued by the Taiwan Intellectual Property Office and recent decisions from the Taiwan Intellectual Property Court.

description.zh: 此門課程主要在於瞭解社會學的意涵，並藉由跨領域的學習，讓不同學科能有對話的空間。課程涵蓋的範圍會兼顧理論與實用性，讓學生能思考當今的社會，理解到產生因素的多元性，並進而使個人眼界能更加開拓。期望學生於課程學習中能夠擁有更多對於整個社會的不同思維，以強化本身學科之所需，不但具有理論性深入的洞察力，也能引用到管理上實質的層面。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to understand sociology. It covers theory and practicability, and make students consider the current society, and understand the generated factors of diversity . Expect students' study can have more for the community as a whole different way of thinking, in order to strengthen their academic needs, not only has the theoretical depth of insight, but also on the substance applied to the management level.

name.zh: 陶瓷製程與性質之最佳化改良法
name.en: Optimization of ceramic process and properties

description.zh: 培養學生主動發現問題，或由企業所提出的問題，訓練學生思考如何運用專業知識與技能解決實驗問題。目前針對電子陶瓷相關的產業，對於具有產品的陶瓷製程與性質改良法的專業知識人才，急迫需要，故利用企業命題的問題導向課程方式，訓練學生具有解決產業實際問題與需求的能力。
description.en: Train students to discover problems proactively, or ask questions from companies to train students to think about how to apply professional knowledge and skills to solve experimental problems. At present, for professional knowledge talents with ceramic process and property improvement methods for products, there is an urgent need. Therefore, the problem-oriented curriculum method of the enterprise proposition is used to train students to have the ability to solve practical problems and needs of the industry.

notes: 材資三四甲合開,PBL教室,限20人

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。以數個實例說明生產製造的方法，從一個新產品開發到設計安排及製作生產設備，一系之過程解決方法，讓同學了解一個產品的開發、製程的安排生產設備的改善、及其他相關事務的配合等問題。以達到同學到工廠能有系統的解決生產製造問題。
description.en: Required courses before taking this course must be permitted by the professor who teaches this course. There will be examples to illustrate and describe the production methods. Starting from the development of a new product, the course will introduce all process and solution ways of design , manufacture and production, so that the students are able to understand the development of products and their arrangement of manufacture and production equipment. It is our expectation that all graduated students who have taken this course are able to handle the related techniques in industries.

description.zh: 配電系統規劃及自動化，負載特性，配電變壓器的應用，二次輸電線及配電站設計，一次系統的設計考慮，二次系統的設計考慮，電壓降落及電力損失計算，電容器在配電系統上的應用，配電系統電壓調整，配電系統負載潮流分析，配電系統故障分析。
description.en: Course Title:Industrial power distribution Labs.Description:To familiarize students with the techniques of analyzing,designing, operating, maintaining high and low voltage powerdistribution systems.

notes: 電四甲乙丙合開,預選限50人。

name.en: Lecture: Increase capacity for career exploration

description.zh: 本校為強化學生的就業能力，加強學生的職場競爭力，開設「職涯進擊講座」之課程，藉由業界主管與人員分享面試技巧、溝通表達、職場自我行銷、生涯規劃及介紹不同種類的工作模式，如派遣、公職、舒活族、獵人頭公司、國外企業等，提升學生對於國內外職場的認識，並進一步提升學生的就業率與競爭力。
description.en: This course is designed to enhance student’s competitive ability in the workplace. The course contents include tips of interview, self-marketing in the workplace and the planning of the career life etc. By the topics, students will be equipped with a variety of presentation skills that needed in the workplace to raise the employment rate.

notes: 限120人,大三以上學生,3/11~4/15共6週,3小時/週

name.zh: 深度學習應用開發實務

description.zh: 課程主要為介紹學術界最新的深度學習研究成果，教導學員使用Python深度學習套件，讓學員能將深度學習技術應用於各個不同的領域。課程內容包括：●車牌與門牌數字辨識●人臉辨識●1000種影像分類●辨識9000種物件  ●自動駕駛模擬●嵌入式深度學習演算法空虛, 寂寞, 覺得冷? 讓深度學習來幫助你:●遞迴式神經網路(RNN)：找不到人聊天？訓練自己的聊天機器人●對抗生成網路(GAN)：用GAN產生自己的夢中情人●深度強化學習(DRL)：訓練AI跟你一起玩遊戲
description.en: The goal of this course is to introduce latest deep learning researches and allow students to develop deep learning applications using Python library (TensorFlow & Keras). The content includes:●Number recognition of License plate and Doorplate●Face Recognition●1000 Image Classification●9000 Object Detection●Autopilot simulation●Embedded Deep Learning Algorithms●Convolutional Neural Networks (CNN)●Recurrent Neural Networks (RNN)●Long-Short Term Memory (LSTM)●Generative Adversarial Networks (GAN)●Deep Reinforcement Learning

notes: 須修過工程數學或線性代數;電子系所和IEECS合開

name.zh: 電動車機電整合工程師能力培育
name.en: Training for Mechanical and Electrical Integration Engineer of Electric Vehicles

description.zh: 本課程之目的是協助學生考取經濟部專業工程師考試「電動車機電整合工程師能力鑑定」證照，課程內容依照考試科目內容，包含：電動車產業趨勢、各系統基礎原理、機電整合系統的重要元件、各子系統整合的基礎原理；電池技術概論及模組管理與電力安全防護系統、其他系統匹配、?輛動力系統性能設定、動力系統整合、微處理機與介面、電機機械原理、電機驅動原理。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to guide the student to pursue the certification of “Mechanical and Electrical Integration Engineer of Electric Vehicles” for professional engineers. That is provided by the Ministry of Economic Affairs. The contents are: trend of electric vehicle (EV) industry, principle of each system, key components of mechanical and electrical integration system, principle of system integration, battery concept and module management of electric safety, system matching, setting of vehicle powertrain, integration of powertrain, microprocessor and interface, principle of electromechanics, principle of electrical driving.

notes: 3/5上課,為配合IPAS考試時間,3小時/週,共12週

name.zh: 電動車機電整合工程師能力培育
name.en: Training for Mechanical and Electrical Integration Engineer of Electric Vehicles

description.zh: 本課程之目的是協助學生考取經濟部專業工程師考試「電動車機電整合工程師能力鑑定」證照，課程內容依照考試科目內容，包含：電動車產業趨勢、各系統基礎原理、機電整合系統的重要元件、各子系統整合的基礎原理；電池技術概論及模組管理與電力安全防護系統、其他系統匹配、?輛動力系統性能設定、動力系統整合、微處理機與介面、電機機械原理、電機驅動原理。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to guide the student to pursue the certification of "Mechanical and Electrical Integration Engineer of Electric Vehicles" for professional engineers. That is provided by the Ministry of Economic Affairs. The contents are: trend of electric vehicle (EV) industry, principle of each system, key components of mechanical and electrical integration system, principle of system integration, battery concept and module management of electric safety, system matching, setting of vehicle powertrain, integration of powertrain, microprocessor and interface, principle of electromechanics, principle of electrical driving.

notes: 3/5上課,為配合IPAS考試時間,3小時/週,共12週

description.zh: 邀聘專家開設就業模擬課程模組，演繹各行業職人百態，以職場實例進行雙向互動，讓同學增進肢體及口語表達能力，並建立正確的工作態度和職場EQ。
description.en: Outstanding industrial professional is invited to organize the career simulation program, where scenarios are designed for students to tackle the issues that are possibly faced in the future career. Proper attitude and interpersonal skills at work and be built up through the diversity of themes and scenarios, such as team building, communication and collaboration, and leadership enhancing. The body language and the communicative skills of the students are also strengthened through the programs.

description.zh: 讀書報告、專題討論、機電系統產品介紹與討論、Seminar心得等。可重覆修習。
description.en: Case Study, Mechatronics in Industry, Seminars.

description.zh: 教學目標為幫助學生瞭解多國企業所面對的國際財務管理的議題、其理論及實務。內容包括外匯市場、國際套利、外匯衍生性商品、外匯風險暴露管理、境外市場及國際投資組合管理。
description.en: The goal is to help students understand the theory and practice of the international financial management issues faced by multinational corporations. The course includes the following topics: foreign exchange, foreign exchange arbitrage, foreign exchange derivatives, risk exposure management, offshore market, and the international portfolio management.

notes: 資財三甲、三乙合開,限51人

description.zh: 本課程講解衛星的電機系統，包括指令與資料處理、電力、通訊、飛行軟體及電機介面等，並以國內衛星的實例說明發展程序。建議先修電子學或電子電路相關課程。
description.en: This course introduces the satellite electrical systems, including instructions and data processing, power, communications, flight software, and electrical interfaces. This course also uses the example of domestic satellite systems to illustrate the development procedures. It is recommended that students have taken courses related to Electronics or Electronic Circuits.

notes: 收播遠距教學,18:30~21:20上課,綜科216B,清大林信嘉

description.zh: 本課程目的在介紹微觀之固體表面結構與現象。課程內容包括微觀之固體表面結構，固體表面之吸附、擴散、脫附現象，表面偏析現象，分子和表面間之鍵結，表面反應的熱力學與動力學，以及各種表面分析的技術。
description.en: This course is designated to acquaint the student with atomic-level understanding of surface structure and surface phenomena. The course focuses on the surproperties of the solid-gas and solid-vacuum interfaces because most of the results of modern surface-science studies on the atomic level come from the scrutiny of these interfaces. It contains the following topics: the atomic-level structure of clean and adsorbate-covered surfaces, adsorption and desorption, surface diffusion, surface segregation, the nature of the surface bonding, the adsorbate-adsorbate interaction, energy transfer during gas-surface interactions and surface reaction; surface analysis techniques.

name.zh: 積體電路製程先進技術與設備
name.en: Processing technology and equipment for advanced semiconductor manufacturing

description.zh: 本課程涵蓋半導體產業趨勢發展、超大型(Giga)半導體工廠廠務系統與先進自動化工廠運作、以及先進半導體製程技術和設備等三大部分。
description.en: This course mainly consists of development trend, Giga FAB, FAB automation, and processing technology and equipment for advanced semiconductor manufacturing.

notes: 與台積電講師共同授課,限40人*

name.en: Development of global perspective: Korean I

description.zh: 本課程將教導學生韓文字母結構、發音方法及基礎詞彙、文法與句型、韓國現況及文化等，透過文化與語言的習得，培養學生與韓籍人士溝通或在韓國生活所需要的最基本的溝通能力。
description.en: This course aims to introduce beginners to basic spoken and written skills in Korean. Students will develop basic skills with a focus on effective communication and enjoyment through listening, speaking, reading and writing. By the end of the course, students will be able to hold a simple conversation in Korean, comprehend basic Korean texts and write about their everyday lives.

name.en: Development of global perspective:  Korean II

description.zh: 本課程將教導學生韓文字母結構、發音方法及基礎詞彙、文法與句型、韓國現況及文化等，透過文化與語言的習得，培養學生與韓籍人士溝通或在韓國生活所需要的最基本的溝通能力。
description.en: This course aims to introduce beginners to basic spoken and written skills in Korean. Students will develop basic skills with a focus on effective communication and enjoyment through listening, speaking, reading and writing. By the end of the course, students will be able to hold a simple conversation in Korean, comprehend basic Korean texts and write about their everyday lives.

name.en: Feast for the global perspective: German Ⅰ

description.zh: 本課程使學生具有基礎德語能力，並加強會話及閱讀能力訓練。
description.en: The focus of this course is to enable students to have basic German abilities and to strengthen the training or drilling of conversation and reading comprehension of the German language.

name.en: Feast for the global perspective: French Ⅰ

description.zh: 本課程為基礎法文, 主要是幫助學生學習從字彙, 文法, 到日常會話的法文能力。
description.en: This class introduces basic French vocabulary, grammar, and conversation to the students.

name.zh: 國際觀培養:泰國文化概論
name.en: Development of global perspective: Introduction to Thai Culture

description.zh: 課程以跨文化理解為宗旨，課程架構包括泰國歷史背景的概述與文化議題的討論，使學生對泰國政治、經濟、社會、地理、歷史各方面的情勢以及語言、思想、禮節、風俗習慣、宗教禁忌等各個層面的泰國文化，都具有深度認識，呈現出不同於一般刻板印象中的泰國，培養學生對泰國的正確理解與尊重態度。
description.en: This course aims to introduce students with cross-culture understanding through establishing basic knowledge of history, components of society, politics and other diverse aspects of Thailand. By the end of the course, students will be able to hold natural and respectful attitude toward Thai culture.

name.zh: 國際觀培養:基礎西班牙語1(A1上)

description.zh: 本課程專為初學西班牙文之學生設計，毋需任何西班牙文基礎。本課程著重在學習西班牙文發音及了解基礎文法架構。課程結束前，學生將可以閱讀基本的西班牙文文句、自我介紹及西班牙文的基礎對話。
description.en: This is course is designed for first time students of Spanish. No previous knowledge is required to enroll this course. The focus of this course is to provide a basic knowledge of the pronunciation and grammatical structures of Spanish at the beginner level. By the end of this course, the student will be able to read basic texts in Spanish, self-introduce himself and start a basic conversation.

description.zh: 本課程專為初學西班牙文之學生設計，毋需任何西班牙文基礎。本課程著重在學習西班牙文發音及了解基礎文法架構。課程結束前，學生將可以閱讀基本的西班牙文文句、自我介紹及西班牙文的基礎對話。

The focus of this course is to provide a basic knowledge of the pronunciation and grammatical structures of Spanish at the beginner level. By the end of this course, the student will be able to read basic texts in Spanish, self-introduce himself and start a basic conversation.

name.zh: 國際觀培養:日語與文化(一)

description.zh: 本課程提供學生養成基本日語聽說讀寫技能，並能夠面對在各種情境下，表達出適當的日語，足以應付日常生活簡單狀況。此外，並運用多媒體等工具，介紹日本文化，歷史，人文等多種面向，讓學生能更多元地了解日本，有效提升學習興趣及效率。
description.en: This course provides a comprehensive approach to developing the four basic language skills (listening, speaking, reading, and writing) in order to cultivate your overall Japanese language ability to a level sufficient for various occasions and everyday life.In addition , using multimedia to introduce a variety of Japanese culture, history , and humanities. The students can learn more about Japan in many different perspectives, and effectively enhance interest in the learning process.

name.zh: 國際觀培養:日語與文化(二)
name.en: Development of global perspective: Japanese Ⅱ

description.zh: 本課程為日語與文化(一)之進階課程，提供學生養成進階日語聽說讀寫技能，並能夠面對在各種情境下，表達出適當的日語，足以應付日常生活簡單狀況。此外，並運用多媒體等工具，介紹日本文化，歷史，人文等多種面向，讓學生能更多元地了解日本，有效提升學習興趣及效率。
description.en: This course is designed for students who has basic Japanese knowledge or who passed the language course: Japanese (I) in the previous term. This course provides a comprehensive approach to developing the four basic language skills (listening, speaking, reading, and writing) in order to cultivate your overall Japanese language ability to a level sufficient for various occasions and everyday life. In addition, using multimedia to introduce a variety of Japanese culture, history , and humanities. The students can learn more about Japan in many different perspectives, and effectively enhance interest in the learning process.

name.en: Special Topics on Irrigation and Drainage

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討水-土-氣候-作物間之關係，以及介紹相關之主題，包括作物需水量、灌溉方法、灌溉效率和灌溉排水規劃、設計與經營管理等。有助於學生建立區域性水資源永續經營管理觀念，並提供爾後從事相關工作時之參考。
description.en: This course aims for a close study on the relationship among water, soil, climate, and crops. It also delivers a wide-ranged topic on crop water requirements, irrigation methods and efficiency, as well as irrigation and drainage planning, design, and management, in hope of instilling students with the concept of sustainable management in the regional water resources and providing them with relevant skills for future references.

name.en: Special Topics on Irrigation and Drainage

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討水-土-氣候-作物間之關係，以及介紹相關之主題，包括作物需水量、灌溉方法、灌溉效率和灌溉排水規劃、設計與經營管理等。有助於學生建立區域性水資源永續經營管理觀念，並提供爾後從事相關工作時之參考
description.en: This course aims for a close study on the relationship among water, soil, climate, and crops. It also delivers a wide-ranged topic on crop water requirements, irrigation methods and efficiency, as well as irrigation and drainage planning, design, and management, in hope of instilling students with the concept of sustainable management in the regional water resources and providing them with relevant skills for future references.

description.zh: 本課程藉由邀請校內外之社會、政治、經濟、文化等專家學者與莘莘學子們進行相互交流，透過「全球議題」、「文化學習」等主題之進階探討，培養學生世界公民之意識，重新定位自己，以適應全球化生活與培養終身競爭力。
description.en: We invite the domestic speakers, as the outstanding scholars of cross-cultural communication, to share their knowledge and experiences with students. By exploring the global issues such as social, cultural, political or economic studies, the course makes students learn further about the world, and inspires students to strengthen their independent thinking and global perspective.

notes: 為配合防疫措施，請同學配戴口罩提早入場，並配合量測

description.en: The focus of this course is to enable students to have intermediate German abilities and to strengthen the training or drilling of conversation and reading comprehension of the German language.

name.zh: 國際觀培養:越南文化與語言(一)
name.en: Development of global perspective: Vietnam culture and language I

description.zh: 在全球金融海嘯後，已開發國家經濟成長趨緩，新興亞洲國家-東協國家經濟成長迅速，本課程將以越南語教學為主，越南經貿、觀光文化及越語字母拼音教學，讓學生在學習越語的同時，深入了解越南文化，協助學生拓展東南亞的就業版圖。
description.en: This series of courses aim to provide students with opportunities to understand emerging markets in a global context. Global economy in the post-recession world relies heavily on emerging economies, in particular countries in Southeast Asia known as ASEAN. Seeing the greater potential for economic gains and development, we build up the courses from introducing the fundamentals, including but not limited to, their economy, culture, tourism and people with special emphasis on the use of the language for communication along with its relevance to Taiwan as a trading partner.

description.zh: 完整且有系統的介紹產品設計實務的工作內容，從規劃設立、執行、管理、協調及最終之提案，針對實務及就業準備，邀請產業主管或負責人講授，並配合工廠及設計工作室參觀，以培養其專業知識及技能，進而了解就業市場概況及應具備之專業知識及技能。
description.en: The overall and systematic introduction of activities in a product design case, from planning, execution, management, coordination and final presentation. For career -prep, this class invites directors from renowned product manufacturers and product design studios to lecture design practice and vocational preparation. The course might also organize field trips to allow participants to experience future design environment.

notes: 機械大四與進修部攜四機四合開

description.zh: 修習內容包含：核能科技演進對人類的啟發、核能與輻射、輻射線與物質之互應作用、核能基本理論、核能應用與核能發電原理、以及核反應器原理。
description.en: The contents of this course consists of: the evolution of the nuclear technology, nuclear energy and radiations, interactions of radiation with matters, basic nuclear theory, nuclear applications and the basic working mechanisms of the nuclear power generation, and nuclear reactor theory.

notes: 機械大四和機電所合開

name.zh: 國際觀培養:泰國文化與語言(二)
name.en: Development of global perspective: Thai culture and language II

description.zh: 課程以培養泰語溝通能力、激發學習泰語興趣，以及跨文化理解為宗旨。課程架構包括泰國語言教學及元化議題討論，使其在具備泰語溝通實力之外，更能對泰國各方面情勢與文化、思想、禮節、風俗習慣、宗教禁忌等，都具有深度認識。
description.en: This course aims to help students build the foundation of speaking Thai, and arouse students’ interests in learning Thai. Also, it helps students get to know cross-cultural differences. In addition to learning Thai, students have to discuss the issues related to Thai culture. Accordingly, students are not only able to make conversations, but have further understanding of Thai culture, thinking, manners, customs and religious taboos etc.

description.zh: 隨著高齡化社會的來臨與國家對於身心障礙者生活福祉的重視，輔助科技相關資源與人才需求日益倍增，各類輔具產品使用已成為這些族群在醫療照護上與生活品質提升上不可或缺的一環。本門課程為「生醫輔助科技跨域微學程」之入門基礎課程，建立學生對輔助科技有基本的通盤認識，期許未來具備相關能力投入輔助創新產品研發。若未來有志投入輔助科技相關產業工作，建議微學程可由此門課程開始選修。由於輔助科技涵蓋醫學與工程相關領域專業知識技術的整合，故由本校與臺北醫學大學攜手合作，兩校多位教師一同共授，提供兩校各20位學生選修，以促進學生或教師間的交流合作，本課程上課地點除了在本校，將有部分週次於北醫校園上課。
description.en: With the advent of aging society and the country's emphasis on the well-being of people with physical and mental disabilities, the demand of assistive technology resources and manpower is getting increased. The use of various assistive products has become an indispensable part for these people in medical care and quality of life. Assistive technology covers and integrates expertise in medicine and engineering related fields. The aims of this course are to let students have the comprehensive understanding of the current status and future trends of assistive technology. This course is the basic course for the “Assistive Technology Interdisciplinary Program”. If students consider to involve assistive technology-related industries in the future, we encourage students to enroll this course.

name.en: Design and Practice of Integrated Circuit Layout

description.zh: 本課程將介紹layout(佈局)和先進製程的密切關係，從佈局設計流程之基本觀念及 EDA 軟體的使用到更深入探討 layout 的架構設計和先進製程中layout遇到的瓶頸和困難；課程內將教授並探討不同實務架構的layout問題和解決方法，其中包含標準電路元件(Standard cell)、記憶體 (Memory) 、類比暨混合信號 (Analog and mixed signal)，最後透過本課程的期末報告練習，可了解實務界中layout design的挑戰和對未來先進製程的重要性並提升學生往後在業界的競爭力。
description.en: Integrated circuit (IC) layout design plays a big role in the current semiconductor industry, especially for the most advanced technology. This course explores the big task of IC layout design and the practical problems with solutions in different layout fields, such as standard cell design, memory design, analog design, and mixed-signal field. This course introduces the students to the process, tools, and methodology of IC layout design. Moreover, it also provides the students with the insight into the exciting field of semiconductor technology and electronic devices. By going through the final project and competition, students will be brought to the next level of layout field and will have a wider vision to realize IC layout design.

notes: 電機四、電子四和電機所、電子所合開(產業接軌)

name.en: Design and Practice of Integrated Circuit Layout

description.zh: 本課程將介紹layout(佈局)和先進製程的密切關係，從佈局設計流程之基本觀念及 EDA 軟體的使用到更深入探討 layout 的架構設計和先進製程中layout遇到的瓶頸和困難；課程內將教授並探討不同實務架構的layout問題和解決方法，其中包含標準電路元件(Standard cell)、記憶體 (Memory) 、類比暨混合信號 (Analog and mixed signal)，最後透過本課程的期末報告練習，可了解實務界中layout design的挑戰和對未來先進製程的重要性並提升學生往後在業界的競爭力。
description.en: Integrated circuit (IC) layout design plays a big role in the current semiconductor industry, especially for the most advanced technology. This course explores the big task of IC layout design and the practical problems with solutions in different layout fields, such as standard cell design, memory design, analog design, and mixed-signal field. This course introduces the students to the process, tools, and methodology of IC layout design. Moreover, it also provides the students with the insight into the exciting field of semiconductor technology and electronic devices. By going through the final project and competition, students will be brought to the next level of layout field and will have a wider vision to realize IC layout design.

description.en: This course is designed (1) to strengthen students' previously required knowledge in English with basic grammatical ideas and sentence patterns reviewed through reading materials appropriate to their levels; (2) to develop reading skill by giving explanation of difficult words, phrases, and syntax, as well as analysis of basic writing skill; (3)to  familiarize students with useful expressions in conversation and build up their confidence in cross-cultural communication; (4)to reinforce the competence and performance of listening, speaking, reading and writing by practice.

description.zh: 多元英文系列課程以強化英語文實務及溝通能力為目標，提供不同主題內容及學習任務之課程。本系列課程整合語言技巧之訓練、專業內容主題之教授、及功能性之實務英文應用。課程設計主軸包括任務導向教學、主題式教學、及互動式語言訓練並導入多樣性之語言素材。修習課程前應詳細了解個別課程內容並評估個別英語應用之需求。
description.en: The Diversified English Series aims to develop students’ English communication competence through a variety of English courses. These courses integrate training of language skills, content-driven instruction and pragmatic use of English by tasks. The design of the series of courses incorporates the following syllabi: the collaborative task-based syllabus, content-based syllabus, and interactive skill-based syllabus, encompassing a wide range of topics. Selecting the best possible course is a key decision to guarantee the success of English learning. It is thus recommended that students evaluate their needs and wants and discuss the course options available with their English instructors.

name.en: Paper’s Fiber Culture and Its Application

description.zh: 透過認識紙質、纖維實驗與材質研發的單元設計貫穿、活化課程，也由此串聯課程理念。達到培育美學素養、認識材質特性、應用紙藝與纖維文化。學生可透過選修這門課，養成美學素養、材質特色認識、紙藝與纖維文化應用。課程為理論與實務之結合，包含 : 1. 文化藝術與自然科學知識之傳授。2. 創意設計實作。後者(2)可做為檢視學生對前者(1)的學習與吸收狀況。作業訓練達到二項目標 : 1. 加強產學合作，強化實務教學。2. 培育紙質與纖維創意設計人才。
description.en: With the help of curricular components of paper qualities, fiber experiments as well as R&D on raw materials, the course essentials can thus be unified and the theme vitalized. WE aim to provide the course with aesthetical principles, knowledge of the raw materials, applied paper craftsmanship and fiber civilization—which will be comprehensively instilled into the course so that the students who take the course will be equipped with a good command on them. The course is made up of both aesthetical theory and practice, including a) knowledge on culture, arts and natural science and b) innovative & creative practice, with the later utilized as criteria to evaluate to what extent the students are successfully trained. The assigned homework is set so as to: 1. Enforce cooperation between industry and academics and strengthen course materials into practice; 2. Train and discipline more design talents in paper qualities and innovation in fiber.

name.en: Elective  Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Philosophy

description.zh: 哲學既是一門兼具理想性與現實性的基礎學科，又是一種既有趣又深刻的一種思想活動。 它所探討的目標都是和人類自身與他們所生活的周遭世界密切相關的一些基本問題；這些基本問題至少包括：宇宙、知識、公平正義、道德、宗教、語言、心靈、社會、教育、愛情，和生與死。 從事哲學思考，就是對上述問題，進行一種反省。 這種反省，能夠讓我們明白形成這些問題背後的一些基本原則，以及解決這些問題的一些可能方案的理由根據和獲致這些解決方案的應有程序。 由於哲學是著重思考與反省的活動，學習哲學其實不僅僅可以幫助我們掌握和人類自身與生活世界相關問題的一些根本知識，更能培養一個負責任的社會公民不可或缺的一種思維能力和反省態度。
description.en: Philosophy is not only a fundamental subject with both ideals and practical value, but also an interesting thinking activity of depth.  The topics it discusses concern some basic questions for we human beings and the world around us.  These basic questions at least include: the universe, knowledge, equality and justice, morality, religion, language, mind, society, education, love, and life and death.  Thinking things philosophically is to reflect upon these basic questions.  The reflection of this sort leads us to understand not only the basic principles behind these questions,   also the reasons and procedures of the possible solutions to these questions.  Given philosophy is such an activity based on thinking and reflection, learning philosophy hence can help us grasp the required knowledge concerning ourselves and our living world, and more importantly, prepare a thinking ability and reflecting attitude that are needed for us to succeed in becoming responsible social citizen.

notes: 北醫/博雅選修美學向度/教師陳瑞玲/教室8003

description.zh: 本課程目的在於培養學生學術寫作與表達技巧及跨領域學習的能力。閱讀各領域學術論文，有效掌握學術文章閱讀技巧及學術英文句型與用字；培養學術簡報技巧，加強口語表達能力。
description.en: This course aims to develop students’ academic writing and presentation skills and cultivate potential for cross-disciplinary learning. By reading academic articles in various fields, students not only can effectively master the reading skills needed to efficiently read academic articles but also  acquire essential sentence pattern, and vocabulary for academic writing. In addition, this course provides skills training in academic presentation and use of strategies to enhance their oral performance.

name.en: Elective  Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Culture

description.zh: 本課程旨在提昇學生的人文素養。透過文學概論、藝術概論與文化概論等相關課程，引導學生探索文學的妙趣，欣賞藝術的美質，瞭解文化的傳統。從古典到現代，從本土到世界，從物質到心靈，建構多元化的文化視野。以臺灣為出發點，搜尋未知的世界地圖，找到人們必然駐足的角落，以及自己不可缺席的人文風景。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to enrich the literary taste and the cultural cultivation of our students. Though the related course, like Introduction of Literature, Introduction of Art and Introduction of Culture, we hope to guide the students to explore the interest of the Literature, to enjoy the beauty of the Art and to understand the tradition of the Culture. From classic to modern, from local to universe, from material to spirit, we want to construct multiple cultural views. Taking Taiwan as a start, we would search the unknown map of the universe, and would find a corner for consequential staying and one's own liberal scenery.

description.en: The main purpose of this course is to enrich the literary taste and the cultural cultivation of our students. Though the related course, like Introduction of Literature, Introduction of Art and Introduction of Culture, we hope to guide the students to explore the interest of the Literature, to enjoy the beauty of the Art and to understand the tradition of the Culture. From classic to modern, from local to universe, from material to spirit, we want to construct multiple cultural views. Taking Taiwan as a start, we would search the unknown map of the universe, and would find a corner for consequential staying and one's own liberal scenery.

notes: 北大/博雅選修文史向度/教師陳香杏/教室文4F09

name.zh: 複合材料在工程上之應用

description.zh: 本課程旨在傳授學生有關複合材料力學行為之基本觀念，及複合材料在工程上之應用。主要內容有:1.複合材料之簡介2.單薄層複合材料之力學行為3.複層材料之力學4.複合材料在工程上應用
description.en: The objective of this course is to introduce the srudent to the basic concepts of the mechanical behavior of composite materials as well as their applications in engineering use.The main contents are 1.Introduction to composite materials2.Mechanical behavior of a lamina3.Mechanical behavior of a laminate4.Engineering applications of composite materials

description.zh: 本課程由老師指導技優學生選定研究題目，培養實務能力，進行問題定義、分析、設計與製作。專題完成後需撰寫書面報告並公開展示成品。
description.en: In this course, the instructor will guide the well-skilled students to complete special projects in research and development through the phases of problem formulation, analysis, design and implementation. The final work should be demonstrated in the public along with a written report.

notes: 液晶高分子製作與模擬
